30a7(mdo sde): spros/ brgya byed lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bsten// pad+ma'i mig can rig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa/ lci'i bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs sgra ltos// mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang
30a8(mdo sde): de ring rtses// ci phyir zug rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug/ de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyis yan lag snyan// glu dbyangs pheg rdobs dus kyi rnam par nges
30b1(mdo sde): pa shog/ khyod dag 'dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig/ pad+ma rnyis pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman// me tog 'bras bu yal ga mdab rgyas skyed mos tshal/ sna tshogs steng bzhag lha yi sna chog shing
30b2(mdo sde): rta 'dra// soms shig khyod kyi na tshod 'di ni thog ma yin// dga' ba'i dus la babs kyis deng 'dir bu dga' gyis// khyod kyi khrus ched rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra// ud pa la ngag dang pad ma
30b3(mdo sde): ngag gi tshal gyis gang // pad ma rnams kyang bung ba rgyas pa mchog gi brgyan// de la bu som su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed// ngang pa rma bya ne tso khu bug ri skegs dang / ka la ping ka shang shang te'u dang
30b4(mdo sde): ku nA lA// yid 'ong sgra ldan gangs nye spos dang ldang 'a dra ba// thos nas mig 'di la dga' ba thob mi 'gyur// gzha ral med khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu gtsugs/ gse
30b5(mdo sde): dang bai DUR+Yas sgras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra// rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba// gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i 'phreng ba sgra brnyan pa// zab cing brtan pa mchog gi
30b6(mdo sde): sil snyan sgra bsgrags pa// khyod kyi cheng du srung rnamasu yang sbyin rgya che// bu mo stong dag klu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa// dga' tshal lha'i bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog/ mthe ris 'dra ba'i gnas
30b7(mdo sde): yid 'ong la ci'i phyir// rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems kyis dga' mi byed// gzhonu khyod kyi rtse grogs lha yi bu 'dra ba// bu po de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis// khyod kyi pha dang ma yang
30b8(mdo sde): mchis mas rnangs shing 'dug/ skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci// 'dus byas ying byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod don mi gnyer// yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa/ 
31a1(mdo sde): / 'khor ba 'dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// thar pa don gnyer ba la smras pa yab gson cig/ lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis mi mchis// bdag ni nga
31a2(mdo sde): ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags// nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar ljang byed pa// sdug pa thams cad bgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung // mi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud med de dag
31a3(mdo sde): dga'// bdud kyi zhabs pa yon tan 'ching ba g.yang sa che// rtag tu 'phags pa'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad// sems dmal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bsten// bud med 'di dag lpags pa
31a4(mdo sde): gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam// bdag ni rus rgyas la khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi gnyer// khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang / dri ma 'dzag// gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar
31a5(mdo sde): dga' bar bgyi// glu dang gar ngang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyid// dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba ma mkhas rdzogs par bgyid// kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'dir brla
31a6(mdo sde): gis/ ci phyir byis pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs khol// shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byang na/ dgon drung shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags// mi rtag 'di yis
31a7(mdo sde): dpal rnams thams cad ba shig gyur te// srog g.yor gyur kyang giti mug gis ni bag med 'gyur// sems ni rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus// srid pa rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir
31a8(mdo sde): zhing 'dong // 'dod rgyus phan tshun gsad pa'i 'gro la bltas na su// 'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mi g.yo bzhin// rgyal po khyod dang pa dang lhan cig skyes pa dang // gnyen gyis skye bo chung ma
31b1(mdo sde): ngan song bdag skyes min// bdag cag thams cad rtsa rtso'i zil pa 'dra ba ste// sems kyis dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur bag yod mdzod// mi dbang ngangal bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung // srog kyang ri yi chu ltar
31b2(mdo sde): mu gro cir mi rug/ 'dus byas 'di zang klog sbyin 'dra ste cir mi rung // rgyal po mkhas la srang gsum 'dod chags pa ngam// lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yong 'gyur gyis shig/ byang chub ma
31b3(mdo sde): dpa' yul la chags pa min zhes bskul// 'jig rten phan pa'i snying brjes sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi// rgyal po bag med spyod la byang chub yong ma lags// rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g.yen
31b4(mdo sde): smyo sems 'khol pa// do ni bsod nams chung za dga' zhing mtho ris ldog/ 'tshe ba shin tu rgyas pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi/ skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar dbugs phyin 'gyur// khams rnams
31b5(mdo sde): sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed ma 'dra// zag dang ba/ cas pa'i sems ni don med grong sdong mtshungs// rgyal po 'di/ na dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra lus// chu bo rnams kyi bangs na
31b6(mdo sde): bdag 'dir ji ltar dga'// rab tu gsal nas 'bar ba na mkha' lta bu dang // 'gro ba ngam zhugs 'gro ba 'di la dang ga bltas nas// rgyal po de rong 'di na de dag dgrol ba dang / 
31b7(mdo sde): gnying lags par bgyi nga nang ba gas pa dang / zug rngun nas gdon dang las log bzlog pa'i phyir/ bdag gis na pa chos kyi mu ni myur dugyur/ stong chen du ni bcings pa nas grol
31b8(mdo sde): bsgrags nas// legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par gyi// ngan 'grol lam du lhung bdag kyang gangon par bgyi// long ba mig sbyin sring pa'i khri shong bskams par bgyi
32a1(mdo sde): rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar mer byas// de'i srid gsum gar la lta ba 'dra mthong 'gyur// byams dang snying rje pha rol byin pa sprin// sems can de 'brug lhag
32a2(mdo sde): mthong klog gi 'phreng ba dang // byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun dra ba yis// 'gro ba yun ring dus nas gdung ba bsil bar bgyi// rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te// bdag
32a3(mdo sde): ni/ 'dus byas kun la 'dod pa smon ma mchis// byang chub dor gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyang bgyi// gcig tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis// rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig
32a4(mdo sde): dgra khrod gnas// blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro// mig dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g.yang sar lhung // byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur// 'gro ba bde
32a5(mdo sde): rgyun 'gro ba dag ni rgyun bzlog pa// rgya bo tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus// lhun po rtse nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mtsho nga spro yi// bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis yi dga'
32a6(mdo sde): de lta min// rgyal po dam pa rang gnyen thabs gcig myur du be nung // yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol// gang dag bsam pa ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur// 
32a7(mdo sde): yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags// bud med tshogs kyi nang du gnas pas byang chub dang // grub bde zhi ba bla med gnas ni thob mi nus// dgon par dgyes pas rgyal bas
32a8(mdo sde): byang chub brnyes pa na// bdag ni ri dang nags khrod mchis te gnas par bgyi// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gno na bsod nams kyi 'od zer/ khang bzangs kyi nang du 'dug bzhin du// yid / 
32b1(mdo sde): byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med de dag dang lhan cig 'chag cing de spyod lam gsum gyis gnas so// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'greng ba dang 'gro ba dang 'jug pa ste/ rmugs pa
32b2(mdo sde): dang gnyid yongasu spangs so// khang pa'i steng du song ste/ sa brgyad la gnas nas// de nam gyi gung la bab pa'i dus kyi tshe// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya cher
32b3(mdo sde): brjod cing / bar snang las 'gro ba dang / chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher rjod cing 'gro ba thos so// thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer spu zing
32b4(mdo sde): zhes byed par gyur nas/ mchi ma zag cing / skyo ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas// lha rnams la tshigasu bcad de smras pa// lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyed nas ni// gal
32b5(mdo sde): skyo mi mdzad na cung zhig zhu bar bgyi// su la yan tan thal/ ma sbyar nas// lha rnams la tshagasu bcad de smras pa// lha na mes sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyed nas na
32b6(mdo sde): gal te sgyu ma mdzad na cung zhag zhu bar bgyi// su yi yon tan rjod cing bde bar 'di nas bzhud// tshig 'di thos nas bdag 'dir yid ni bde bar gyur// yul 'khor skyong de nas lha de dag gis
32b7(mdo sde): rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigasu bcad pas slar smras pa// gzhon khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam// don 'grub blo zhes bya ste skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs/ 
32b8(mdo sde): de bzhin spong mkhas bsod nams shes rab yon tan mchog/ de yi dge 'dun khrag khrig stobs bcu bsam gtan pa// bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis smras pa// bdag ni rgyal ba lta 'tshal de yi
33a1(mdo sde): gzugs ci 'dra// de 'i kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsal cig/ ji ltar spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig 'gyur ba/ byang chub spyong pa ci 'dra bdag ni yong su 'adz+ra
33a2(mdo sde): de ras lha de dag gis// rgyal bu gzhonu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigasu bcad pas slar smras pa// de yi gtsug tor ri yi rtse la gser mdzes bzhin// dbu skra 'jam zhing mdzes la g.yas su
33a3(mdo sde): 'khyil pa ste// de yi mdzod spu mkha' la nyi ma lam le lta// nor bu shel ltar dam par dag cing g.ya su 'khyil// spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ud dpal sngon po 'dra// mi dbang seng+ge'i
33a4(mdo sde): 'gram pa rab byung ba yi sngo/ sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed// stong gsum rgyas par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skems// de yi tshe mas ni rab dkar
33a5(mdo sde): kha ba dung ltar dag/ bzhi bcu mnyam zhing thag bzang rmad byung legs par grub// rgyal ba dam pa mchog de'i tshems kyi ma che ba bzhi// de yi ljags ni rabs yangs rang gi zhal
33a6(mdo sde): gdong khebs// rgyal ba de'i gsung ni rim mchog 'dra ba'i don/ shin tu tshim byed 'brel cing gya gru med pa ste// tshangs sbyangs shin tu rig pa sil san stong 'dra ba// yid gnyis 'jom pa
33a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams ni tshom byed pa// rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha yi sgra skang tshim byed pa// yon tan sna tshogs chang bar byang chub las lag 'thun// chos kyi 'phreng ba ying 'ong brgya stong rab rgyus pa// sol
33a8(mdo sde): snyan dga' ba bsgrags pa lha klu nyams dga' ba// mi tsi ka la bing ka khu byug ngur ba dang // rma bya dang bsgra brnyan kun la ka'i sgra// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra// ma
33b1(mdo sde): khrul sdig med don rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa// rmang thung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i ming 'ong ba// skul 'dul ba 'gyur ba spyong pa dgar 'gyur ba// gzhan gyi spyod pang 'dun
33b2(mdo sde): bzhus na chi byed pa// chos kyi dbang phyug de yis gsung gi yan lag 'di// ston pa'i ragul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum// dbyug pa lta bu phyag ring de yi bdun yang mtho/ 
33b3(mdo sde): phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams do rang zhing zlum// rgyal ba de yi sku ni btso pa'i gser gyi radog/ ba spu g.yasu 'khyil cing gyen ci du re re skyes// lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang sbubs
33b4(mdo sde): d+ha li 'dra// rang byung e ni'i byin pa glang po'i sde 'dra' bas/ zhabs mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shis 'khor lo'i ma chen// glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros stabs seng+ge'i rnam
33b5(mdo sde): gyi skabs// khyu mchog bsgyings pa'i stabs can dbang po'i mchod sdong rgyas// mkha' las me tog char pab me tog gdug su gyur// gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'di
33b6(mdo sde): 'di dag de yi rmad byung chos// rgyal rnyed dang ma rnyed bde dang sdug bsngal dang / grags dang ma grags de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis// pad+ma chu ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med/ 
33b7(mdo sde): mi yisang+ge de 'dra ma rungs pa'i sems cad med// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gnon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos shing // chos dang dge 'dun gyi
33b8(mdo sde): bsngags pa thos nas// tshim zhing dgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste// dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhonu bsod nams kyi 'od zer
34a1(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra ba dang // de'i dge 'dun phur sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / nges mngon sum du byas pa'i
34a2(mdo sde): chos ci 'dra ba dang // de'i sleb ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang // ji ltar 'khor ba yang ba dang phrad pa dang // byas pa mi gzo ba dang ji ltar 'khor bar byis pa so so'i skye bo dag
34a3(mdo sde): byas pa me bze ba dang / ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes rimigs yang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang / ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med pa spangs pa dang / ji ltar
34a4(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i mur gdag rmongs pa dang / ji ltar 'du byed rnams tshogs par dka' ba dang / ji ltar sems gdul dka' ba dang / ji ltar ming dang gzugs zab pa dang / ji ltar skye
34a5(mdo sde): drug dbug 'byid pa med pa dang / ji ltar reg pa yongasu ma shes te/ sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang / ji lta/ ra tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar sra
34a6(mdo sde): bo'i 'aring ba dam pa dang / ji ltar nye bar len pa las 'byung bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa la 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / ji ltar srid pa yod na/ skye ba rgya
34a7(mdo sde): gcad dka' ba dang / ji ltar rga ba rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang / ji ltar nad kyi rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'chi ba rjesu mi srun pa dang / ji ltar 'jug
34a8(mdo sde): pa'i re bro ba chung ba dang / ji ltar sred pa mngon par 'grub ma nyes rimigs mang ba dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'di mi nus te/ 'dod
34b1(mdo sde): pa'i khol po nyon mongs pa/ sems thab can/ bag med pa la dga' ba/ byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba la chags pa'i sems
34b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ skye bo ma rungs pa'i rang na 'dug pas ni/ bde 'gro ba'i lam yang rnam par sbyangs par mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
34b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas par lta ga la 'gyur snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sgo nas byung na ni nye du'i tshogs kyis bar chad byas su 'ong gis bdag khang steng 'di nas thur du mchod
34b4(mdo sde): ngo mnyam mo// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhonu pa sod nams kyi 'od zer bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa don 'grub blo de ga la ba de logasu phyogs te
34b5(mdo sde): khang pa de nas mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs she na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la dgongasu gsol
34b6(mdo sde): zhes kyang smras so// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blos phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste 'od phyung nas// 'od de/ 
34b7(mdo sde): rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la reg go/ 'ong de las kyang pad+ma 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa shing rta'i phang lo tsam byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de las kyang 'ad zer ba rgya
34b8(mdo sde): byung ste// sdang ba chen por gyur nas// snang ba des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer
35a1(mdo sde): ba pa de la 'dug ras / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas der grub bre de gal ba de legasu bal me sbyar ba btud de/ 
35a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes lan gsum du brjod do// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa der grub blo des 'ang de brdung ba dang / gzhon de sdong po bcad pa sbrel ba
35a3(mdo sde): bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi
35a4(mdo sde): 'ong zer gyis/ bcom lngan 'das de bzhin gshig/ sa pa dor grub blo la tshigasu bcang de gsol pa/ bdag ni ring nas na ste ring ras 'dod// tshegs tshegs sman pa'i rgyal po
35a5(mdo sde): khyod rnyed de// ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gan sa nas ni// bdag gis thob 'gyur bgen po bstan du ga sel// 'dren pa bang gis bag mchis thos pa ni// mtshan
35a6(mdo sde): mo bar sdang lnga las thos lags te// thos nas skyo ste bdag ni 'dir mchis ra// mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu// lam mnyam pa la de ring ston gyur cig/ ldongs par
35a7(mdo sde): gyur pa'i mig du der gyur cig/ ngang pa'i 'byung gi nas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan// g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag byung shig/ dbul por gyur pa dag ni bsdu bar mdzod// mgon
35a8(mdo sde): po bcings pa bdag ni deng sgrol mdzod// som nyi bcas pa'i yid gnyis gtsang du gsol// byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung sten// chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du
35b1(mdo sde): gsol// mun pa bdag la sgron ma mdzad du gsol// rmar gyur bdag la tha led mdzad du gsol// sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gi zur du phyung // khyed kyi ngan 'gro dag las dag par mdzod/ 
35b2(mdo sde): srid pa dmigs pa 'dzin pa gcad du gsol// yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam chen gyis// mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol// srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang thung / dge ba pa
35b3(mdo sde): chang mang po 'byung ba ste// bsod nams rnam smin ring por mi thog 'grub/ bdag gis dal ba gdong rnyed cig nges gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur// ji ltar bya
35b4(mdo sde): chub spyod pa mchog spyad na// 'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching la sa thar 'gyur ba// 'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung sto na// yul 'khor skyong de nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa don grub
35b5(mdo sde): zlos/ rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya na/ ra yang dag par bstan to// rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od/ 
35b6(mdo sde): gyis// de thos nas rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo// mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob ste/ na mkha' la gnas nas/ me tog rnams mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
35b7(mdo sde): de la gtor// mngon par gtor to// yul 'khor skyong de nas// rgyal bu gzhonu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub
35b8(mdo sde): blo de la tshigasu bcad pas mngon par bsted par// mtshan mchog ldan pa dri ming zla ba'i zhal// gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rdul bral khyod 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis
36a1(mdo sde): mnyam med mkhyen can khyed la phyag 'tsha lo// rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jab mdzes snum zhing bzang // khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di na ri rgyal bzhin// gtsug tor mi
36a2(mdo sde): mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// thub pa khyod kyi smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes// kun dang zla ba kha bo dung ltar dkar// thugs rje gang gis 'gre ba 'di gzigs pa// spyan mchog
36a3(mdo sde): bzang po ut+pal sngon po 'dra// rgyal ba dri med sbyar la phyag 'tshal lo// ljags yangs sra ba la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba// de yis rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khebs// chos gsungs pas
36a4(mdo sde): ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// 'jam sdum gsung ldan khyed la phyag 'tshalo// tshems bzang shin tu bstan pa rdo rje 'dra// bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzang ba// 'dzum
36a5(mdo sde): ba mdzad nas 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// bden gtam smras / khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang / mtshungs ma mchis// 'od kyi zhing brgya dag kyang
36a6(mdo sde): snang bar bgyid// 'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od kyi zil du rlag/ e ni'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das// glang po'i rgyal po rma bya
36a7(mdo sde): seng+ge'i stabs// bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs dang ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis rgyas pa ste// khyod kyi lhag pa
36a8(mdo sde): 'jam shing gser mdog 'dra// 'gro ba gzugs 'di lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan// khyod sden bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spang / 
36b1(mdo sde): khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes// sems can kun la thugs rjes byams thugs ldan// mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshalo// khyod ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes/ 
36b2(mdo sde): khyod ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan// khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'ong gzi mnga'// mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs
36b3(mdo sde): can 'joms// khyod ni sing+ge lta bur 'khor du sgrogs// khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel// mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam
36b4(mdo sde): bar dag/ pad+ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos// khyod ni tshangs dbyangs ka la bing ka'i skad// srid gosum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshalo// khyod kyi 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang
36b5(mdo sde): gar la lha dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang // bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med// chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen// stong pa zhi pa skye ba med pa'i tshul
36b6(mdo sde): ma shes pas na 'gro ba 'khyam 'gyur te// thugs rje thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis// de dag rnams na mdzud par mdzad pa lags// 'dod chags la sogs nad mang rgya dag
36b7(mdo sde): gis// skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te/ bde gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs 'grel cing // zla med sman pa lta bu rnam par rgyu// skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non
36b8(mdo sde): sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas// rtag tu na ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni// thub pa thugs rjes yongasu 'grel cing rgyu// dud 'gro yi dwags dmyal ba'i 'gro rnamasu// 'gro/ 
37a1(mdo sde): kun shing rta'i pang lo bzhin du 'khor// glen pa dmigasu ma mchis mgon ma mchis// de la lam gyi dam pa ston pa mdzad// gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang
37a2(mdo sde): bstan pa// 'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyi// chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams kyi rab tu gsungs// 'jam zhing mnyen la yid du 'ong ba'i
37a3(mdo sde): mchog/ tshangs par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa// dri za mi ci lha'i bu mchog/ sgra nga zil gyis mnan nas gsung ba mdzad// bden dang drang ba mi bzang thabs tshul gyis// yongs sbyangs
37a4(mdo sde): yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsungs// de thos se mas can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag/ theg pa gsum gyis da zhi bar mchi bar bgyid// khyod la mchod pas lha yi bde ba ni
37a5(mdo sde): rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yi thob// mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa// byug cing nor che 'byor pa chen por re gyur// mtshungs med khyod la dad pa skyed pa ni// gling bzhi'i
37a6(mdo sde): bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba'i mchog/ 'gro la dge ba bcu po kun 'byed pa// rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni// tshangs pa
37a7(mdo sde): brgya byin 'jig rten bdag po dang // yongasu dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dang // gzhan 'phrul pa dang 'thab brel rab dgar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa/ 
37a8(mdo sde): mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang // thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te// gnas mchog rga shi med par thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam/ 
37b1(mdo sde): mkhyen pa 'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las bzlog/ bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam// bde ba ni brdul dang bral la 'god// bsod nams gter khyod
37b2(mdo sde): bsod nams don gnyer ba'i// bsod nams bgyi ba rtag tu mi bas te// byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni// bskal pa bye ba mang por bas mi 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga'
37b3(mdo sde): bgyid pa// yongasu dag cing mdzes pa thob par 'gyur// dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis// sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di las/ 
37b4(mdo sde): yon tan rnam pa du ma 'thob par 'gyur// mtho ris thar ba mri yis bde ba dang // 'gro ba kun gyis bsod nams gter thob 'gyur// khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po// phyogs rnams/ 
37b5(mdo sde): kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis// rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba ni// bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor tu rtag par sgrogs// rim nang bral zhing 'gro ba par
37b6(mdo sde): mdzad pa// mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa// bcom ldan dbang po zhi ba zhi dgyes pa// mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyis gsung po/ 
37b7(mdo sde): nas/ mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas// dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag 'gyur te// dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par dbye// lha dang mi dang klus mchod bde bar
37b8(mdo sde): gshegs// yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod pas// bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa 'dis// 'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog/ yul 'khor skyong de nas
38a1(mdo sde): mtshan me de'i nam nangs pa dang / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzho nu'i bud med kyi 'khor du ba'i sgra thos so// thos nas kyang myu ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs kyi
38a2(mdo sde): grong khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras// khyed ci'i phyir du de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od zer mi gda' ba'i slad
38a3(mdo sde): du'o yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzho nu'i phyir/ shing bcang pa skyel ba ltar sa la skyel te/ langs nas ngu zhing / grong khyer de lan stong du yongasu btsal to// 
38a4(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong nganas// grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan la 'di skad ces smraso// rgyal ngo che na bo gan du ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blol
38a5(mdo sde): lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya/ kha'i phyir/ shar phyogs logasu song ngo // yul 'khor skyo nga de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhonanu btsal ba'i
38a6(mdo sde): phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu/ shar phyogs chag la ba der song ste// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
38a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// 
38a8(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pas mngon par bstod pa// srid gsum khyod mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga
38b1(mdo sde): mchis// sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos bkur// skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// yon tan ye shes rgya mcho pal phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba khyod sku
38b2(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag/ lhun po rin chen mchog gis spras ltar yongasu dag/ rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra// blta sdug gzugs mang 'thub pa'i sku la
38b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshalo// bskal pa bye brgya bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyang // bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas sti stang mdzad// sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya phrag bsam
38b4(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab mdzad// de na khyod sku bzang zhing shin tu mdzes ba lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin shes rab dang // bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan thab
38b5(mdo sde): kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs// khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin chang / sa 'od gsal ma lags// chu shel nor bu glog gi'o/ da kyang mdzes ma lags// 'gro ba'i don du yid
38b6(mdo sde): du mchi ba'i gzugs kyang ston// chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma 'dra bar ganga' ba lags// rang gi phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'// bde gshegs rnams kyi sku'i tshad ni
38b7(mdo sde): gda' ma lags// khyod ni dga' ldan dga' zhig ni yang bzhugs par gda'// 'chi 'pho mdzad cing rab dkar glang por gyur nas ni// dpa' bo yum gyi lhum su gshegs par gda'
38b8(mdo sde): ba mdzad// thub chen na mkha'i lta bur thams cad rje su zhugs// bcom ldan phyogs 'gar bltam par ston pa'ang mdzad pa ste/ sa 'ga' dag tu gom pa bdun 'dor gda' ba mdzad/ 
39a1(mdo sde): / nga ni lha mir bcas 'gro dang gtso shi ni lha// 'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho la gdon ces gsung yang phyung // thub khyod chos gang la yang the tsom mi mnga' yang // yi ge shes pa
39a2(mdo sde): slob ltar 'jig rten dag na ganga'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yulo zhi ba brnyes gyur kyang // kha cig tu ni bud med nang na bzhugs par dga'// yab dang yum dang sras dang bud med
39a3(mdo sde): rnams kyang btang // gnyen rnams mya ngan non te rnam par rgyal zhing du// sems can dam pa bye ba brgya lhas yongs bskor nas// nags gnas gcig po nas 'byung bar gda'
39a4(mdo sde): ba'ang mdzad// khyod ni bdud bzhi pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang // zhing na bdud 'dul bar yang gda' ba ston par mdzad// sngon chad 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab yongs
39a5(mdo sde): bskor kyang // khyed ni thugs rje 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad// rtag tu rtag lta 'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro ga/ zigs nas// mya ngan bzla zhes 'khor gyi nang du
39a6(mdo sde): tshig tu gsung // rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs ni// khyod ni zhi bsil gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsungs// khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes rab thabs mtshungs me
39a7(mdo sde): med/ 'thub pa khyod sku 'od kyi zhing sangs rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams dag na 'dren pa khyod kyi bsngags pa gsungs// kun tu spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ 
39a8(mdo sde): chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can kun gyi bgyi bar sgyu ma ltar gda' yang // thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa 'am byon ma lags// sgyu ma'i
39b1(mdo sde): chos tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshalo// 'gro ba'i don du gang gis byang chub mchog thob pa// lam mchog ma yi dpa' bo khyod legs gsungs// bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni
39b2(mdo sde): myur du sangs rgyas nas// mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad par 'gyi// mi dpa' thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba// srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa ga la
39b3(mdo sde): zhig/ bdag gis 'dir bstod bsod nams mtha' yas gang bsgrubs nges// 'jig rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob par shog/ yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshe
39b4(mdo sde): ba don grub blo des/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i lhag pa'i ba sem pa mkhyen nas/ ci nas thams cad bla na med pa ya bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
39b5(mdo sde): ldog par 'gyur ba/ de lta de ltar chos ston to// yul 'a/ khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
39b6(mdo sde): don grub blo de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gis grong khyer du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal
39b7(mdo sde): gu gzhonu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs rtse bar dgongs te// cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis
39b8(mdo sde): pha ma de gnyis dang / grogs de dag dang bud med de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig/ ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te/ ma chags de
40a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dbul du rung bar gyis shig/ de dag gis sgra skad cig tu rje su yi rang ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhor nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis
40a2(mdo sde): ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// ro bro ba bkod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas
40a3(mdo sde): pa de la gsol to// dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir/ ring po che sna bdun gyis g.yog pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'i 'chags bshams pa/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ 
40a4(mdo sde): g.yas g.yon du me tog gi shing ljon pa legs pa ra yongasu grub par byas pa/ me tog pad ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pas/ ras bcos bu mu gnyis dri ma med
40a5(mdo sde): pa brgya steng bting ba'i mal bshams pa dge slong ri la gos kha na ma tho ba med pa gang byin pa de phyir nyin mi sbyin gyi/ nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan sbyin par 'gyur ba byas
40a6(mdo sde): so// de lo bye ba drag gsum gyi bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur// bdag la dga' ba ma byas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir/ gzhan yod la ma byas so// bar
40a7(mdo sde): skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid la sred par mi gyur te/ lus
40a8(mdo sde): dang srog la yang mi blta na/ dngos po gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad kun tu bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs
40b1(mdo sde): pa de la lan gnyis su ma nus so// bar skabs der khrus ma byas 'bru mar gyis lus ma bskus/ rkang pa ma rkus/ ngal ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed do// zan za ba dang / bshang gci byed pa la
40b2(mdo sde): gtogs par nam yang 'dug par 'gyur to// gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ tsan dan dmar po'i zhugs la zhen pa byas so// gang du de bzhin
40b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa de zhugs la bzhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du 'dzam+bu gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang rol me'i sgra thams cad kyis
40b4(mdo sde): lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur pa nas/ sgyu dang rkyen thams cad bsdogs te/ phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du byas so// mchod rten de dag la
40b5(mdo sde): yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po tsho'i dra bas g.yo gas so// mu tig gi dra ba'i bla re dag bres so// mchod rte/ na re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya bul
40b6(mdo sde): lo// mchod rten thams cad la sil snyan brgya stong phul lo// 'dzam bu gling 'khor yug me tog gi shing ljon pa bskrun to// mchod rten re re la yang mar me'i rdza bo brgya stong nas mar
40b7(mdo sde): me bus so// mar me'i rnga bo re re nas kyang spos kyi 'bru mar drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gi mar me bus so// spos dang / 'brang ba dang / thug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod par byas so// 
40b8(mdo sde): tshul de lta bu lo bye ba'i bar du mchod pa byas te/ phyis rab tu byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas chos gos gsum par gyur cing / rtag tu bsod snyoms spyod pa dang / rtag tu cog pu pa ste/ 
41a1(mdo sde): / nam yang bres ma phab de// nam yang rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non par ma gyur te// de zang zing med pa'i sems kyi le bye ba phrag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi sbyin pa byin te/ 
41a2(mdo sde): des gzhan la than leg so zhes bya ba tsam la yang re bar ma gyur na/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta smos kyang ci dges/ de chos nyan pa 'am/ ches bshad pas kyang ngal bar ma gyur te// de la
41a3(mdo sde): lha rnams kyang bsnyen bkur byed do// yul gyi mi thams cad dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / nang mi thams cad dang / grogs po thams cad kyang de'i rjesu bslabs te rab tu byung ngo // 
41a4(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis rjesu slob cing / yul gyi mi thams cad rab tu byung gis bdag
41a5(mdo sde): cag gis de la rim gro dang / bsrem bkur bas na/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gre byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongasu mya ngan 'das nas kyang
41a6(mdo sde): dam po'i chos lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas te/ dge slong bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis tha mas cad yongasu bzung ngo // tshul 'od lta bus sangs rgyas
41a7(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcu rtsi ba'i lu/ rnam pa de lta bu'i mchong ba byas so// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyu rang de/ gzhan
41a8(mdo sde): zhig yin snyam du khyod de ltar rigs shing com za ba 'am/ yod gnyi su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi lnga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 
41b1(mdo sde): rgyal po bsod nams kyi 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gnon bsod nams 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin pa sku
41b2(mdo sde): du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tsom za ba 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyi de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi
41b3(mdo sde): 'od zer ces bya bar gyur to// grong khyer gyi lnga gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrug par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
41b4(mdo sde): chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dod pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa
41b5(mdo sde): yongasu spangs pa dang / bag yod pa'i spyod pas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de'i rje su bslab par bya'o// ngas bya dka' ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bus
41b6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo// de lta bas na de dag mi brtson pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bku bsti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa dang / shes kyi khe la
41b7(mdo sde): chags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs dag sha thang ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang / dge sbyong sun par byed pa dang / 
41b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgo ngang / lus dang ngag dang sems mi drang pa dang / lhas lnga ba dang / kha sa'i che nor pa dang / rang gi dmi bcas pa las nyams pa dang / gso dang zas
42a1(mdo sde): dang mal mngagar ba'i ched kyis sman dang / yo byad kyi mtshan ma la chags pa dang / ngo ma mi shes pa dang khrel med pa dang / cho ga nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos
42a2(mdo sde): ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang / spyod yul dang bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub
42a3(mdo sde): kyi sems dang bral bar gyur te// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rig pa med pa rnyed pa don du gnyer ba dang / 
42a4(mdo sde): ma bstan par shes par bya'o// de nas bcom lnga na 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsa la to// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod pa dpag med na// snying
42a5(mdo sde): ni 'thob dang shes kyi khe la seng // byang chub yin tan brgyas khebs bor nas ni// de dag 'thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'// khwa 'dra sdang ba khrel dang mos blo
42a6(mdo sde): bral// shes kyi khe phyir bdud kyi dbang du song // nyon mongs rag lus srid pa'i 'gro bar gzhol// bdag gi yoms ca zhes de skad smra// lus ni dgon na dran pa grong khyer du// 'thob
42a7(mdo sde): phyir de dag rnam par rtog pas spyod// gnam dang sa ltar thar las ring ba ste// de 'dra'i de dag sbrul ltar ring du spangs// de dag sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du// dge 'dun
42a8(mdo sde): yon tan rgyas gang dga' ma yin/ mtho ris bor nas ngan pa'i lam du song // sdug pas phongs nas sring ba'i 'gro bar 'khyam// nga yi spyod pa nye bar bstan pa 'di thos nas/ 
42b1(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pa sgrub pas 'di la sbyor// bskal pa bya ba mang pos rnyed dka' dal rnyed kyis// de lta ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid 'dir brtson gyis// gang zhig theg
42b2(mdo sde): mchog byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// de yis rgyal po de yi yon tan dran par bya// bsams te yang dag ji bzhin tshul bzhin gnas par bya// de nas bde gshegs
42b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi byang chub chags med 'grub// yon tan 'di dag rtogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la bsten// rang gis 'dir ni kun tu shes pa bskyed par bya// bstan pa yon tan
42b4(mdo sde): snying po 'di 'dra ma spang shig/ byis pa lta bur 'gro ba lnga ni 'khyam pa ste// 'dir ni ri dang dgon pa phug tu gnas par bya// der gnas nas ni bdag mi bsnyems shing gzhan
42b5(mdo sde): mi spong // sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba phrag pa// rgya mnyes ma byas// rjesu dran nas rtag par rgyun tu ba/ dag la spyos// lus dang srog la sred pa ma chags spangs
42b6(mdo sde): bar bya// gus pa drag po bskyed nas chos la brtson par gyis// nga yis mdo 'di bsgrub pa bshad pa 'dir gnas na// de dag rnams kyi phyi nas byang chub rnyed mi dka'
42b7(mdo sde): gang dag rgyal ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa// thos nas phyir zhing yid ni 'jug par bya ba'i rigs// de lta bas na bstan la mos pa bskyed par bya// rnam par rgyu
42b8(mdo sde): ba'i tshe na phyis 'gyod gyur ta re// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod pa/ yang gang zhig bdag 'di la bslab bo// bdag sdom pa
43a1(mdo sde): la gnas par bya'o// snyam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub na/ bsod nams phung po de bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i gnan/ brgya'i char
43a2(mdo sde): yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba rgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bcom
43a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon sems ma skyed pa'i lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu khrag khrig phrag sum cu/ bla na med pa yang
43a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ sa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sa phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ dge slong bdun
43a5(mdo sde): stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems ma par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
43a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor
43a7(mdo sde): skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ khyod kyi rnam grangs 'di dam bcas pa don yod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ skyes bu dam
43a8(mdo sde): pa rnam par rol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig don yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
43b1(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
43b2(mdo sde): ba la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / dA na shi la dang / 
43b3(mdo sde): mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ shu lo ga stong ste/ bam po gsum dang / 
43b4(mdo sde): shu lo ga brgya// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hU pa ri ni rbA Na ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po theg pa chen po'i
43b5(mdo sde): mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams/ cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa/ bau dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer/ 
43b6(mdo sde): sku shi na/ chu klung gser ldan gyi 'gram gyad kyi nye 'khor shings la zung go tshal na bzhugs te/ de na bcom ldan 'das dge slong bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cus// bskor cing
43b7(mdo sde): mdun gyis bltas te/ dpyid zla tha chungs nya'i nang par yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus dang nye bar gyur pa na/ sems can thams cad kyi rang rang gi yul gyi skad du/ shin
43b8(mdo sde): tu zur phyin par brda' sprod pa'i tshig rnams kyis srid pa'i rtse mo man cad go bar mdzad de// deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
44a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba can/ 'jig rten thams cad skyeb pa/ sems can thams cad la sgra can zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa/ skyabs
44a2(mdo sde): chen po'i gnas dang gzhi por gyur pa/ thub pa chen po yengasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyuro// zhes bka' stsal to// sems can thams cad kyi nub lung bstan pa tha ma la/ de
44a3(mdo sde): lta bu'i gsung rnams byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal nas/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po
44a4(mdo sde): dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / rdo'i snying po'i kha dog lta bu dag thung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs
44a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyis zhing thams cad du sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'a gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sem sa can de dag la phog nas/ de'i mdo la
44a6(mdo sde): nyen mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral te/ nyes sdig thams cad kyi rgyun 'chad par gyur to// de nas mya ngan chen pos non te/ tshig mthun par kye ma kheb so// kheb so zhes kyang mdzar
44a7(mdo sde): to// kyi hud kyi hud ces kyang skad cher 'bod cing / lag pa brkyang bas kyang mgo la rdeb par byed de/ 'dar zhing shin tu ngu'o// de'i tshe sa chen po nags tshal dang bcas/ ri dang bcas pa/ 
44a8(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa yang rab tu g.yos te/ sems can de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'dzin cing / 'di skad du/ grogs po dag rings/ grogs po dag rings/ gyang yul
44b1(mdo sde): gyi grong khyer ku shir 'dong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa las bzlog la/ bsgrim mi dgos par bskal pa 'am/ 
44b2(mdo sde): bskal pa las lhag par yang bzhugs par gsol ba gdab bo zhes 'dzir to// gcig la gcig 'jus nas 'di skad du kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten stongs par
44b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// kye ma sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa zad do// las mi bzad ba ni byung ngo // tshe dang ldan pa dag myur cig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag myur cig/ de bzhin
44b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas deng gyi yud tsam 'di la yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// 
44b5(mdo sde): kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mi ba zhugs na/ bdag cag mgon med pa dang / rtsa lag med pa nga/ phongs par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhing / bdag
44b6(mdo sde): cag gi the tsom dang / som nyi tse dang ci yod pa de dang de dag zhu bar bya'o zhes kyang mdzer to// nyan thos chen po 'di dag kyang de na 'khod de/ 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan ka t+ya ya na chen po dang / 
44b7(mdo sde): gnas brtan bku la dang / gnas brtan nye dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang de na 'khod de/ de dag la 'od zer gyis bog nas/ 'dar rab tu 'dar dam rab tu dam dam/ 
44b8(mdo sde): 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ brtags rab tu brtags/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ khams rab tu khams/ rmugs rab tu rmugs/ rengs rab tu rengs te/ de la sogs pa dag tu gyur
45a1(mdo sde): nas chas so// de'i tshe dge slong sa ya phrag brgyad so shing zos nas phyir byung ste/ gnas brtan de dag la/ 'od zer gyi snang ba de pog nas shin tu rings par kha
45a2(mdo sde): gdong bkrus te/ gcig la gcig 'juso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras de dag thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa dbang thob pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas gcad shes pa/ gtsos
45a3(mdo sde): chen go chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa// tsan dan chen po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa/ seng+ge chen po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de la sogs
45a4(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de dag thams cad snga dro nyi ma shar kar/ yan lag thams cad kyi spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ 
45a5(mdo sde): mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems can/ thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang / snying rtse ba'i phyir dang
45a6(mdo sde): gdul ba'i bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog gsang ba stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ 
45a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
45a8(mdo sde): ga la ba de log su thal mo sbar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe ko ta ka'i bu mo rab bzangs ma la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug thams cad kyang
45b1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa zag bzang ga dbang thob pa bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa// khur por gnyon mongs pa med pa/ gtso mo chen mo// chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta
45b2(mdo sde): ste/ ko ta ka'i bu mo dge slong ma rab bzang ma dang / dge slong ma nye dga' mo dang / dge slong ma rgya mtsho'i blo gros dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug/ snga dro nyi ma
45b3(mdo sde): 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rmya sngags kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan
45b4(mdo sde): nas// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i ngab dag don du/ theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba stong pa nyid
45b5(mdo sde): kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar dong ste/ lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zha
45b6(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
45b7(mdo sde): 'khor de na dge slong ma 'khod pa rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog sa bcu thob pa sha stag ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir du bud med kyi gzugs dang / bud med kyi
45b8(mdo sde): dbyibs dang / sha dang khrag dang / rgyus pa mang po dang / rus pa'i lus 'chang ga rtag tu chang pa bzhi bsgom pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i
46a1(mdo sde): den byed nus pa sha sta ge/ gzhan yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos byin la sogs pa / byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed thams cad
46a2(mdo sde): kyang mi mchog sa bcu thob pa/ thabs kyis lus 'chang ba sha stago la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtshos byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
46a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod pa/ theg pa chen po la zhugs
46a4(mdo sde): pa theg pa tsha pos bkres pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po ser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang 'thun bar byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag rgal nas
46a5(mdo sde): gnan bsgral bar ba'o snyam ste/ sngon gyi bskal pa bye ba snyed/ tshul khrims kyi bgrod pa'i dam bca' ba legs par blangs pa 'dzin pa'i spyad pa spyod pa sha stag
46a6(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du bdag cag grol nas gzhan grol bar bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o snyam pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
46a7(mdo sde): bar bya'o snyam pa dang / go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa dang / bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can
46a8(mdo sde): thams cad la snyoms par lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu N+ya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs mig
46b1(mdo sde): ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi
46b2(mdo sde): don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsung ba stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhaT
46b3(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba
46b4(mdo sde): btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lha blangs shing / tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par
46b5(mdo sde): grags pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa dge bsnyen gang+gA'i rlung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang bzung dang zung du shes pa ra 'dod pa sha stag ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / bde
46b6(mdo sde): ba dang / rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / stong pa ma yin pa dang / de kho na dang / de kho na ma yin pa dang / skyabs dang / skyabs ma yin pa dang / 
46b7(mdo sde): sems can dang / sems can med pa dang / brtan pa dang / brtan pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang / zhi ba ma yin pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / ther zug dang ther
46b8(mdo sde): zug ma yin pa dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang / khyad par du 'phags pa shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ 
47a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen 'od dri leng bar grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen rangab spyir la sogs pa dge bsnyen theg pa chen po thos par 'dod pa thos
47a2(mdo sde): nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o// snyam du dam bcas shing / tshul khrims blangs pa/ theg pa chen pos skom la/ ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa dag ngoms par bya
47a3(mdo sde): snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun par byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag rgal nas
47a4(mdo sde): gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// bdag cag grol nas gan dang grol bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi'i chad par bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/ 
47a5(mdo sde): snyam du slob par 'dod pa go cha chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la sems gus pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan gra ngas med pa dang ldan pa/ bu gcig pa la bya ba
47a6(mdo sde): bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs pa la zhen pa'i phyir re res kyang tsan dran
47a7(mdo sde): dang / a~M ka ru dang / thang shing gi mchog dang tsan dan sa mchog pa'i bud shing rnams dang / yam sreg shing dri gsung dang ldan pa/ yon tan lnga stong khyer te 'ongs so// 
47a8(mdo sde): la yam sreg shing sna re zhing yang gser gyi skad pa rin po che sna bdun rigs bdun dang ldan pas smras pa/ dkris pa ri mo la bris pa kho na bzhin du 'dug par rang bzhin
47b1(mdo sde): gyis gzhon sha can legs par bcos pa sha stag ste/ sna re zhing yang 'od rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phung po chen po mdog sngon pa bar bar kha cig tu mdog dkar kha cig tu
47b2(mdo sde): sngo/ kha cig tu rtsa dmar/ kha cig tu ser ba/ mig du sdug par byas pa sha stag go// bam po re re'i g.yog ma'i phyar bu yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag go// de la chings
47b3(mdo sde): mthe gu mang po re re zhing yang ldong ros kyi mdog lta bu dang / zar ma'i me tog gi mdog lta bu dang / sngon po dang / ser po rnams kyis bar bar du spel pa sha stag go// de la chings ma'i
47b4(mdo sde): the gu mang po re re zhing yang / gser thags kyi mchog rnam par dag pa yul mang por grags pa dag gis spel ba shA stag go/ de la yang sreg shing sna re re zhing yang / spos dri bsrungs
47b5(mdo sde): zhim po dang / me tog phreng dang / gur kum gyi phye ma dang ldan par byas pa/ gser theg kyis g.yogs pa dar snas pa/ rgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis shubs sngon po
47b6(mdo sde): dang / ser po dang / sngo skya dang dkar po dang / gtsod ka lta bu de ga gi nang du bcug pa/ yul ka ling ka'i ras dang / zar mi'i ras dang / zab dar dang / rgya dar gyi mchog rnams kyis
47b7(mdo sde): dkris pa me tog mang pos brgyan pa/ thug pa dri bsung zhim po dag gis byugs pa sha stag go// yam sreg shing sna re'i shing yang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyis
47b8(mdo sde): mdzes par byas pa/ kha cig du sngon po dang / dkar po dang / bab la'i kha dog dang / la gru'i kha dog pas lhag pa'i 'od gsal ba dang ldan pa sha stag go// shing rta de dag gi gnya'
48a1(mdo sde): shing rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ dpe med pa/ rtswa cang shes pagyogs pa dag dang sbyar ba sha stag go// rta de dag kyang rlung gi shug pas mgyogs
48a2(mdo sde): pa spug chu skur gyi mdog dang / ldong ros kyi mdog dang / sprin gyi mdog can sha stag ste/ thabs de 'dra ba'i shing rta re ro'i mdun logs dang / rgyab logasu rgyal mtshan dang / 
48a3(mdo sde): ngar bgrang ste/ rgyal mtshan thams cad kyang rin po che las byas pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yog pa sha stag go// rgyal mtshan gyi mdun log su yang / gdugs rtsibs dang / rtsa ba
48a4(mdo sde): nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od can las byas pa/ mu tig gi chu na po sbyangs pa sha stag khyer ro// gdugs re re'i mdun de log su yang gser gyi me tog ku mu da dang
48a5(mdo sde): ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dkar po sdong bu bai DUR+Ya las byas pa/ zi ba rdo rje las byas pa/ bung ba mang po skad 'byin pa dri bsu/ nga zhim po dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba/ 'od dang
48a6(mdo sde): ldan pa/ che ba mang ba sha stag dang lda ldi chen po sha stag khyer ro// lnga ldi chen po rnams kyi mdun du yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi spyod ga ri mo bris pa chen
48a7(mdo sde): po dag thog so// ri mo'i gzugs re re'i blo g.yon nas kyang // zlos gar gyi gar thabs yul dbus nas byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ gar thabs byed pa de'i nang na sil snyan
48a8(mdo sde): rin po che las byas pa'i rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / rnga zlum dang / spri wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud cig pa dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dag rdung zhing 'bud do// ga
48b1(mdo sde): thabs kyi sil snyan de dag las kyang / kye ma 'jig rten stong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pabarjod cing gdung gdung skad du dbyangs len to// gar thabs kyi sil snyan re
48b2(mdo sde): re'i mdun du yang me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs rnam par 'char ba rnams kyi phye mas/ rin po che'i skon bu legs bcos pa gnon sha can dag bkang ba sha stag dang / de ma yin pa'i
48b3(mdo sde): skon bu ma blta na sdug pa/ gur kum gyi phye mas bkang ba mang po sha stag thogs so// de dag mdun du yang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa khyab par
48b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i zhal zas dag khyer zhing 'dong ngo // / zhal zas de dag kyang bud shing tsan dan dmar po dang / a ka ru dang / thang shing gi me chung ngus
48b5(mdo sde): bcos pa dang gang+ga'i klung gi chus bcos pa sha stag ste/ skyur ba dang / lan cha'i ro dang / mngar ba dang / bska ba dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba'i ro dang ldan pa/ ma dang skyed pa
48b6(mdo sde): phan par 'gyur ba sha stag go/ sa la zung gi drung gi nye'i khor thams cad kyang gser gyi bye ma 'jam pos bkram te/ ga bu sha'i ras dang / snam bu dang / bcos snam dang / dre'u
48b7(mdo sde): rdog dang / ka lang ka'i ras dang / zab dar 'jam zhing mdog dkar ba rnams kyang bting ngo // grub pa'i gnas de'i gzhi dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis khor khor yug kyang gur
48b8(mdo sde): kum gyis byugs so// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po gser las byas pa rin po che sna bdun gyis spras shing snang bar byas pa ri rab
49a1(mdo sde): ltar tshe ni 'bang mtho bdag kyang bsham so// g.yog ma de dag gi rkyen du 'chal ba sha stag gis g.yogs te/ gser gyi bu g.yer ka s+tha si li la'i khrol shang / 
49a2(mdo sde): gi skra 'byung ba'i dra ba can gyi yol ba rnams kyi ni bskor/ rgyu dar sgra sdug yum khyim chen po'i bla ri rnams ni bres/ gdugs dkar po rnams kyis ni nyin mtshan bsgribs// rnga
49a3(mdo sde): yab dkar po rnams kyis ni g.yabs/ rgyab rten glang po che'i mche ba la chu srin mo kar rten pa'i kha nas/ zla ba nye ba'i 'od zer ltar dka' ba'i mu tig gi chun po 'byung zhing / 
49a4(mdo sde): sbyangs pa dang / ldan pa rnams ni bcas/ sa phyogs rnams ni me tog dri zhim po// sil mas gto/ dar to// dge bsnyen dag re re nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 
49a5(mdo sde): bdag gis sems can thams cad la ze sa 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin no// skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom sbyin no// mgo bo dang mig la sogs pa yan lag
49a6(mdo sde): dang nying lag thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin no// dbul po dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa rnams la yang 'dod pa dang / dug dang / gnod pa
49a7(mdo sde): dang ma brtags pa'i sbyin pa rnams ma gtogs par gang dang gang dag ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag chog par sbyar ro snyam du sems kyi/ gzhan ni ci yang mi semaso// de
49a8(mdo sde): bzhin du dge bsnyen gyi sde tshan/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi bshos gsol te
49b1(mdo sde): yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi bshos gsol te/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam ste/ so so nas de 'ba' shig snying la sem/ 
49b2(mdo sde): shing / yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog lhur rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang
49b3(mdo sde): ldan nas/ rang rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad bud shing dang / yam sreg shing dang / shing rta dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan rnams dang / chas te/ zhal zas kyi mchog gi
49b4(mdo sde): sbyar ba'i snod rnams thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la spos dang
49b5(mdo sde): me tog 'bring ba dang / bye ma dang / phye ma ni bu dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re rgya chen po dag gis mchod nas/ ldan 'bum bskor ba byas
49b6(mdo sde): mig nas mchi ma rgyun mi 'chad par char bzhin du phab nas/ bdag la sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mang po byed cing / kye 'jig rten stongs par 'gyuraro// kye ma 'jig rten stongs par
49b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// zhes de skad du skad chen po 'don te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung na/ srog chags shi shu mar bzhin du 'gre ldog cing / gsol ba 'debs te/ bcom
49b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pas bdag gi sbyar ba'i bshos gsol bar ci gnang bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs
50a1(mdo sde): brtse ba'i sladadu// sbyin pa tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhesu gsol// zhes gsol ba 'deb so// bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa bzhin
50a2(mdo sde): du cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de dag gas lan gnyis lan gsum du de skad ces gsol kyang / lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur
50a3(mdo sde): to// de nas dge bsnyen gyi tshogs de dag re thag chad de/ cang mi zer bar 'khod nas bu cig pa shi nas dur khrod du bor ma thag pa'i pha ma 'gre ldog pa bzhin du shin tu sdug
50a4(mdo sde): bsngal bar gyur to// de bzhin du dge bsnyen de ngag thams cad mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa las de langs te/ rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bsdus nas
50a5(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i che bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi
50a6(mdo sde): gces pa'i dge bsnyen ma tshong dpon gyi bu mo 'tsho ba'i dpal la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi byed ma snyed thams cad kyang / bud med kyi gzugs kyis
50a7(mdo sde): sems can bye ba phrag mang po nges par sgrol ba/ khyim gyi gnas la smod pa sha stag ste/ lus 'di ni nyes pa'i khams brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las lhag pas bsdus pa'o// 
50a8(mdo sde): lus 'di ni srin bu'i rigs bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i zas so// lus 'di ni rgyal po'i khri mun du brubs pa'i dri mnam pa'o// lus 'di ni khyi ro rul pa'i dro bas kyang
50b1(mdo sde): lhag par lpags pa'o// lus 'di ni sgo dgu nas mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa'o// lus 'di ni sha dang / chub dang / rus pa dang / khrag dang / bags zhal zhal can/ rkal gi phyi sgo dang / 
50b2(mdo sde): rab dang / ba gam can mig gi skar khung can/ mgo bo'i yang thog can/ yid rgyal po lta bu'i pho brang grong khyer lta bu'o// lus 'di ni mkhas pa thams cad kyis spangs shing
50b3(mdo sde): byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa bye ba rnyed kyi srin pos bsten pa 'dam bu dang / e ran 'da' dang / dbu
50b4(mdo sde): ba dang / chu shing lta bur snying po med pa glog dung / raM ga zar po'i 'bab chu'i dpa' rlabs ltar shin tu mi brten pa'o// sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang / brag cha dang / zla ba'i gzu
50b5(mdo sde): brnyan ltar slu bar byed pa/ rlung shugs drag pos rnam par dkrug pa'i chu'i shugs kyis brkos pa/ 'i 'gram gyi sdong po ltar g.yang sa na 'dug pa'i chos can/ 
50b6(mdo sde): sbyang gi dang / waM dang / bya rgod dang / bya rog rnams kyi zas yin na/ su zhig 'di lta bu 'chang ba la dga' bar byed// rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad skra'i rtse mos blangs te ba lang gi
50b7(mdo sde): rmig rjes klags par mi nus srid kyi/ lus nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis gzir pa 'di snying po med pa dang / mi gtsang ba ni tshig tsam gyis bstan par mi nus so// chen po 'di rgya shuH
50b8(mdo sde): gi 'bras bu'i rus pa'i 'bru tsam sha stag du byas pa 'am/ yung 'bru tsam 'am/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul tsam sha stag du byas pas ni zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi/ lus 'di
51a1(mdo sde): yod kyi bar du 'di'i nyes dmigs ni mthar thug par mi 'gyur te/ de bas na dam pa'i chos srung ba'i phyir 'di mchi ma bzhin du dor bar bya'o snyam ste/ 'di
51a2(mdo sde): ltar dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgoms pas sems bsgom pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma 'tsho
51a3(mdo sde): ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen ma dpal 'phreng zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen mas ga zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ 
51a4(mdo sde): thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o// snyam du dam bcas pa bsrung ba lhur len pa/ bud med kyi lus ngan no snyam du smod pa dang / lus snying po med do// snyam du spong
51a5(mdo sde): pa/ sa nas shas cher sgom pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gzhi go snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / theg pa che na pos skom la/ ngoms nas gzhan skom pa dag ngom par bya'o/ 
51a6(mdo sde): snyam du dam bcas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa 'jig rten thams cad dang 'thun par slob par 'dod pa dang / grol nas gzhan grol bar
51a7(mdo sde): bya'o// rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa sha stag dang / go cha chen
51a8(mdo sde): po bgos pa bslab pa rnams la brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan du ma dang ldan pa dang / bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag/ 
51b1(mdo sde): ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar shin tu rings par gcig la gcig 'jus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir/ yam sreg shing dge bsnyen pa rnams kyi nyis 'gyur/ 
51b2(mdo sde): khyer ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas bu shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ dus las langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe li tshwa bye
51b3(mdo sde): gzho nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po la sogs pa yangs pa can na gnas pa'i li tsa byi gzho nu grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa dang bcas pa rnams dang 'dzam+bu'i
51b4(mdo sde): na gnas pa'i rgyal phran blon po dang bcas pa pang+ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos bsrung ba la mkhas pa tshul khrims dang cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dam pa'i
51b5(mdo sde): cho sun 'byin cing rtags can 'chal ba rnam skye ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag la de dag thams cad kyang / 'di lta bur 'dod te/ bdag cag nor dang / 'bru'i tshogs dang mdze
51b6(mdo sde): dang / khang ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni bdud rtsi mi zad par bya ba dang / bdud rtsi gnas par bya ba'i phyir yin gyis bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o// 
51b7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos la sun 'byin cing / log par lta ba rnams kyi lce gcad par bya'o// zhes legs par dam bcas pa tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims mi gnas pa rnams ni gos
51b8(mdo sde): dkar po gyon du bcug ste// khyim pa'i las byed du gzhugo snyam du brtul ba dam pa'i chos brtul pa/ dam pa'i chos lhug pa la ni bla ma bzhin du rim 'gro bya'o// snyam du dam bcas pa/ 
52a1(mdo sde): dge 'dun la phan pa dang / bde bar gnas pa bya ba ni yongasu rdzogs par byas bdang des chog go snyam du sems pa dang / theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la thos nas kyang / 
52a2(mdo sde): gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o// snyam du yi dam bcas pa la brtan pa dang / de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ li tsa byi gzho nu gtsang ma
52a3(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / bsgrub pa dag pa zhes bya ba dang / gang gis chu dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa'i li rtsa byi gzhonu de dag kyang gcig la gcig
52a4(mdo sde): 'jus te/ re res kyang gdung zhugs la zhen pa'i bud shing tha nga shing gi mchog dang / tsan dan dang / a ka ru rnams dang // yam sreg shing bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang
52a5(mdo sde): mtshang pa snga pa'i nyis 'gyur rnams khyer nas/ mchod pa rnams bsgrags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du dong ngo // li tsa byi gzhonu re re la yang / glang po che brgyad
52a6(mdo sde): khri bzhi stong dang / rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / nor bu chu shel brgyad khri bzhi stong dang ches so// glang po che re re'i mdun du yang che ba la 'os pa'i
52a7(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi bla re chen po rnams thog so// gdugs rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de la yang / khor ra khor yug du dpag tshad gcig
52a8(mdo sde): yod do// dar gyi bla re chen po rnams kyi nang na chung ngu gang yin pa de la yang chu zheng du dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis yod/ rgyal mtshan rnams kyi nang na thug ngu gang yin pa de
52b1(mdo sde): la yang / 'bang du dpag tshad brgya yong ngo // ba dan rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de bas kyang dpag tshad stong du phyin to// de ltar de dag mchod pa rnams dang / chus te/ 
52b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi tha du dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas phul ba las bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ste ma bzhes nas/ mchog/ 
52b3(mdo sde): tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te re thag chad nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phags te/ 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe 'dzam bu gling pa'i blon
52b4(mdo sde): po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag gang ga lnga'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la dad pa/ tshul khrims dang // cho ga dang / yon tan rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa
52b5(mdo sde): dam pa'i cho sun 'byin pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ khyim bdagi rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang 'gro ba skyong
52b6(mdo sde): dang / de la sogs pa dag kyang de'i tshe der lhags te/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi mchod pas mchod pa lnga ma rnams zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
52b7(mdo sde): mched pa chen pa'i tshogs kyi mchod nas// zhal zas ma bzhes pa'i phyir mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ re thag chad nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus/ ta la
52b8(mdo sde): bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod de// gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma gtogs pa ri yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po grong khyer gyi nang na
53a1(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa/ 'dzam+ba gling thams cad kyi grong khyer dang / ri khrod kyi grong dang / yul chen po dang / kha
53a2(mdo sde): langs kyi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag ban dang bcas te lhag so// rgyal po de rnams re re la yang dmag 'khrugs yang phrag bco
53a3(mdo sde): brgyang bco brgyad yang ngo // de dag la glang po che rtag tu 'gram pa nas rdul 'dzag pa dang / rta rlung gi shugs pas lpags par 'gyegs pa dag kyang yod do// de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad
53a4(mdo sde): gang yin pa de dag kyang mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma de drag las nyis 'gyur gyis ches bzang la ches mang ste/ de lta bu'i mchod pa'i phul dag khyer nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag
53a5(mdo sde): bzhi dang bcas lhag so// de dag gi mchod pa de/ rnams kyi nang na/ gdugs thung ngu gang yin pa de yang da/ bag tshad brgyad cu zheng gang bar 'dug go// ba dan gyi nang na
53a6(mdo sde): chung ngu gang yin pas kyang dpag tshad brgya stong du yin no// rgyal mtshan pal pa gang yin pa de la yang 'bang du dpag tshad sum cu yod do// de ltar yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri
53a7(mdo sde): ma med pa'i rgyal po dang gnyi 'od ces bya ba dang de lo sogs pa rgyal po rnams nyi ma 'char dkar lhags te/ de dag kyang dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags can 'chal ba rnams kyi
53a8(mdo sde): ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ mthas kyang sems can rnams dam pa'i chos la 'god par byed pa dang / bdag cag nor dang 'bru'i tshogs dang / mdzod dang 'bru'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag
53b1(mdo sde): ni dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro// snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / bdag cag gi dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o// dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams rnams kyi lce ni
53b2(mdo sde): drung nas gcad do zhes dam bcas pa brtan por byas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse ba sha stag ste/ de dag gi mchod pa rnams kyis
53b3(mdo sde): yangs pa can nas grong khyer ku shi'i bar thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur to// de dag gi gdugs kyi grib ma mdab chag su 'dug pas ni nyi mi'i 'od kyi mi po'o// de dag gis kha zas kyi dri
53b4(mdo sde): bsung gis ni dpag tshad bzhir khyab par gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rang rang gis sbyar ba'i zhal da zas bzhes par lan gsum gyi bar du gsol ba btab kyang / 
53b5(mdo sde): zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/ langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo ma gtogs par yangs pa can gyi
53b6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i btsun mo// 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma la sogs pa/ 'dzam+bu gling gi rgyal po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi chung ma gad+ma'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig
53b7(mdo sde): tu lhags te/ de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi gzugs kyi sems can mang po nges par sgrol/ rtag tu lus bsgom pa dang ldan pa chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
53b8(mdo sde): ba med pas sems rnam par dag pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo bri yang ku zhes bya ba dang / 
54a1(mdo sde): de la sogs pa thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la bu cig pa la byang bzhin du/ snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ gcig la gcig 'jus nas/ de bzhin gshegs
54a2(mdo sde): pa'i gdung zhugs la zhen pa'i phyir// yam sreg shing rnams khyer te/ mchod pa snga ma thams cad rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la nyis 'gyur
54a3(mdo sde): du mchod pa byas te/ de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs rnams kyi 'phang dang / chu zheng gi tshad kyang snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhago// kha zas rnams
54a4(mdo sde): kyi dri bsrung chen ni dpag chad brgyad du khyab pa ra gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / zhal zas ma bzhes nas
54a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed cing // skra 'a bal la rang rang gi rgyan rnams 'thor zhig skad mi snyan pas ngus te/ bu gcig pa shi ba bzhin du mchog du sdug
54a6(mdo sde): bsngal bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sa la zung gi drung nyid du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mig yang shes bya ba la sogs pa/ lha'i tshogs gaung+ga'i
54a7(mdo sde): klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dang / lhan cig tu lhags na/ lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smraso// gro na / mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i yo byad mchog tu khyad par 'phags la/ de
54a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang bkur sti thams cad mchod par 'dod de/ mi rnams kyi zhab zas kyi tha ma bzhes pa'i phyir
54b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs kyis grog po dag bdag cag gis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so nas mchod pa bya
54b2(mdo sde): zhing / tha ma'i dusu zhal zas dbul bar bya na/ ji ltar bdagis phul ba'i zhal zas de bzhin gshegs pas gsol te/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par mdzad cig gu/ 
54b3(mdo sde): grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni shin tu dkon to// de bas kyang zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa ni ches dkon no// kye ma bcom ldan 'das yongs
54b4(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das na ni 'jig rten stong par 'a gyu ro zhes smras// lha de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po ngas par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan to snyam du
54b5(mdo sde): dam bcas pa theg chen pos bsgom gangoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa rnams ngoms par bya'o snyam du ngam bcas pa theg pa chen po la ser sna med ga/ theg pa chen po la
54b6(mdo sde): phrag dog dang / dus che ba dang / 'chab pa dang / sgyu med ga theg pa chen po sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i tshul khrims blangs pa 'jig
54b7(mdo sde): rten dang 'thun par slob par 'dod pa bdag cag rgol nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o// dkon mchog sum gyi/ 
54b8(mdo sde): gdung mi 'chad par bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa go cha chen po bgos pa bslab pa rnams la dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa bu cig pa la
55a1(mdo sde): / bya ba bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la snying rjes lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar ston pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gdung zhugs la bzhin pa'i phyir bud
55a2(mdo sde): shing dang yam sreg shing rnams khyer te/ de dag kyang snga mas phul ba'i yam sreg shing gi nyis 'gyur bas bzang ba'i lha rdzas dri bsung dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba mi la dkon pa sha stag go// 
55a3(mdo sde): shing rta yang rta'i mchog mgyogs pa dag dang sbyar ba dar la dkar pos g.yogs pa/ gzugs dang dbyibs/ ri mor bri bar mi nus pa dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba can gyi yol bas bskor
55a4(mdo sde): gdar yug khyim chen po'i bla re rgya chen po rtsa ba ri mo can dag la bcug pa dang / gar thabs dang / rol lo yid du 'ong ba rnams kyi mdun du drangs pa kha zas zhim po mang po dag
55a5(mdo sde): dang / seng+ge'i khri bai DUR+Ya'i rgyab rten rtse mo nor bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ zhabs rten gser las byas pa dag kyang ba shams pa dang / sa phyogs kyang me tog dri bsrung
55a6(mdo sde): zhim po sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas la me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing bkod pa dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba sha stag ste/ so nas mchi ma khrag lta bu mi thub
55a7(mdo sde): cing / mchog tu sdug bsngal bas gdungs nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog du
55a8(mdo sde): gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
55b1(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mchod pa dang bkur bsti'i mchog rnams mang po dag byas te/ bkor ba yang byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams kyi phyir rang rang gi bla gos
55b2(mdo sde): sa la bting ste/ rang rang gi rgyun rnams brog cing gtor nas/ rang rang gi sgyu 'bal zhing skad ma snyan pas dra ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// 
55b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdagis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol te/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad gsol zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan
55b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis ma bzhes te/ cang mi gsung nas/ de dag re thag chang de langs nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzha na yang de'i tshe/ klu'i rgyal po phyogs bzhin
55b5(mdo sde): gnas pa/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang dga' bo dang / nyed ga' bo la sogs pa/ klu'i rgyal po gang+gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed shin tu rings par nyi ma 'char dkar
55b6(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi mchod pa byas pa las kyang nyis 'gyur bas lhags pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rang rang gi 'byor pa dang mtsham pa dag khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste
55b7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bsam pa bzhin du ma grub nas langs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ rnam thos kyi bu la sog
55b8(mdo sde): gaganod sbyin gyi bdag po g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa/ gang+gA'i klub bye ma snyed cig le gcig 'jus nas/ rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi mchod pasnga
56a1(mdo sde): ma zil gyis maran ras tshogs chen po dang chas te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang
56a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/ langs nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ na mkha' lding gi bdag po dgra'i mdza' bo zhes bya ba la
56a3(mdo sde): sogs gan mkha'i lding gi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung nyi shu bye ma snyed kyis rang rang gi mchod pas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po snga ma dag gi mchod pa rnams zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan
56a4(mdo sde): 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba ba tab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/ langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i
56a5(mdo sde): tshe/ dri zi'i bdag po mis byin gyi bu la sogs pa dri za'i bad/ ga po gang+gA'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa tha mas cad pas kyang ches mchog tu gyur pa'i
56a6(mdo sde): mchod pa rnams khyer te 'ongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ rol mo snyan dgu byas nas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba
56a7(mdo sde): btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas de dag kyang yid mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po legs
56a8(mdo sde): mthong la sogs pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed lhags te/ snga ma rnams kyi mchod pa de dag bsdom pas kyang / de dag re re'i mchod pa ches khyad par 'phags
56b1(mdo sde): par gyur te/ de dag kyang zhal zas ma bzhes/ yid mi dga' bar gyur te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po legs mthong chen po la sogs pa/ 
56b2(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur khyer ba las snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ yid mi dga' ste phyogs gcig tu
56b3(mdo sde): 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi bdag po bde mchog rigs la sogs pa/ lha ma yin gyi bdag po gang+gi'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed du/ lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa/
