56b4(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyis bsam pa sha stag gis mchod pa snga mnyis 'a gyur gyi mchod pa dag khyer te 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas zhal zas ma bzhes te/ yid mi
56b5(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur nas langs te shing sa la zang gi drang du rang rang gi gzi byin gyis snang bar byas te 'khod do// gan na yang de'i tshe/ sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bdag po gang
56b6(mdo sde): gi'i chu dri ma med pa rjes byin la sogs pa/ sbyin byed ma'i bu gang+gA'i klung bdun cu'i bye ma snyed/ lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa sbyin byed mi'i bu'i bsam pa med pa sha stag
56b7(mdo sde): gis mchod pa snga ma thams cad las mchod po nyis 'gyur bas bzang ba dag khyer ba las/ snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ yod mi dga' bar gyur te/ shing la zung gi drung
56b8(mdo sde): durang rang gi gzi brjid kyis snang bar byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ srin pa'i bdag po 'jigs byed la sogs pa/ srin po'i bdag po gang+gA'i klung
57a1(mdo sde): dargyang cu 'bye ma snyeng srin po'i bsam pa med pa sha sta gis gzi brjid chen po'i tshogs kyis sa la zung gi drung snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 
57a2(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag po dris la la sogs pa/ 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag po gang+gA'i klung dgu cu'i bye ma snyed kyis snga ma'i mchod pa
57a3(mdo sde): thams cad pas nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis lhag pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs khyer nas/ khu byug po rgyags pa rnams dang / bung ba rnams skad 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i me tog 'tshe ba'i khwa
57a4(mdo sde): shing mang po'i dog pa dang lo ma kha 'bus pa rnams kyis sa phyogs brgyan te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul chen po la so/ 
57a5(mdo sde): ba rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung stong / gi bye ma snyed kyi mchod pa snga ma nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa dag khyer nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan
57a6(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe lha mo 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can legs mthong ma la sogs pa gang+gA'i klung bye ma snyed kyis yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchod pa'i nyis 'gyur bas
57a7(mdo sde): lhag pa dag khyer te/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la spungs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mo rab b+ha dang / urba shi la sogs
57a8(mdo sde): ga lha'i bu mo gang+ga'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed mchod pa snga mo'i nyis 'gyur nyes 'gyur bas ches lhag par mang zhing / sba ba dag gis mdun du drangs te/ snga ma bzhin du
57b1(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ 'byung ba'i tshogs pa bsangs ltar 'khor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag stong gi bye ma snyed snga ma bzhin du phyogs
57b2(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'i lha'i bu gang+ga'i klung gi bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag/ 
57b3(mdo sde): khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ rlung lha bzhi rlung gtong ba'i lha/ gang+ga'i
57b4(mdo sde): klung bye ba brag 'bum dang lhan gcig tu dus ma yin par yang shing ljon pa dang / khri shing dang / shing gel ba dang / nags rnams dang / snye ma dang / me tog gi khri shing dang / 
57b5(mdo sde): byi ru rnams kyis sa phyogs brgyan par byed / dus tshig thams cad kyi me tog gi dpal rnams phyogasu rgyas par byed la lo ma kha 'bus pa rtsa dmar ba rnams kyis
57b6(mdo sde): shing sa la zung nyi ma 'char ki'i 'od zer ser po dza hong kar 'dug pa bzhin du byas nas/ mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lpags pa'i mchod pa dag khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das la/ 
57b7(mdo sde): mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin du shing sa la zung gi drung du 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ char pa 'bebs pa'i lha gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ sprin chen po dang / chu skyar rnams phyi bzhin
57b8(mdo sde): 'brang zhing glog 'gyur ba'i gseb nas/ rma byi'i 'grin pa ltar mdog sngo ba'i char gyi rgyun 'bab la 'brug sgra ngal nas sgrogs pa'i sprin dang ldan pas/ char zim bu bsil ba dang
58a1(mdo sde): 'dres pa'i me tog gi 'char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ re thag chad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la zhen
58a2(mdo sde): pa'i mi gsang ba'i phyir na mkha' nyid la 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ spos kyi glang po sgra can dang / lung btang mdog dang / sbrang rtsi'i mdog sel dang / 'dod dgu'i spos ldan la sogs
58a3(mdo sde): pa spos kyi glang po gang+gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag gis ston pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/ gangs kyi sman dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu shing
58a4(mdo sde): rta chen po'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag dang / dgon pa chen po dag nas pad+ma dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dang / rdo gu tha dad pa du ma dag
58a5(mdo sde): sno thor tos phyung zhing khyer te/ rlung gi shugs pas kyang rme sa 'gyogs pa dang / shin tu rang bar dbyar gyi 'brug sgra bzhin du sgrogs shing lhags nas/ pad+ma'i 'dab
58a6(mdo sde): ma bcer ba'i sang+ge'i khri'i lnga ldi dge bshams te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ zhal zas ma bzhes pas ri chad de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ 
58a7(mdo sde): seng+ge seng+ge bsgra sgrogs shes bya ba la sogs pa seng+ge gang+ga'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa sha stag gis/ seng+ge'i rtsal chen pos sgo/ 
58a8(mdo sde): kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dral me tog 'bras bu rnams khyer te/ rings par lhags nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ bya ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur pa
58b1(mdo sde): dang ka dam pa dang / zal mo dang / gzhan dang / khu thug dang / ba li ka dang / ka la bing ka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pas kyang / spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar me tog
58b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu khyer te/ rang rang gi skad phyung nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe'i sa'i steng na ba dan dang / ma he mo dang / ram mo yod do cog gis kyang / nu ma'o mas
58b3(mdo sde): bkang ste/ shin tu ring bar lhags nas/ shing sa la zung gi drung nas phyogs gshong zhig mthong nas der rang rang gi nu ma 'o mas gang ba de dag las 'o ma gseg ma dang / bye ma dang / 
58b4(mdo sde): ba tshas ma 'bags shing / tsha ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba med pa dag gzags te/ 'o ma de dag gi nang na/ sbrang bu dag pas la nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang
58b5(mdo sde): de'i tshe/ drang srong bzod par smra ba la sogs pa/ gling bzhi na gnas pa'i drang sosrong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag la gang+gA'i
58b6(mdo sde): klung dkrigs kyi bye ba snyed/ rang rang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yam sreg shing dang zhal zas dag khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
58b7(mdo sde): gzhan yang de'i tshe/ 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun kha cig dang / gnas brtan kun dga' bo la sogs pa ma gtog par yul phyogs na gnas pa'i dge slo
58b8(mdo sde): ngasang dge spang ma phreng ming ba sa mas ca ca sa lus pa rang 'i sdig go/ gzhan sa ngo'i ma ba la lags pa rin po ma rnams dag 'dzig rten gyi bar ma tshams kyir
59a1(mdo sde): klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed kyang shing ljon pa dang / khri shing mang po nyi mtshan gyi grib ma byed pa dang / brag zang yag grib mche ba dang / brag kha nas 'bab pa'i chus gang
59a2(mdo sde): ba dang / rman gsheng rde gu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu gang ba dag kyang der lhags so// lha'i bu mthu bo che'i mdun ma chen po dag kyang ri rab dang bcas te/ mchod pa'i phyir lhags nas/ 
59a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // gzhan yang de'i tshe/ lha'i bu mthu bo che/ 'od chen po/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i nang na gnas pa dang / chu klung chen po dag
59a4(mdo sde): gi nang na gnas pa gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed mchod pa snga ma bas ches nyis 'gyur gyis mdzes pa'i mchod pa sngon du btang nas/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis mar mi'i 'od zil
59a5(mdo sde): gyis mnan pa bzhin du rang ring gi 'od kyi mi ma'i 'od zel gyi sa mnan te/ nyi ma 'char ki'i 'od kyis/ shing mya ngan 'chang gi lo ma thams cad dmar lam mer
59a6(mdo sde): byed pa bzhin du rang rang gi 'od kyis chu klung gser ldan gyi chu klung gser ldan gyi chu thams cad dmar lam mer snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te
59a7(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ grong khyer ku shi nas shing sa la zung gi ber skabs kyi bar snang la/ kha bzangs ri'i dbang po'i rtse mo lte bu dang pa'i thal gong ltar
59a8(mdo sde): dkar ba sha stag gis 'khrigs par gyur to// sa bzhi ri skyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu'i chu bad mas mdzes par byas pa dag gis gang bar 'dug ste/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi skyed mos
59b1(mdo sde): chal bas kyang lhag par mdzes so// gcig tu dga' ba'i tshal dang / shing rta sna tshogs can dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ sa phyogs de dag de ltar dga' dga' kyang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / mi de dag
59b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir shin tu ngu'o// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ rgyal chen bani'i ris kyi lha rnams rang rang gi 'khor la 'di skad ces 'dzer to// grogs po dag
59b3(mdo sde): ltos 'grogs po dag ltos/ lha dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las khyad du 'phags la de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul ba la
59b4(mdo sde): brtson gyis grogs po dag bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod par bya'o// zhal zas kyi tha ma
59b5(mdo sde): yang dbul bar bya'o// gal te bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas tha ma bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes par gyur na/ de la sa bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen
59b6(mdo sde): bo thob par 'gyur ro zhes de dag gis de skad ces smras nas/ g.yog 'khor mang po grangs med pa dang bcas pas mchod pa lnga ma'i nyis 'gyur gyi mchod pa dang / zhal zas mang po dag
59b7(mdo sde): khyer to// me tog mang po dag kyang khyer te/ 'di lta ste/ man da ra ba rnams dang / man dar ba chen po rnams dang / ka ke ru ka rnams dang / ka kA ru chen po rnams dang / man dzu sha ka rnams
59b8(mdo sde): dang / man dzu sha ka chen po rnams dang / san ta nag rnams dang / san ta nag chen po rnams dang / 'od can rnams dang / 'od chen chen po rnams dang / kun tu 'od can rnams dang / 
60a1(mdo sde): 'od mtha' yas pa rnams dang / mdzes sdug rnams dang / mdzes sdug chen po rnams dang / ngag byed rnams dang / dri mchog rnams dang / dri mchog chen po rnams
60a2(mdo sde): dang / spos kyi ngad ldang rnams dang / spos kyi ngang ljang chen po rnams dang / kun tu ngang lding rnams dang / kur tu ngad lnga chen po rnams dang / mtha' yas dad ldang rnams dang
60a3(mdo sde): mtha' yas dang ldang chen po rnams dang / lha rdzas kyi mngab ma rnams dang / klung shing gi me tog rnams dang / yongs 'dus brtol rnams dang / de lta bu gzhan dag kyang khyer nas/ 
60a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ nyi ma'i ga zi byin gyis srin bu mi khyer gyi 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du rang rang gi gzi byin gyis thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis mnan
60a5(mdo sde): te/ zhal zas ma bzhes nas phyogs gcig tu 'a khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin su ma cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ 
60a6(mdo sde): mchod pa lnga ma de'i nyis 'gyur de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa de na yod pa'i me tog gi sna grangs du ma yid du 'ong ba rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba chen po rnams dang / dri gsung zhim po khyer ro// 
60a7(mdo sde): khangs bzangs chen po rdo thal gyi mdog ltar dkar ba/ thems skas kyi rim pa dang ldan pa skur khung gi phreng ba du ma phug ron shug rtse ba dang ldan pa dag kyang sprul nas/ bcom ldan
60a8(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
60b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni theg pa chen po'i mdo sde can srung ba lags na/ bdag cag la thugs pa'i sla bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas pa zhes
60b2(mdo sde): su gsol// de skad ces gsol kyang / zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'phags pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo las// 
60b3(mdo sde): bam po gnyis pa/ de'i rjes la mthar gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i yi ris drug po rnams kyis steng gi bar snang la mchod pa dang / 'od ma las khyad du 'phags nas/ bcom ldan
60b4(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ de dag gi mchod pa'i nang nu/ gdugs pal ba gang yin pa de yang kho ra khor yug/ tu gling bzhi pa'i khyod tsa mo// ba dan pal ba gang yin pa de
60b5(mdo sde): yang / rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i mthar thug ste/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho nas/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtshor thug te/ rlung gis bskyod dam/ rlung gis phyag na/ ba dan de dag la
60b6(mdo sde): bi wang gi sgra snyan pa khong nas 'khyig pa lta bur snyan pa dag 'byung ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das phyag 'tshal nas/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das
60b7(mdo sde): cang mi gsung nas/ re theg chad de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa rnams ma gtogs par gong ma gong ma'i sems can gzhan gang yin pa de dag thaMd
60b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ mchod pa rgya chen po'i tshogs dang chas te lhogs nas snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
61a1(mdo sde): tshangs ris kyi lci'i bu dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor cing mdun du 'dar te/ rang gi gi 'i byin gyis lnga thams cad kyi gzi byin gyis mnan nas/ mchong ba'i
61a2(mdo sde): tshogs chen po dang chas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du dong ngo // de dag gi ba dan pal ba gang yin pa de yang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'phyang ste/ shing sa la zung gi drung du thug go/ 
61a3(mdo sde): nges kyang bcom ldan 'das las zhal zas pa nas par gsol ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas de'i me// lha ma yin gyi dbang ba
61a4(mdo sde): ngas ngas lham me gyig laga'akhang bag/ med pa dang bcas pas nges pa dang / dbang po gnyis mag/ rtogs par do bar gyi lha mdang cig gi 'ang 'a gi 'o
61a5(mdo sde): kyis mog mgo por byas nas de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs dang rkyen du 'tsham pa'i zhal zas dang / dang chas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thadu song ngo // de'i gdu
61a6(mdo sde): phal ba yang chu zheng du 'jig rten gyi khams chung khyab pa tsam ste/ des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas/ 
61a7(mdo sde): langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bdud sdog can chung ma grangs med pa'i 'khor dang chas te/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi bar srad phye nas/ de dag la chu dang
61a8(mdo sde): kha zas la sogs pa ci 'dod pa byin te/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran par gyis shig/ sbyin pa'i tha ma la rje su yi rang bar
61b1(mdo sde): gyis shig ces smras nas/ de dag la khyed bde bar gyur cig ces kyang dbugs phyung ngo // sems can dmyal ba'i grong khyer mtshon chas gang zhing / me chen po 'bar ba rnamasu yang sprin chen
61b2(mdo sde): po bzhin du chu chen po phab nas sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba'i bde ba dang ldan pa'i 'du shes skyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdud kyi sems kyi gnas/ 
61b3(mdo sde): skabs de lta bur gyur to// de'i 'khor gang yin pa de dag gis kyang gzhu dang / ral gri dang / kho ba dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mtshon kam pa na dang / lcags kyi be rag dang / 
61b4(mdo sde): lcags mda' dang / sha tag ni dang / mda' dang / 'phang mdung dang / mdung rtsa gcig la sogs pa mtshon che rnams yongasu spangs te/ chos lhur len par gyur to// de'i mchod pa yang lha
61b5(mdo sde): snga ma rnams la med pa de lta bur gyur te/ de'i gdu gas bal po'i chu zheng du yang 'jig rten gyi khams pa/ ra ma'i khyon tsam mo de ltar de mthu chen po dang ldan zhing / 
61b6(mdo sde): rang gi chung ma rnams kyis rnga yab kyis g.yog bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas
61b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pas bdagis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes gsol// bcom ldan 'das
61b8(mdo sde): bdagis nga slan chad theg pa chen po'i sladu yi dam bca' bar 'tshal te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung / 'jigs pa'i sla du'am/ rnyed pa dang bkur ba ste 'tsha
62a1(mdo sde): pa'i slang du'am/ thob du re ba'i spanga'ang/ gzhan gyis dbying du stsal pa 'ang/ gzhan gyi ying bsrung ba'i sladu yang ru ste/ theg pa chen pa brjod par dgyid na/ na
62a2(mdo sde): don du 'jigs pa dang / mi dga' ba thams cad bsal ba'i gsang bsngags pashed par 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ thAg ke/ Te Tar thag kai/ ro ru me/ ma hA ro ru re/ A la mA la/ tA la swAhA/ 
62a3(mdo sde): chos smra ba 'khrul pa dang / 'jigs par gnod par gyur par rnams/ chos kyi tshul la spobs pa bskyed par bgyi ba dang / mu teg pa rnams myos par bgyi ba dang / dam pa'i chos
62a4(mdo sde): bsrung ba dang / ba dag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i slad bad gis rang gi dam tshigs smras pa'i gsang sngags 'di glang po che'i 'jig sa pa 'am/ nags khung gi 'jigs pa 'am/ chu
62a5(mdo sde): klung gi 'jigs pa 'am me'i 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang du/ bsrung ba'i gzung sngags kyi don du brjod pa gang lags de dag ni brjod pa tsam gyis ji lta ru sbal
62a6(mdo sde): gi lus bsrungs pa de bzhin du bad gis g.yo dang sgyu ma mchis par de dag 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi stobs dang ldan par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
62a7(mdo sde): da zhal zas 'di bzhes par gsol zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sdig can khyod kha zas kyi phyir gsol ba
62a8(mdo sde): ma 'debs shig/ gsang sngags kyi tshig ni sems can la phan pa'i phyir chos kyi sbyin par 'gyur ba nas/ bzhes par bya'i zang zing gi sbyin pa ni/ de lta ma yin gyis sdig can khyod gsol
62b1(mdo sde): ba ma 'debs shig ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to// lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang bdud dang bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
62b2(mdo sde): gsol ba btab pa las ma bzhes te/ re thag chang nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu dpag tu med pa mthu dpag tu med pa dag gis mdun du
62b3(mdo sde): bdar te/ rang gi 'od kyis tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin dang / bdud kyi 'od rnams snag tsha'i gong bu bzhin du 'od mi gsal bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod
62b4(mdo sde): pa rgya chen po nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer nas/ der song ste de'i mchod pa rnams kyi nang na/ gdugs pal ba gang yin pa de yang / chu zheng du stong gsum gyi stong chen
62b5(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'dug ste/ mchod pa de lta bu sngon du btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thadu phyin te/ la/ na du ma bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs la mgo bos
62b6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la bdag mchod pa bgyid pa ni/ sbrang
62b7(mdo sde): bu mchod pa bgying pa dang 'dra ste/ bdag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa'i rngog la thog gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad zhal zas
62b8(mdo sde): kyi tha ma gsol bar ci gnang zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du btab kyang / lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar 'gyur te/ re thag chad nas langs te/ phyogs
63a1(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug/ de nas de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa gtam phrag dkrigs kyi bye ba snyed/ 
63a2(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrogs sgra snyan mu thug ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na mkha' dang mnyam
63a3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des sras kyi thu bo nyan thos lus chen mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu song la de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag
63a4(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba ring por mi thogs par yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de
63a5(mdo sde): don du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas zhal zas zhim po phan pa dag khyer te/ song shig/ mchod pa chen po dag kyi nga khyer te song la/ de la 'di skad de bzhin gshegs pa bcom
63a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis zhal zas 'di gsol te/ yongs mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol/ zhes gyis shig/ khyod kyi the tsom dang / yid gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dang de dag kyang de
63a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de kho na la legs par zhus shig dang / des khyod la lung bstan par 'gyuraro// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen
63a8(mdo sde): mtha' yas des legaso leg so// zhes gsol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
63b1(mdo sde): lus chen po grangs mod pas bskor cing mdun du bangar nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so// de nas de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos
63b2(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ 'khor rab tu 'khor/ 'uru 'u rag tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig rab tu shig shig/ mer mer rab tu mer mer/ ldem ldem
63b3(mdo sde): rab rab tu ldem ldem mo// de la sogs pa byas te/ sa chen po rab tu g.yos so// de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na/ tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / 'jig rten skyong dang / lha ma yin dang / dbang
63b4(mdo sde): phyug chen po la sogs pa/ lha rnams kyis sa gzhi de lta bur gyur pa ma mthong nas/ skyi bung zhes byas te/ 'jigs shing / kha dang rkog ma skams nas 'bros par chas te/ rang rang
63b5(mdo sde): gi 'od kyang mi mthong zhing 'od nyams par gyur to// de nas 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa langs te/ lha'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces smras
63b6(mdo sde): grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa gtam phrag dkrigs kyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab grangs med pa snyed pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
63b7(mdo sde): khams yid 'phrog sgra snyan mu thug ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs
63b8(mdo sde): la 'tsho zhing bzhes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des/ rang gi sras kyi thu bo nyan thos la bos te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu song la/ de na de bzhin
64a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang
64a2(mdo sde): bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma la phul la/ khyod kyi the tsom dang yid gnyis ci yod pa de dag kyang legs par nus shig dang / des khyod la lung bstan par 'gyur re zhes bka' stsal to// 
64a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas 'dir btang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas bskur cing / mdun du bdar
64a4(mdo sde): nas/ 'dir 'ongs pa de'i gzi brjid kyis khyed kyi'o banyams par gyur to// de 'ong ba la rje su yi rang bar gyis ngo bon de gshegs pa na mkha' dang mnyam pas bdag cag gi nga
64a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa mdzad pa la ya nga ltos shig ces pas so// de nas 'khor de dag thams/ cad kyis me long gi ngos la bdag gi gzugs mthong ba
64a6(mdo sde): bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thag ring po nas bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang 'jig rten gyi khams de mtho ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas 'khor de dag la
64a7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smra so// ji ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'di mthong ba de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi kham
64a8(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang ltos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'di ltar bdag nyid che ba yin te/ rang rang gi gnas na bzhugs bzhin du yang khyod la zhal ston par mdzad do// 'khor de dag gi
64b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bdag nyid che ba yang yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba lta kyi hud ces zla zhing 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
64b2(mdo sde): pi lus chen mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor ba mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi ba spu'i bu re re nas/ pad+ma chen po byung ngo // pad+ma chen
64b3(mdo sde): be re re la yang grong khyer bdun khri brgyang stong bdun khri brgyad stong yod la/ grong khyer de dag kyang yul yangs pa can gyi thag dru tsam sha stag ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba dang / 'obs
64b4(mdo sde): ba ma gyis parnams shid tul phe sa gyis mas par byas pa gagasa'ag rgyas bdag nga ldan na ga 'daga'
64b5(mdo sde): la/ re ba dag kyang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi ba gam chen po sha stag gis bskor te/ ba gam thams cad kyi bar bar na yang shing ljon pa gzhon sha can 'bras bu dang / me
64b6(mdo sde): tog dang ldan pa sna mang po dag yod do// shing ljon pa de dag gi yan lag rlung gis bskyod pa las kyang sil snyan dga' bar byed pa'i sgra bstan cing chagasu rung ba 'byung ba sna lnga lnga
64b7(mdo sde): sgrogs te/ sgra de dag gis/ sems can de dag rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur sprad ngo do// 'obs de dag thams cad kyang / chu bsil zhing shel bzhin du dang bdags gang bar 'dug ste/ 
64b8(mdo sde): de dag gi nang kher khor yug du sems can de dag rin po che'i dru dag gis dga' zhing rgyu bar byed do// chu de dag kyang pad+ma dang / ung ba la dang / ku mu ta shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam steg gis
66a1(mdo sde): // brgyan to// 'obs kyi khor khor yug kyang bskyes mes tshal gyi 'phreng bas mdzes par byas te/ skyed mos chal re la yang rdzing bu thag gru dpag chad phyed pa lnga lnga yod do// rdzing bu'i
66a2(mdo sde): chu de dag kyang pad+ma dang/ ud pa la dang / ku mung kha dog sna tshogs dri zhim po shing rti'i 'phang lo tsam sha sta gis khebs par 'dug la shing ljon pa me tog rgyas pa'i 'phreng bas mdzes par
66a3(mdo sde): byas bskyed mos chal khor khor yug na yang / ngang ngur dang / zal mo dang / khrung khrung shug dag gis pad+ma'i ze 'bru myang bar byed do// khor khor lu gri bskyed mos tshal de dang de dag na yang khang
66a4(mdo sde): khyim ngag yod la/ khang pa ri la yang / chu zheng dpag tshang ba zhi bzhi yod do// rtsigs pa ni gser dang / dngul dang / bai rU rla dang / shel las byas sa gzhi ni ke ke ru las grub
66a5(mdo sde): ste/ nor bu'i 'jom tshar gyis spel cing / snang bar byas pa'i mu tig gi do shal sbyangs pa dang ldan pa gser rta babs chen po dang skar khung dang / dra ba dag gis brgyan pa'i khang
66a6(mdo sde): bzangs mthon pos gser gyi bye ma bdal ba dang ldan pa sha stago// rdzing bu rnams kyang 'dul ba'i lam/ gser gyi them skas them pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa dang / mtha' thog du gser gyi chu
66a7(mdo sde): shing gi phreng bas mdzes par byas pa lnga'i tsan ngan gyi bsung can gyi chu dang ldan pa shA stago/ grong khyer chen po de dag re re'i nang na rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang
66a8(mdo sde): bud med kyi tshogs dpag tu me gang pag tu med pa dag gis bskor cing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan ste/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// sems can gzhan dag kyang de dang
66b1(mdo sde): 'dra ste/ sa phyogs ka tsa la ni 'da' gos ltar reg na bde ba tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab la me tog gis sil ma gtor ba gzhan dag na rtse zhing dga' la dga' 'gur spyod do// grong khyer
66b2(mdo sde): chen po de dag na theg pa chen po'i sgra ma gtol theg pa gzhan gyi sgra med do// pad ma chen po de dag la yang seng+ge'i khri chen po rkang pa gser dang dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa/ ka
66b3(mdo sde): ling ka'i ras kyis g.yogs pa che ba la 'os pa 'jig rten gsum na phul du bya ba sha stag gis dkrigs te/ seng+ge'i khri de dag la rgyal po de dag 'khod cing / sems can gzhan dag theg pa
66b4(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo sde rnams slob par byed do// rgyal po de dag gi mdun na la la ni yi ge 'dri la la ni klog la la ni kha ton slob bo// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus
66b5(mdo sde): mtha' yas kyis ba spu'i khung bu nas skye ba'i pad+ma dag la 'a khong pa'i sems can de dag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i dag 'a ba dang ldan de dag yongasu spangs nas/ mya ngan
66b6(mdo sde): gyis gdungs te/ smre sngags 'don cing kyi hud kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod de/ nyes 'gyur du mchod pa'i tshogs 'bul bar byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
66b7(mdo sde): lus chen mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pas bskor te/ de lta bu'i 'byor pa'i rnam pa dag ston cing / mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang / zhal zas rgya che ba dag khyer te 'ongs
66b8(mdo sde): nas zhal zas de dag dang / pad+ma de dag gi dri bsrung tshor nga gang yin pa de dag kyang / nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams thaMd mtsho/ 
67a1(mdo sde): / bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas kyi lus kyi chad kyang / na mkha' dang mnyam par 'dug ste/ sus kyang mthong bar mi nuso// 
67a2(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ zhabs la mgo bo phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// 
67a3(mdo sde): ba gis phule ba'i zhal zas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol kyang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi
67a4(mdo sde): gsung bar bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de langs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// de bzhin du phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs logs nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
67a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas shes bya ba 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang ldan pa sha stags lhags te/ de dag gi pad+ma dang / grong khyer gyi tshad kyang snga ma snga ma las nyis 'gyur kas
67a6(mdo sde): gyi che ba dang / 'byor pa nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyi che ba sha stag dang chas te/ de dag der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma dag gis mchod pa byas te/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod
67a7(mdo sde): // shing sa la zung gi drung grub pa'i gnas de nying na dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa gnyis chang khyon gyis bani la sems can mi 'khod pa'i sgo skabs ci yang med do// de na byang chub sems dpa'
67a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po de ltar lus che bal rang gi g.yor 'khor dag dang bcas pa de rnams kyang kha cig ni sa phyogs smyung bu rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khod do// kha cig ni khab kyi rtse mor tshu / 
67b1(mdo sde): mal ba dang / bcig ni rdul tharabagyi khyon tsam langag yang su 'khong / 'jig rten gyi 'ams rdul phrar gyi khrub snyed dang byang nub sems dpa' 'khong ba gang yin pa de ga kyang babs des
67b2(mdo sde): bur lhags de 'khod do// 'dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can yang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang / gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra rnams ma gtogs par/ der ma 'ongs pa su yang med
67b3(mdo sde): de tha na mig gdug pa dang / sbrul gdugs pa dang / sdig pa dang sdom pa la sogs pa mi las mi zad pa bcu drug byed pa yan chad kyang der lhag so// sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / lha ma yin rtag 'kho na
67b4(mdo sde): gyi bsam pa can thams cad kyang sdig pa'i las spangs nas/ gcig lnga gcig pu dang / ma dang / sring mo dang / 'dra bar sems par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
67b5(mdo sde): na'akhod pa'i sems can thams cad kyang / gcig la gciganyebu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du byams par byed de/ 'dod chen/ po ni ma gtog so// mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi bas
67b6(mdo sde): 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bong ba dang rdo dang / gseg ma dang / rngu ba dang / tsher ma med par gyur te/ shing ljon pa rin po che'i khri shing gis dkris pa/ mnyen zhing reg na 'jam pa dag
67b7(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dang 'dra bar gyur to// sems can der lhags pa thams cad kyis kyang de na 'khod bzhin du ji ltar me long la rang gi gzugs bstan snang ba
67b8(mdo sde): bzhin du rdul phra rabs kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa gzhan dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas 'od zer la/ 
68a1(mdo sde): dog sna tshogs sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod pa dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu dang / me lce lta bu dag blung ba yin pa de dag gis bya ba thams cad bas
68a2(mdo sde): te phyir logs nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal du bzhugs te/ mi snang bar gyur to// 'khor thams cad kyi 'od kyang des zil gyis non par gyur to// de nas lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
68a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi 'od zer de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mi snang bar gyur pa mthong nas/ 'jigs shing skyi bung zhes byas te/ rgyu med par bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer rnams phyir log nas mi
68a4(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ba'i mi rigs na gor ma chag par phyogs bcu dag/ tra bya ba rnams zin nas/ da ni gdon mi za bar de bzhi ni gshe gas pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// 
68a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gang las zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ kye ma sems can thams cad la tshad med pa bzhi spangs sam/ ci smyung bar bzhugs pa chad dam/ kye ma ci nyi ma dang zla
68a6(mdo sde): ba nub 'am/ ci dam pa'i chos kyi glu bying ngam kyi hud kyi hud ces blang zhing 'khod do// de nas de dag rang gis yan lag rnams smras par byas pa'i khrigs sa gzhi 'dam du gyur to// chu klung gas
68a7(mdo sde): ldan kyang khrag tu 'bab par gyur to// de nas 'khor de dag gis nang na grong khyer ku shi pa mgar ba'i bu dge bsnyen bskul byed ces bya ba de mgar ba'i bu bco lnga thabs gcig tu langs te/ 
68a8(mdo sde): rang rang gi spyod lam bcos nas/ 'jig rten dag la bltas te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo/ 
68b1(mdo sde): sbyar ba datung nas/ mchis ma thub pa bzhin bunabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad nges par bskul/ 
68b2(mdo sde): bi'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul bar 'tshal te/ 
68b3(mdo sde): bdag ni mgon ma mchis pa lags/ rtsa lag ma mchis pa lags skyabs ma mchis pa lags/ phongs te re ba lags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bang gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes
68b4(mdo sde): te/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol ma khyim bdag gam/ bram ze shin tu dngul po 'ga' zhig gnan gyi yul du mchis la bdag nyid spro
68b5(mdo sde): ba skyed// mthar gyis zhing blas brtsams nas/ des rmon glang rmo sbyin pa mong gshol dang sbyar ba dag gis zhing la rdo dang / rngub dang / cher ma ma mchis par bgyis te/ re
68b6(mdo sde): chen po bskyed nas/ sprin chen po las char 'bab sdod cing mchis pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus kyi zhing la nyes pa gsum dang / zhi dang bral ba'i yid dang / ngag
68b7(mdo sde): gi rmon glang dang / shes pa'i thong gshol gyis nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rdo dang / rngub dang / tsher ma ma mchis par bgyis nas khyod kyi chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi char
68b8(mdo sde): 'bab pa la sdod cing mchis te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par spyan 'dren na/ bdag dbul ba bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad la sman pa'i sladadu/ bad gis phul ba'i
69a1(mdo sde): nal zas gsol// bdag ni mgon ma mchis pa skyabs ma mchis pa lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la sgra can zin bzhin du gzigs par gsol/ de nas/ 
69a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa rgyal ba gang zag bla na med pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skul byed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
69a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyod kyi zhal zas tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po bzhes par mdzad do// de nas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin de dag gis skul byed kyis phul ba'i zhal
69a4(mdo sde): zas tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas bzhes so zhes thos nas/ ngo mtshar rma du byung ba'i chos thob ste/ legaso
69a5(mdo sde): legaso zhes de skad chen po phyung nas/ mgur ba 'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras/ kye ma mgar ba'i bu skul byed khyod skyid de ba khyod kyi mi lus thob pa ni phan tha
69a6(mdo sde): bar gyur to// legs par thob bo// skul byed 'jig rten na/ u dum pa ri'i me tog shin tu mdzes pa rnyed par dka'o// de bas kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba rnyed par dka'o// 
69a7(mdo sde): de bas kyang dad pa rnyed pa shin tu dka'o// de bas kyang ches chos thos pa rnyed par dka'o// de bas kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma dbul ba rnyed par dka'o// de bas na
69a8(mdo sde): zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par dka'o// mgar ba'i bu skul byed khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dper na ston zla 'bring po'i nya la sprin med pa'i tshe/ zla ba'i dkyil 'tsha
69b1(mdo sde): dri ma med pa mdzes pa mthong ba na/ zla ba 'ba' shig mngon du snang ba de bzhin du khyed kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tham/ de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes pas na khyod 'ba' shig/ 
69b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la mngon du srung ngo // khyod la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo// skul byed khyod ni mi'i lus pad ma' las byed bzhin du lha yi yang lha yin// de bzhin ga
69b3(mdo sde): ba'i sras sgra can zin dang 'dra'o// zhes byas nas/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smraso// khyod ni ma yin te lnga mchog yin// mi mchog gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa ste// de phyir khyod la
69b4(mdo sde): gsol pa 'di skad 'debs// ston pa yongasu myang na 'da' bar chas// bdag cig kun la brtsibs skul byed khyo dang // skye bo rnams la yun du phan pa'i phyir// 'dir ni ston pa dpag
69b5(mdo sde): med mgon po la// bzhugs shing rgyun tu bdud rtsi ston ces gsol// srid las rnam grol mya ngan 'da' bzhed 2// gal te khyod kyis de ring ma gsol na// bdag cag thams cad
69b6(mdo sde): ma ru shes par gyis// de las pan phyir mgon la gsol ba thob// de nas la la zhig pa ma gnyis shi ba las phyir sos te// gson por 'dug pa mthong na/ mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba de
69b7(mdo sde): kho na bzhin du// mgar ba'i bu skul byed de mchog tu dga' bar gyur nas// lag pa brkyang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas langs te/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras/ 
69b8(mdo sde): kye ma dang bdag rnyed pa legs par rnyi do// mi'i 'jig rten skyes pa 'bras bu yod// da ni rnyed las stsogs las 'bral mi 'gyur// ma bzad dmyal bar yang ni ltung mi 'gyur// deng 'dir rnyedapa
70a1(mdo sde): chen po rnyed pa 'di// gser gyi phung po bas kyang lhag pa yin// dpa' bo bde gshegs mgon dang phrad pas na// phyin chad bdag ni dud 'gros 'jigs med pa// sangs rgyas la ni
70a2(mdo sde): dad pa gting zug pa// deng rnyed u dum para'i me tog bzhin// rab 'jigs yi dwags 'gro ba yongs spangs shing // lha min skye bo'i sa bon mi bzod bcom// de bzhin gshegs 'byung dkon dang
70a3(mdo sde): de phrad pa// khab kyi rtse mor yungs 'bru chags pa bzhin// de la pha rol phyin mchog sbyin phul bas// rtag tu lha yi 'gro bar 'phar bar gyur// chu gnas pad+ma chus mi chags pa ltar// drang song chen
70a4(mdo sde): po 'jig rten chos rnams kyis// chags med phrad pas sring rtse'i sa bon kun// drung sa phyung bdag ni 'khor ba'i mtsho chen rgal/ rgya mtsho'i nang gi ru sbal zhar ba'i 'grin// gnya' shing
70a5(mdo sde): dmig tu chung dka' 'dra ba las// bde gshegs deng phrad de la sbyin pa phul// de nas bang gis nyon mongs gsog kun/ bcom// lha rnams kyis ni zhal zas bzangs po dag
70a6(mdo sde): phul yang bde gshegs ma bzhes bdag las ni// a ran de'i me tog 'dra ba zhes des// bdag ni 'jig rten rab mchog dal yon can// tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs 'jig rten 'di/ 
70a7(mdo sde): thams cad lhags to gus par bdag la mchod// khyu mchog gnas son pa gang yin 'di// skye ba 'di nyid la ni bdag gis thob// de nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
70a8(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// mgon khyod mya ngan 'da' ba mthong nas ni// 'jig rten 'di kun sdug bsngal gzir bar gyur// dbang med kyi hud ces ni skad tshar bla// 'di dag mdor rtag tu
70b1(mdo sde): sras bzhin gzigs/ lhun po'i gser gyi rtse mo rab mtho ba/ mtsho chen dbus na mdzes par gnas pa ltar/ chos kyi mnga' bdag khyod na chos ston cing // dge 'dun dusu mdzes par/ 
70b2(mdo sde): bzhugasu gsol// ji ltar nyi ma gzi can shar ba na// 'od zer dag gis sbyin srabasel ba ltar// drang srong chen po yis sgron chen gyis// skye bo mang po'i mya ngan dang bsal mdzod tshe ni 'di dag
70b3(mdo sde): dud mos mig skrangs shing // sdug bsngal gcig pu'i rgya mtsho'i ting du zhugs// de phyir dang nga rnyed dka' bskyed mdzad cing // 'di rnams sdug bsngal chod la yun du bzhugs// de nas/ 
70b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la bka' stsal pa// skul byed de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni u dum bai re'i me tog bzhin du shin tu rnyed par
70b5(mdo sde): dka'o// dad pa yang rnyed par dka'o// chos thos pa yang rnying parang ka'o// de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'o/ tshe/ zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dun
70b6(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa yang rnyed par dka'o// skul byed gzhan yang khyod ma du mya ngan ma byed par bad gis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs
70b7(mdo sde): pa thebo snyam du dga' ba bskyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan 'das bzhug su gsol zhes de skadadu khyod gsol ba ma 'debs shig/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi de kho na nyid
70b8(mdo sde): la rtog shig/ mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug par gyis shig/ 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas// tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// tshe ni gshin tu ring
71a1(mdo sde): / yang 'jig par 'gyur// 'dir ni thams cad nges par mchi bar 'gyur// 'tshe ba'i 'jig rten 'jigs pa'i chos can yin// 'byor pa thams cad rgod par gzhol bar 'gyur
71a2(mdo sde): rtag tu lang tsho rga bas nges par 'joms// gzugs bzang nad med rad kyi 'jigs par 'gyur// srog ni 'chi bas rtsa nas 'byin par byed// 'jig rten kun na rtag pa ci yang med// dbang phyug
71a3(mdo sde): mi rtag che yang mi rtag ste// kye ba'i sdug bsngal 'khor lor rtag tu 'khor// 'jig rten gsum na brtan po su yang med// srid pa dag na 'gro kun gsog tu 'dug/ srid pa 'jigs pa'i chos
71a4(mdo sde): can rab g.yo ba// 'di dag na ni bde ba ci yang med// rga dang 'chi dang / na dang rgud rnams kyi// 'jigs pas rtag tu kun nas gtse bar byed// srid pa mtha' med mi brtan snying po med// thad
71a5(mdo sde): dgra dang khur bar shes par gyis// de na 'khor zhing / na mongs dra ba yis// 'jig rten dkris te/ dar gyi srin bu tha zhin// 'jig rten dag na ther zug gnod pa'i gzhi// rtag tu
71a6(mdo sde): 'bras ltar sdug bsngal 'brel pa gang // mi btsang lus dang 'dod pa de dag la// phan 'dod sdug bsngal bsal 'dod su zhig dga'// mi rtag 'dod pa rnams la chags pa med// tshul
71a7(mdo sde): bzhin rtog pas 'dod chags 'bral bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag mthong na 'dod chags bral// de dag spangs bcang grol ba nyid du 'gyur// nga ni srid pa'i chu chen legs par rgal/ 
71a8(mdo sde): nga ni sdug bsngal rnams 'das bde bar zhugs// de phyir ngas ni mtha' yas spros med pa// chags pa kun bstsal thar bar thob par gyur// nga la rga dang na dang 'chi ba med// nga la rtag
71b1(mdo sde): tu tshe yang pad+ma med// nga ni me ltar 'bar te 'gro 'gyur gyis// khyod kyis nga ni med 'gyur ma sems shig/ de bzhin gshegs nyid lhun po 'dra bar ltos// nga deng yang dag mya ngan 'da'
71b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// bdu mchog de ni nga yi chos nyid// rgyal rnams spyod yul len gyis khyod ma du// de nas bcom ldan 'das la mgar ba'i bu skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
71b3(mdo sde): de ni de lag so// de ni de lag ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni bdegs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags nas sbrang bu dang 'dra ba'i sems can theg pa dman pa gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 
71b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kye ma bdag deng du/ byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog skal pa chen po dang ldan pa mchod par 'os pa/ 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa las sogs pa dang / zag pa
71b5(mdo sde): zad pa rnams/ dang mnyam pa nyi du gyur to// bcom ldan ngas dper gsol na/ gsar du bsnyen par rdzogs pa gzhon du yang rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi nyen par nas/ dge 'dun nang na dge
71b6(mdo sde): 'dun 'grang zhing / yang dag par 'dus par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi grangasu gtogs shing / yang nga/ 
71b7(mdo sde): bar 'dus lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun tu bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/ kha zas tshig pa bzhin mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa ni mi 'tshal lag so// de nA
71b8(mdo sde): de'i tshe/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas// mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras// skul byed khyod 'di skad du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun tu zhugs par 'tshal gyi kha zas tshig
72a1(mdo sde): / pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa ni mi 'tsha'o// zhes de skad ma zer cig 'du byed kyi rang bzhin blta bar bya mod// de ltar lta ba gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid sgom pa
72a2(mdo sde): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur // dam pa'i chos 'dod pas ni de ltar brlab par bya'o// skul byed kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'jam dpal 'o na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang lha yi mchog tu gyur/ 
72a3(mdo sde): gal te 'du byed gyur na/ lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yi no// 'du byed rnams ni chu lta bur shes shing / shing rti'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor ba yin no// lha rnams ni mchog tu tshe ring zhes grags la de
72a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas ni/ lo brgya yang mthub ste/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no// dper na mi la la zhig grong dpon byed las de mthar gyis dbang phyug chen por
72a5(mdo sde): gyur nas// blon po chen po'i dbang phyug las kyang 'das te/ rang gi dbang phyug gi 'bras bu chos kyis rnyed pa la long sprod pa las// de'i phyir yang bsod nams zad cing / dbang phyug las
72a6(mdo sde): nyams par gyur na/ gzhan gyis bkol zhing brnyas par 'gyur pa/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbul por gyur pa'i phyir ro// de dang 'dra bar gal te de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur tu zin
72a7(mdo sde): ma 'chi ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir/ lha yi yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no// btsun pa 'jam dpal de bas na/ lha'i yang lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la
72a8(mdo sde): de ltar 'du byed dang 'dra bar ma lta shig/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang ci khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du rtog par byed dam/ 'on te ma shes pas rtog par byed/ gal tede
72b1(mdo sde): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed dang 'dra ba ni/ 'jig rten gsum po dag na/ chos kyi dbang phyug brnyes pa/ lha'i yang lnga mdzad pa'i 'os ma yin no// dper na rgyal po'i dbang po
72b2(mdo sde): la la zhig la/ gyang stong gi mchog tu gyur pa'i gyad cig la/ de gyad thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i phyir/ gyang stong thub ces bya ba'i ming thob ste/ de la gyang zla med pa'i phyir blangs nas/ dbang
72b3(mdo sde): thang chen po 'grub na/ ci gyang stong thub pa de'i ming de thos na skad grags pa de mi bden pa yin nam 'on te yon tan yod na ni// yon tan can gyi ming thob pa yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin
72b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa yang nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang / phung po'i bdud dang / lha'i bu'i bdud dang / rang bzhin gyi bdud/ kyi gyad thams cad bcom pas na/ gyad stong thub bzhin
72b5(mdo sde): du yang dag pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas/ 'jig rten gsum po dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yin gyis/ btsun pa 'jam
72b6(mdo sde): dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed de dang 'dra bar yongasu ma rtog shig/ dper na la la zhig phyug cing nor mang ba'i rigasu skye ba blangs la tshe thung bar 'gyur ba zhig ste/ 
72b7(mdo sde): de skar mkhan dag gis mthong nas/ khye'u 'do na tshe thung ngo zhes bstan te// de'i pha mas de skad thos na/ 'di ni bdag cag gi khyim du phan par 'gyur ba ma yin no snyam nas/ grangasu yang ma
72b8(mdo sde): rtsi zhing de la byams par mi byed do// de ltar skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ lha 'am/ tshangs pa yang rung ste/ gang tshe thung ba de la khyad du gsod par 'gyur na/ gal te de bzhin gshegs
73a1(mdo sde): // pa chos 'ba' shig la yang dag par gzhol ba nyid 'du byed du 'gyur du zin na/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi brnyas par 'gyuraro// chos thams cad kyi nang na ni phyir/ 
73a2(mdo sde): ltung ba med cing zad pa med pa la thar pa zhes bshad na/ gal te de ltar gyur na don med par 'gyur gyis/ btsun pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur ces de
73a3(mdo sde): skad ma gsung shig/ dper na bud med gno nu dbul mo bkren pa/ mgon med pa/ nad kyis thebs pa/ sdum pas nyen pa zhig mgon med khang pa zhig tu song ba las/ bud med de bu
73a4(mdo sde): byung nas/ de na snga nas gnas pa gzhan dag gis de'i nang nas bskrad de/ nyon mongs ma de bu bcos ma thag/ tu byis pa kha mar khyer nas/ lo legs pa'i yul zhig
73a5(mdo sde): chas te song ba las lam du sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyo mtshan dang / sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas nyen par gyur to// gang+gA'i klung chen po rgal bar 'dod pa
73a6(mdo sde): las/ ngas rgal ma nus te/ khye'u de khyer ba nan du gang+gA'i nang du shi nas/ de bu de la byams pa'o bsod nams kyi khyad par gyis/ lus dang bral te/ shi ba'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'chi
73a7(mdo sde): rten du skyes te/ byams pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par ji lta bu zhig gis skyes she na/ bdag ni shi yang bla'i// khye'u 'di nye na med par thar par bya'o// snyam pa'i bsod nams kyi
73a8(mdo sde): khyad par gyis pa de bzhin du btsun pa 'jam dpal skyes bu dam pa/ dam pa'i chos 'byung bar 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur par blta bar mi zhing / 'du
73b1(mdo sde): shes kyang bsgyur bar mi bya'o// gal te de lta bu'i mig lus la med na yang / bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo snyam du yang dag pa'i lta ba can du bya'o// sems can thams cad la
73b2(mdo sde): phan pa'i gdam ngag bstan pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa yin no zhes bstan par bya'o// dam pa'i chos 'byin par byed pas ni ji ltar bud med gzhon dbul mos/ gang+gA'i klu
73b3(mdo sde): las bu bsgral ba'i phyir/ rang gi srog dang bsngos te/ 'bad pa de bzhin du bya'o// dam pa'i chos 'byung ba'i thabs bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// snyam du sems/ 
73b4(mdo sde): bskyed par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma bya/ ngas par mthong na/ bdag nyid kyi don du bya ba'i thar pa'i don rtogs par 'gyu ro// btsun pa 'jam dpal dper na dper na mo la la
73b5(mdo sde): zhig lam du 'gro bas dub par gyur te/ khyim gyi na dunyul ba las// de'i tshe khyim de thog thag nas me chen por 'bar te/ mi de mes tshig pa na/ de ni srog med zin no snyam nas
73b6(mdo sde): ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / ldan pas/ bdag nyid gos kyi dam du dkris te/ sems dran pa dang ldan pa bzhin du shrI nas/ de ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod par sems pa'i bsod nam
73b7(mdo sde): kyi 'bras bus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rgyal srid ni lan brgyad cus byas/ tshanges pa'i rgyal srid ni lan 'bum byas// mi'i 'jig rten du yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lan du ma
73b8(mdo sde): byas te/ ngan song rnams su yang mi skye la lan mang du bde ba cig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'ba' shig thob pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal khyod skyes bu dam pa de ltar mdzes par gyis shes/ 
74a1(mdo sde): ngo tsha shes par gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi thabs la 'jug pa spyod du ma nugs shig/ dge slong tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus
74a2(mdo sde): ma byas la de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas pa yin no// zhes pa bas ni mu stegs par gyur te shi yang bla'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas yin bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus
74a3(mdo sde): byas yin zhes zer ba gang yin pa de dag ni brdzun du smra ba yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin no zhes zer ba rnams ni/ rang gi khyim dang 'dra bar sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar
74a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// btsun pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas dang 'dra bar ma lta shig/ da phyin chad 'khor bar rgyu ba na mi shes pa las bzlas te/ bcom ldan 'das ni
74a5(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas pa'o snyam pa'i shes pa 'ba' shig rtog par/ gyis shig de ltar byas btang bsgom pa de'i 'bras bus/ khyod myur ba kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du/ 
74a6(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so// leg so leg so// tshe ring bar gyur cig/ 
74a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bus ni de ltar bya ba yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rtag dang / ther zug dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang / brtan par shes so// da ltar khyod kyis 'di kho na ltar/ 
74a8(mdo sde): 'dus byas khong rlag tu gtad pa'i sgo nas shes pa las na khyod kyang ring po mi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang de ltar 'u drug
74b1(mdo sde): gnyis kyis khyad du 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod do zhes phyis bsngags par 'gyur/ skul byed de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshos bskur cig/ sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na ni bdUr te/ 
74b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa mchog yin no// de la bdUr te/ sbyin zhes bya ba ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sa bon las myu gu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ gang gi tshe dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma
74b3(mdo sde): 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma yang rung ste/ don 'ga' zhig gi phyir lam du zhugs nas dub par gyur pa de dag la ci yod pa dang / de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa dang / brtag pa'i sbyin pa
74b4(mdo sde): byed pa ni/ brtur te sbyin pa zhes bya'o// skul byed de bzhin du/ khyod kyis ci yod pa las zhal zas kyi tha ma mang yang rung nyung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi
74b5(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyad par yod kyang rung khyad par ma da kyang rung ste/ 'drim du chug shig/ bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegasu nye'o// 
74b6(mdo sde): de nas skul byed kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'jam dpal khyod kha zas la chags sam ci na/ zhal zas mang yang rung nyung yang rung dri mas shig ces bdag gi gzhan 'debs par byed/ 
74b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa mdzad mdzad na/ cing skad cig tsam yang bzhes mi spyod dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin te/ zhal zas kyi sku ma
74b8(mdo sde): yin na/ ci bcom ldan 'das zhal zas gsol la ma// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal skul byed kyis ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhin no// skul byed legs/ 
75a1(mdo sde): leg so// khyod ni theg pa chen po la shes rab che ba'o// khyod ni theg pa chen po la shed bye ba'o// 'jam dpal gyis kyang 'di skad ces smra so// gal te de ltar bzhed par
75a2(mdo sde): gyur na// de bzhin gshegs pa sku tshe ring bar shog shig/ skul byed kyis smras pa/ ci bdag 'ba' shig la bcom ldan 'das mnyes sam/ 'od te sems can thams cad la yang mnyes/ 
75a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das lta khyod dang bdag dang sems can thams cad la yang mi mnyes so// skul byed kyis smras pa/ de skad ma zer cig/ gang la mgu ba yang yod pa
75a4(mdo sde): de la ni phyin ci log gi 'du shes yod de// 'u bu cag ni de la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mnyes pa 'am/ dgyes pa med do// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni// ba be'u
75a5(mdo sde): la byams pa'i phyir rtsa zos shing zos shing / grong nyid du 'ong ba de lta bu'i byams pa dang ldan pa ma yin gyis sems na thams cad la yang sgra can zin dang 'dra bar gzigs te
75a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi shes rab kyi yul ni de lta bu yin no// btsun pa 'jam dpal dper na/ rta cang shes dang sbyar ba'i shing rta rgyug pa'i zla la bong bu'i shing rta rgyug pa mi srid pa de bzhin du/ 
75a7(mdo sde): 'u bu cag bong bu'i shing rta dang 'dra ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang / 'dri ba dang / dgongs pa'i tshig dang / mnyam du 'gro bar nus re skan// dper na nam mkha'
75a8(mdo sde): lding dpag tshad du mar 'gro ba na mkha' la gnas pas/ chu'i nang nanya dang ru sbal 'khod pa rnams me long gi ngos la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du gsal bar mthong yang
75b1(mdo sde): byis pa rnams kyis ni mig mi gsal ba'i phyir/ de'i mig gi rtsal brjod par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang de dang 'dra'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ skul byed/ 
75b2(mdo sde): de ni de bzhin te/ bdagis ni 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa'i lus la phog go// de nas 'jam dpal gyis de brgal bar mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer rnam
75b3(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs kyi nas/ de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa'i lus la phog go// de nas 'jam dpal gyis de rtogs/ mgar ba'i bu skul byed la smras pa/ skul byed de bzhin gshegs
75b4(mdo sde): pa yongs mya ngan las 'da' bar rings kyis/ dus su bcom ldan 'das la bshos 'drim chung ngu chug shig/ ma thogs shig/ rgyu med par bcom ldan 'das zhal nas/ 'od zer rnams
75b5(mdo sde): 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// de nas skul byed cang mi zer bar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skul byed nga yongasu mya ngan las
75b6(mdo sde): 'da' bar 'gror nya dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus su zas 'drim du chug ces lan gnyis lan gsum du/ ka' stsal to// de nas skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
75b7(mdo sde): kye ma bcom ldan 'das mi bzhugs nini/ 'jig rten stong par 'gyuraro// bdag cag thams cad kyis ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
75b8(mdo sde): grul byed la 'di gad ces paka'i yul to// rdul byed ma ju shig / de ltar lus la mam 'byin cig/ mi'i lus chu shing bzhin du snying po med par rtags shig/ sdigs rgyu dag chu
76a1(mdo sde): / brdos dang / sgyu ma dang / rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod dang / klog lta bur khong du chud par gyis shig/ 'dus byas ni nyes pa grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// snyam du/ 
76a2(mdo sde): shes par gyis shig/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin la ltos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dang sems can thams
76a3(mdo sde): cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugasu mi gnang na/ bdag ci'i slad du mi du lags/ 'jig rten stongs kyis ma mchis so// de nas bcom ldan
76a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to//  ni khyod la snying brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar
76a5(mdo sde): byed/ 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi chos nyid do// 'du byed thams cad mi rtag/ go// zhes bya ba'i tshig su bcad par khong du chud par gyis
76a6(mdo sde): shig/ chos thams cad ni 'du byed dang / 'dres pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o// snyam du rtogs shig/ chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o snyam du spyod cig/ mi brtan pa brnyan pa/ 
76a7(mdo sde): phyin ci log pa'o snyam du soms shig/ lus 'di ni nyes dmigs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o// snyam du shes par gyis shig/ 'di ni dbul ba dang 'dra bar ltos la ma ngu shig/ 
76a8(mdo sde): ma chad cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin du 'jal lags na ha cang sdug bsngal chen po mi bzod la gso/ 
76b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das thabs kyi yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pa ni/ bdag blo la rangs lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skul byed legaso leg so// rigs kyi bu
76b2(mdo sde): pir mya ngan las 'das pa/ thabs de ltar blta bar bya'o// skul byed sangs rgyas gshegs pa ni/ bya gzhad gzas la 'gro ba lta bur shes par gyis shig/ skul byed tshe ring ba dang / 
76b3(mdo sde): tshe rang ba ma yin pa'i rtags shes par gyis shig/ skul byed chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i chos can no// de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad la thabs kyis chos can la de rnam
76b4(mdo sde): kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ba de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rang bzhin no// skul byed khyod srid pa'i rgya mtsho la nges par rgal bar bya ba'i phyir/ zhal zas bcu
76b5(mdo sde): te 'on cig/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / mi rnams kyis/ kyang ngal rang rang gi mchod pa byas nas/ mi g.yo ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ khyod kyis snod du gyur pa las dus
76b6(mdo sde): su sbyin par gyis shig/ ma thogs shig/ smod du gyur pa dang / nga dang de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni don tha dad pa ma yin no// de nas skul byed kyis kyang sems can thams cad la
76b7(mdo sde): nges por bsgral ba'i phyir// mgo smad de mchi ma blags nas/ gsol pa legaso leg so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du bang gis bgyi'o// de bzhin ga sh+ye
76b8(mdo sde): pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu ji ltar blta ba de ni/ bdag cag sbrang bu dang / 'dra ba rnams kyi yul yang ma lags/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang ma lag so// 
77a1(mdo sde): / zhes gsol to// de nas mya ngan byed cing ngu bzhin du/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ mchod pa chen po'i las byas nas/ bcom ldan
77a2(mdo sde): 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal te// zhal zas len du song ngo // / 'phags pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo las
77a3(mdo sde): bam po gsum pa/ de nas de'i tshe sa chen po g.yos rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ 'khor rab tu 'khor/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig
77a4(mdo sde): rab tu shig shig/ mer mer rab tu mer mer/ ldem ldem rab tu ldem ldem mo// de la sogs pa byas te/ mi mkhris pa'i nad kyis brgyal ba'i gnod pas thebs pa bzhin du/ sa chen
77a5(mdo sde): be 'di rgya mtsho dug can pa'i mthas gtugs pa/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chang thog thag tu rab tu g.yos so// de na sa lha dang lha ma yin dang mi de dag thams cad mgo
77a6(mdo sde): rmongs te/ 'jig shing skyi bung zhes byas nas/ ngu bzhin du tshig mthun par tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// mgon po khyod la bdag cag rnams// mgo bos phyag 'tshal gsol
77a7(mdo sde): ba 'debs// rgyal ba khyu mchog khyod dang ni// bral na bdag cag mgon med 'gyur// deng khyod mya ngan 'da' 'gyur 'di bsams na// bdag cag sdug bsngal shin tu gting zab bying / 
77a8(mdo sde): thub pa bdag cag snying ni ster bar 'gyural// ba gnon rkun mkhyer be'u la chags pa bzhin// mgon med dbul po'i mi ni la la zhig/ nad kyis thebs la sman pa med pa dang // rang dgar byed
77b1(mdo sde): cing kha zas gnod pa rnams// za ba ji ltar mchi bar 'gyur ba bzhin// skye bo 'di dag nyon mongs nad kyis thebs// khyod med khyod kyi chos kyi gsol med pas// lta ba'i nyes pa byed 'drar
77b2(mdo sde): 'chi bar 'gyur// de bas phan phyir 'jig rten ma dor cig/ ji ltar grong khyer rgyal dang bral ba dang // dbul po rnams la mu ge byung ba dang // ji ltar dgon par skom gyis gdungs pa bzhin/ 
77b3(mdo sde): khyod 'das 'og tu bdag cag de 'drar 'gyur// sems can ces khyod mya ngan 'da' ba zhes pas// sa bzhi rab tu g.yos shing phyogs kyang 'tsho la// rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang rnam par
77b4(mdo sde): 'khrugs// bdag cag kun kyang sdug cing bsngal bar 'a/ gyur// drang song chen po dang khyod mya ngan las// 'das na nyi ma 'das la ltung yang dag/ rgya mtsho chen po dag
77b5(mdo sde): kyang bskam par 'gyur// bdag cag kun kyang deng du 'gu ma lags grangs// ji ltar stobs ldan mis ni sgo gseb nas// glang chen khyer te nang du 'dzul dgyid pa// shin
77b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs 'gyur ba de bzhin du// bdag cag thams cad rab tu nyon mongs gyur// ji ltar bu gcig 'gum par mi 'tshal bzhin// mya ngan khyod 'da' bdag cag de mi 'tshal// gal te
77b7(mdo sde): khyod ni mya ngan 'da' ba las// mi bzhed bdag cag thams cad phongs par 'gyur// khyod ni mya ngan 'das lam gshegs mthong bas// dud 'gro mang po'ang g.yar ngan cher bgyid na/ 
77b8(mdo sde): bdag cag ji ltar g.yang ngan mi 'tshal lags// bdag cag mchi la ma bzhin du mdor cig/ nyi ma 'char kar rang gi 'od gsal bas// mun nag rnam par bcom pa de bzhin du/ 
78a1(mdo sde): / 'phrul can khyod kyis sdug bsngal mun bsal te// dge 'dun dbus su ri rab bzhin du bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ rgyal po la la zhig gis bu sdug
78a2(mdo sde): cing phangs pa zhig mchis la/ des de ches lugs kyi bstan bcos bslabs nas/ 'di sod cig ces bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor
78a3(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i sras rnams kyang // yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed nas/ bkum gyis mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu ji lta ba de bzhin du bdag cag mi 'gum par/ bcom ldan
78a4(mdo sde): 'das de'i slad du yun ring du bzhugs gsol/ ji la la zhig gzhung gis rtsod pa'i bstan bcos la bsta na pa na/ skrag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod kyis skrag par
78a5(mdo sde): ma mdzad cig/ de kho ma nyid pakhyen bzhin du/ bang gcag sems can dmyal bar mchi bar ma mdzad cig/ dam pa'i chos bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis tshim par mdzad cing
78a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugasu gsol// ji ltar rgyal po'i brtson ror gnod pa'i las rnams kyis// dang por nyon mongs pa na/ la la zhig gis khyod cha ji lta bu zhig
78a7(mdo sde): myong zhes smra na/ des de la smras pa de ni de bzhin te/ gang gi tshe bdag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba las thar par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/ bde ba nyam su myong bar
78a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro zhes mchi ma de bzhin du bdag cag thams cad kyang khyod bzhugs na/ rgyal po'i btson ra nas thar pa bzhin du/ mya ngan las 'das pa lags na/ de'i slad du de bzhin
78b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs gsol// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ sman pa tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyangad pa la mkhas pa/ bdag gi pu la ni rgyud phyi ma slob par bgyid kyi/ slang
78b2(mdo sde): bar bamed slob ma la ni bdag dang mnyams par 'gyur du dog nas/ slob par mi bgyid pa de bzhin du/ chos kyi rgyal po sman pa chen po ser sna mi mnga' ba khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i
78b3(mdo sde): rgyud phyi ma la de ltar mi mdzad par bcom ldan 'das yun rang du bzhugs su gsol// de bzhin du shing rta'i rig byed la mkhas pas bad gi bu la ni rgyud phyi ma sgra grags par phog pa'i
78b4(mdo sde): dpyad thams cad slob par bgyid kyi/ slob ma la ni slob par mi bgyid pa dang / rig pa'i gnas gzhan dag la ya rang de bzhin du sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ 
78b5(mdo sde): byis pa 'am/ rgan po 'am nad pa la la zhig/ lam bzang po las gos te/ lam ngan par mchis na/ shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das
78b6(mdo sde): sems can lam ngan par mchis pa rnams/ lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba rnamasu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das la ma ston pa yun ri
78b7(mdo sde): du bzhug su gsol// ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la yang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
78b8(mdo sde): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyod lnga dang mi rnams ltar/ byis pa'i smre sngags 'don pa dag ma byed par brtson 'grus brtsoms shig/ de nas lha dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyis
79a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung blo gros dang / dran pa dang / de kho mnyid du 'gro ba thos nas/ ji ltar bu gcig la shi nas dur khrod du bor ba bzhin du de dag sdug bsngal
79a2(mdo sde): bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la tshig su bcang de bka' stsal pa/ khyod rnams nges par bder gyur cig/ mya ngan ma byed ma du shig/ 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi
79a3(mdo sde): chos/ thams cad mi sba 'khod par gyis// bag med par ni ma gnas par// bag yod par la dga' bar gyis// khyed stong pa dang / stong pa ma yin pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ skyab
79a4(mdo sde): dang skyabs ma yin pa dang / 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba 'am/ rten dang rten pa ma yin pa 'am/ theg zur dang ther thug ma yin pa 'am/ brtan pa dang brtan pa ma yin pa 'am/ sems can dang
79a5(mdo sde): sems can med pa 'am/ yang dag pa'am/ yang dag pa ma yi na pa 'am// bden pa dang bden pa ma yin pa 'am/ mya ngan la/ sa 'das pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa
79a6(mdo sde): 'am/ gsang ba dang gsang ba ma yin pa'am// gnyis dang gnyi su med pa 'am/ de bzhin du chos rnam pa du ma dag som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za ba ci dang ci yod pa de dang
79a7(mdo sde): de dag nus shig dang / thams cad gcang bar bya'o// bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang khyed la bstan par bya ste/ de'i 'og tu yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// dge slong dag sangs rgyas
79a8(mdo sde): 'byung ba brnyed par dka'o// mi lus thob pa rnyed par dka'o// ngal ba phun sum 'tshogs pa rnyed par dka'o// bzod pa dang / tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa ma zhig pa ma ral pa yang
79b1(mdo sde): shin tu dka'o// 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa thob pa ni gser gyi bye ma dang / u dum pa ri'i me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'o// dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ sa ni thams cad kyi sgo nas sem
79b2(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te/ de bzhin du de'i chos bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs gsang ba thar pa'i grong khyer gyi bdud rtsi'i zas kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// sems can thams
79b3(mdo sde): cad dr-ir sras// dge slong thams cad la dam pa'i chos mang po brtan por bzhag go// gzhan yang sems can la phan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan che ba nyid bsgrags te/ 
79b4(mdo sde): ge 'bru gcig pa'i thig le'i gtam yang bzhag nas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// de nas dge slong de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o zhes
79b5(mdo sde): thos nas/ mi dga' bar gyur to// spyi bung zhes byas nas/ mi ga mchi mas gang bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab sa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
79b6(mdo sde): la lan mang du bskor ba byas na/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sdug bsngal ba dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / rjes thams cad kyi nang
79b7(mdo sde): na glang po che'i rjes ches mchog yin par brtan to// zhes gsungs te/ de ltar mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyid pas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad
79b8(mdo sde): zad par 'gyur// gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur// gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur// ma rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ 
80a1(mdo sde): lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus par yang dag par chad par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ sten gyi dus su zhing pas smos btab
80a2(mdo sde): rtsa ba rdzings pa thams cad sel bar 'gyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa'i 'du shes brten cing bsgom te/ mang du bgyis pas/ 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ 
80a3(mdo sde): gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ ma rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams
80a4(mdo sde): cang ma lus par yang dag par zad par 'gyur ro// zhing las thams cad kyi nang na ni ston gyi zhing blas mchog tu ba stan to// zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ glang po che'i rjes lta
80a5(mdo sde): buM'i mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// bco ma ldan 'das dper gsol na/ rgyal po 'chi ba'i tshe/ bad ga gi brtson rar gsal te/ sems can rnams brtson rang
80a6(mdo sde): gnod pas nyon mongs pa las thar par bgyis nas/ de'i 'og tu 'chi bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis kyang / sems can mi rnams pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi btson rang
80a7(mdo sde): brubs pa rnams kyi mi shes pa'i 'ching ba rnams bcad nas// de'i 'og tu yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegasu gsol// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dper gsol na/ sems can
80a8(mdo sde): 'byung po dang / sha za ba'i gdon gyis brlams pa las sman chen po dang phrad na 'byung po dang / sha za'i gdon rnams kyis thebs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du// khyod
80b1(mdo sde): dang 'jal mnyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'byung ba dang sha za'i gdon rnams las yongasu thar par 'gyur la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid khong du
80b2(mdo sde): rgung par bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ glang po che'i 'dul sbyong gi mkhan pos/ spos kyi glang po che zhags pa chen pos bcings pa las/ glang po ches zhags pa de bcang
80b3(mdo sde): de bros pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang / bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog dang / dang na then dang / ser sna dang / g.yo'i zhags pa chen po bcad nas
80b4(mdo sde): glang po tsho'i 'dul sbyong gi mkhan po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lag tu 'ongs nas/ sems can thams cad las dang nyon mongs po'i glang po lnga bcu rtsa bdun yongasu bsal
80b5(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ grang ba 'i rims kyi theg pa sman pa chen po'i thang du mchis na/ sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du
80b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang nyon mongs pa dang / log par lta ba dang / log pa'i 'tshe ba nyes dmigs mtha' yas pa'i grang ba'i rims nad can gyi lus dang ldan pa las/ sman pa
80b7(mdo sde): chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi bad du mchis nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par thar par gyur te/ mi g.yo ba'i bde ba yang thob lag so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dper gsol
80b8(mdo sde): na mi zhig gis 'bras skyems 'tshal to// ra ro bar gyur nas/ bdag nyid kyis kyang bdag nyid ma 'tshal te/ chos kyang ma 'chal/ chos ma lags pa yang ma 'tshal/ 'di ni bdagi ma'o// 
81a1(mdo sde): 'di ni bdag gi srin me'o// 'di ni bdag gi bu me'o// snyam du yang ma 'tshal lo// snang cing bla ste/ phyis dang gcin gyis rang gi lus kun bsgres shing mchis pa las/ de'i
81a2(mdo sde): 'og tu bdag cing sangs te/ gzhi ci las gyur pa la mkhas par gyur nas// chang ni cir yang mi rung ngo // snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sdig pa thams cad las thar to snyam nas/ chang 'thung ba
81a3(mdo sde): cir yang mi rung bar shas cher bsgoms te/ spong bar bgyid pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'di ni/ zlos gar mkhan bzhin du/ thog ma ma mchis pa nas/ 'khor ba na
81a4(mdo sde): 'khor zhing yongasu 'khyam pa na/ 'di ni bdag gi ma'o// 'di ni bdag gi sring mo'o// 'di ni bdag gi bu mo'o snyam du 'a tshal nas/ ma dang sring mo dang bu mo rnams dang / lhan cig tu 'dod
81a5(mdo sde): pa'i 'du shes spyod par bgyid de/ 'bras skyems kyis ra ro bar gyur pa de bzhin du sdug bsngal rnyed par 'gyur la/ de nas ngo tsha shes pa'i mi de dag/ 'bras skyems kyisar ro/ 
81a6(mdo sde): las bsangs po bzhin du cir yang mi rung bar shas cher sgoms nas// sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang e ran da la ni snying po ma mchis mi srid
81a7(mdo sde): ba bzhin du/ lus 'di la yang bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po mchis mi srid de/ de lta bur bdag cag gis bdag
81a8(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te/ mang du bgyis lag so// dper gsol na/ phub ma skon pa bye ma rnyeng bor ba ni cir yang mi gces pa de bzhin du/ lus 'di yang bdag ma mchis so
81b1(mdo sde): dper gsol ma kha sral gyi me tog la dri gda' ba ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ lus 'di la yang bdag ma mchis te/ de ltar bdag gis bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te/ mang du
81b2(mdo sde): bgyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / dge slong dag chos thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/ de ltar bsgoms shig dang / de ltar bsgoms pa rnams kyis bdag tu 'dzin pa spong bar
81b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// bdag tu 'dzin pa yongasu spangs nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad
81b4(mdo sde): bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te/ mang du bgyis lags so// gzhan yang ji ltar na mkha' la bya'i rjes gda' ba ni mi srid pa de bzhin du/ bdag ma mchis
81b5(mdo sde): ba'i 'du shes bsgoms ni lnga po'i rnam pa thams kyi nga dang bral bar 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'ad kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ bskam pa de ltar brnam pa khyod kyi gis
81b6(mdo sde): sam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal dang mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes de ma lags par bsgoms na ni/ ji ltar mi ra ro zhing 'khyam
81b7(mdo sde): pas lha khang dang / spos dang / sa gzhi dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / shing dang / ri rnam mi 'khor bzhin du 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du/ gang dag gis sdug bsngal dang / mi rtag pa dang / 
81b8(mdo sde): bdag med pa'i 'du shes ma bsgoms pa'i sems can 'jig rten pa de dag ni/ ra ro ba 'dra bar lta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni yang dag par bsgoms lags so// 
82a1(mdo sde): // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgra ni dpe 'di'i don ngas bshad par bya'o// khyed kyis tshigasu bcad pa'i don 'di gdon 'di'o// yi ge ni nga
82a2(mdo sde): zhes gsal bar mi shes te/ ji ltar mi ra ro bas// lha khang dang / spos dang / sa gzhi dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / shing dang / ri rnams mi 'khor bzhin du/ 'khor bar mthong ba de
82a3(mdo sde): bzhin du// 'du shes byin mi lag dums zin cing / kun tu rmongs pa rnam dag gi sus pa dang / rtag gi snyam pa dang / bde'i snyam pa dang / sdug snyam pa'i 'du shes kun tu spyong
82a4(mdo sde): de la bdag cag ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i don to// rtag ces bya ba ni chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to// bde zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to// sdug
82a5(mdo sde): ces bya ba ni chos kyi tshig bla dwag so// dge slong dag khyed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni sdug bsngal dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes
82a6(mdo sde): bsgoms/ lag so// zhes rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis dregs par ma byed cig/ de ltar rnam pa gsum bsgom par gyur na ni/ ngi'i bstan pa la/ khyed kyis bsgom pa rnam pa gsuM
82a7(mdo sde): bsgoms pa de/ bsgom pa don med par 'gyuro// sdug bsngal shes par bya ba sgom pa rnam pa gsum ni/ khyad par dang // khyad par gyis yang khyad par ro// sdug bsngal ba bde'o snyam
82a8(mdo sde): du 'du shes pa ni/ phyin ci log pa'o// bde ba la sdug bsngal lo snyam du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam du shes pa ni phyin ci log go// rtag pa la mi rtag
82b1(mdo sde): pa'o snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// bdag yod pa la bdag med par 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// 
82b2(mdo sde): mi sdug pa sdug snyam 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// sdug kha la mi sdug snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa ste// phyin ci log bzhi po 'di dag yang dag par ma shes
82b3(mdo sde): bar khyed kyis bsgom par bya ba bsgoms te/ mang du byas// khyed kyis bde ba la sdug bsngal bar bsgom so// rtag pa la mi rtag pa dang / bdag yod pa la bdag med pa dang / sdug pa la
82b4(mdo sde): mi sdug par bsgom so// 'jig rten rnams la yang bde ba dang bdag dang / rtag pa dang / sdug pa rnams yod/ do// 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams/ bde ba dang / 
82b5(mdo sde): bdag dang / rtag pa dang / sdug pa rnams yod do// 'di la phan tshun mi mthun pa yod do// yi ge zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go// don ces bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das
82b6(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'du shes bzhi la sogs pa phyin ci log de bzhin gshegs pas
82b7(mdo sde): lugasu bzhag pa rnams ni/ bdag cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas/ mthong yang mthong / bsgoms kyang bsgoms lags na/ da ji ltar 'tshal ba bka' stsal du gsol// de bzhin
82b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang bzhug su gsol// de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang ji skad du bka' stsal pa/ de dang de bzhin du bdag cag gis bgyi
83a1(mdo sde): bar 'tshal lo// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugasu mi gnang na/ bdag cag kyang sbrul gdugs pa dang / khyim cig gi nang du lhan cig tu mchis par mi
83a2(mdo sde): 'tshal te// de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/ tshangs par spyod cing mchis pa'i rngo mi thogs gis/ khyod nyid kyi slad bzhin du bdag cag kyang yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshalo// de nas
83a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong khyed de skad ma zer cig/ dge slong dag ngas 'od srung gi lag tu bstan pa gtad par bya ste// 'di ni de
83a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dge slong rnams kyi rte na lta bur 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams dang sems can rnams kyi skyabs lta bur 'gyur ro// dper na rgyal po grong khyer ma
83a5(mdo sde): po'i mnga' bdag grong khyer gcig tu song ste/ khyim pa ngag gcig rgyal por dbang skur ba de bzhin du 'jig rte na gyi khams 'dir ngas 'od srung chen po la dbang bskur
83a6(mdo sde): ro// dge slong dag khyed kyis sdug bsngal dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ dge slong dag dper na/ sos ka'i dus la bab pa ni/ skye
83a7(mdo sde): bo rnams kyis nags tshal gyi nang du chu bsgril te/ rang rang gi rgyal ba'i yo byad thogs nas/ chu'i nang du rtse bar byed la/ chu de'i nang du gcig gis nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya rigs dang / 
83a8(mdo sde): ldan pa zhig bzhag nas/ bai DUR+Ya de 'dong ba'i phyir/ de dag thams cad kyis rgyal ba rnams bor te/ chu de'i nang du 'dzul nas/ de'i nang na gyo mo 'am/ gseg ma ci yod pa bdag la nor
83b1(mdo sde): bu yin snyam ste/ blangs nas nor bu bdag gis rnyed do// bdag gi rnyed do// zhes zer cing / so so nas steng du byung ste/ rdzing gi 'gram du 'khod nas/ 'di ni nor bu ma yin no snyam pa'i
83b2(mdo sde): 'du shes skyes par gyur la/ rdzing de'i chu nang nor bu'i 'od kyis/ zla ba'i 'od bzhin mdzes par 'dug ste/ de dag gis mdzes pa de mthong nas/ e ma nor bu snyam du yon tan gyi 'du
83b3(mdo sde): shes skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi nang nas thangs la mkhas shing yid rno ba gcig gis nor bu de yang dag par rnyed pa de bzhin du dge slong dag khyed kyi thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o// 
83b4(mdo sde): thams cad bdag med pa'o// thams cad mi rtag pa'o// thams cad mi sdug pa'o// zhes thams cad kyi ma bzung nas/ snyoms shing mang du byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams
