245a4(mdo sde): lus dang sems bde bar gyur pa/ thugs brtse ba'i slang du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das nges 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu
245a5(mdo sde): legs par 'on la shin tu yid la legs parazung shig dang / khyed la dgrol bar bshad par bya'o// / 'di nas shar pogs leg su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba
245a6(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol ma sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
245a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rangasu ldan pa dade bar gshegs pa/ 'jog rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ stan pa rgyal la sangs rgyas ba
245a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das shes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongasu bskor nas 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan brisapa pa'i mdo sde sngoran cing sems can thams cad la ngan
245b1(mdo sde): ba dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi log pa lta ba'i zug rngu rtsad nas 'den pa'i phyir/ sems theg ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub las phyir mi
245b2(mdo sde): ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
245b3(mdo sde): myur du mngon par byang chub cing / sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsal ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi drin ci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi
245b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir so so'i skye bo dag pa ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no// de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems
245b5(mdo sde): dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa/ stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te/ bla ges pags gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcu
245b6(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing / de bzhin gtsu
245b7(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa la mched pa dang / bkur sti bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gso
245b8(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas nges byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ sangs rgyas
246a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrang dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni
246a2(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka'ang spyad de/ snying rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces bta'o// gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ 'jig
246a3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri shang sheng dang / gyo mo dang / gsag ma la sogs pa yod ba'i gnasu sems can chen rengs pa dang bcas mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge bcu rdzo
246a4(mdo sde): pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/ pan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongasu bcwa da de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku
246a5(mdo sde): yongasu rdzogs shing lham ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces smon lam bta'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nges thog ma de skad ces smon lam
246a6(mdo sde): btab pas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten khoms der phyin nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas par bya'o zhes
246a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
246a8(mdo sde): de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sbed kyis yongasu bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi
246b1(mdo sde): khams gang dang gang du phyin par/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen po yang kun tu snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me to// 
246b2(mdo sde): mnang ra ba dang / mnang rab chen po yang char bzhin phab po// 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gad+hi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang
246b3(mdo sde): g.yos so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang lnga rdzas kyi rol mo tshang med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang lam dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya
246b4(mdo sde): rgod spungs pa'i ri la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lpags nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bkor ba byas nas phyogs
246b5(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod ngo do// de'i tshe de bzhin gags pa shAkya thub pas kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis byang phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya ba khrag
246b6(mdo sde): khrig lnga brgya 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang phyug grag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba snang bar byaso// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas pad mo leb rgan gyi
246b7(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
246b8(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas
247a1(mdo sde): kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing ga'i bai DUR+Ya las byas pa/ gser bcoms thig re'ur bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bsgred pa/ shing de dag kyang mnga'
247a2(mdo sde): rgyang gang tsam du mthe ba/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / mngab mas shin tu brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra de yang so so'i skye bos thos na
247a3(mdo sde): mi ngoms pa skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu yod pa yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongasu gang zhing rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye ma bdal pa rdzing
247a4(mdo sde): gi nges bzhi gsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad+ma dang / pun da ri ka dang / pa'i sha ka dang / de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rti
247a5(mdo sde): 'phang lo tsam chu'i steng yongasu khebs te chu 'i nang na ba sna tshogs yang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sA na pa 'byin to// rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las
247a6(mdo sde): byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems can mang po 'dod dgu rtse zhing longs spong ngo // rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na/ seng+ge'i khri mthe khyad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas
247a7(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/ lha rdzas kyi na bzas/ khri'i steng du rim par bting ga lnga rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gis chal par bkram pa'i khri'i thog
247a8(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo leb rgan gyi 'od chags pa/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas shing bzhugs pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdang / 
247b1(mdo sde): te/ thal me sbyar ba btung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po
247b2(mdo sde): dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po ldan pa rab tu gsal ba dper mi bzod pa 'di lho phyogs log nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/ gang la 'od kyis reg
247b3(mdo sde): bde dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar 'gyur ba/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan tu gsol// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal
247b4(mdo sde): to/ rigs kyi bu dag legs par nyon la yi ngal zung shig dang / khyed la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o// // 'di nas lho phyogs logasu 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba
247b5(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de nas sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
247b6(mdo sde): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten 'khyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ 
247b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongasu bskur nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing
247b8(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi zug rngubartsang nas 'don pa'i phyir/ sems theg ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag bya
248a1(mdo sde): chub las phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cang mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig la dgod pa'i phyir/ 
248a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing / sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyis drin ci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sam
248a3(mdo sde): can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir/ skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no// de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas byang
248a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs par gyur nas/ bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.ya
248a5(mdo sde): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi byi na gyis rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten
248a6(mdo sde): gyi khams der mchi zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i mdo
248a7(mdo sde): dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyi brlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed
248a8(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur bsti bya ba dang / shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i bya
248b1(mdo sde): zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad pas/ snying rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te
248b2(mdo sde): mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang / shang shong dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnasu sems can dag kyang nyen
248b3(mdo sde): mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spad pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don tu sdug bsngal thams
248b4(mdo sde): yongasu bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yongasu rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus dpa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab/ 
248b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas des thog ma de skad ces smon lam pa tab pas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas
248b6(mdo sde): nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar sems dpar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin du
248b7(mdo sde): bgyi'o zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongasu bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
248b8(mdo sde): khams gang na ba der song ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos te 'od zer chen po yang kun tu snang bar gyur
249a1(mdo sde): steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog pan dar ba dang / man rab chen po yang char bzhin du phab bo// 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing / rdzu
249a2(mdo sde): 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang g.yos so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol me tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang / steng gi bar snang la ma
249a3(mdo sde): dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang brgod spangs pa'i rig la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lpags nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsha
249a4(mdo sde): te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba bas pags gca ga tu 'khede de// de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi dang / steng dang 'og gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu nas
249a5(mdo sde): lhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis so so nas 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ mchod pa
249a6(mdo sde): dang / bkur bsti byas/ mchod pa byas nas/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshigasu bcad pa brgya stong snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la yongasu bstod do// de ltar sangs rgyas la
249a7(mdo sde): steng nas kyang phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yang yongasu dag par gyur te/ ri khrad khrid dang / ri chen po dang / chung ngu dang / rtsang po dang / chu
249a8(mdo sde): klung dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / steng ka dang / shang sheng dang / ngam grog dag med cing / de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/ sangs rgyas gang
249b1(mdo sde): na ba der lhags nas dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems kyis thal me sbyar ba btung nas/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mig mi 'dzum par chags pa'i yid kyis lta zhing ra 'khod do// de nas/ 
249b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer phyir 'dus par mdzad de/ 'od zer de dag gis sku la lan bdun bskor nas/ dbu'i spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa kun dga' bos
249b3(mdo sde): mthong nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad the tshom skyes par sems kyis rab tu shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thabs mkhas pa mngon par bstan pa dang / phyis ma 'ongs
249b4(mdo sde): pa'i skye bo dag gi shes rab kyi mig dbye ba dang / so so'i skye bo thams cad sred pa'i chu klung las rgal zhing pha rol tu phyin pas bde ba la dgod pa dang / so so'i skye bo dag pa ma dang
249b5(mdo sde): slob dpon dang bla ma'i drin lci ba dran zhing shes pa/ ra bya ba'i phyir bstan las langs nas/ gos chagasu bcos nas phyog/ sa gcig tu byas te/ pus mo sa la btsugs
249b6(mdo sde): nas thal mo sbar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bring na mchis na 'dzum pa
249b7(mdo sde): mdzad pa mthong ste/ 'di la nges par dgongs pa ni mnga' na/ 'khor mang po'i the tsom gyi dra ba gcad pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan tu gsol// sangs rgyas kyis
249b8(mdo sde): bshad du gsol// thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gcig go// 
250a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor mang po 'dus pa der rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i pad+mo'i sdong po dngul las byas/ 'dab ma ni gser las byas/ gzhi ni rin po che shel
250a2(mdo sde): las byas pa/ mu tig gi dra bas kun tu brgyan pa gcig de nyid nas byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas/ pad+mo de la skyil po krung
250a3(mdo sde): bcas nas bzhug so// de la bzhugs ma thag tu yongasu dag pa'i sku mngon par bstan to// sku de las lam rgyud lnga'i lus kyi tshogs bstan/ lus kyi tshogs re re la yang gzugs tha
250a4(mdo sde): dang pa rnams khri brgyad stong sreng bstan to// gzu gas rnam pa de re re yang sku'i tshogs bstan/ rdul phra rab kyi sku tshogs brgya stong snyed bstan/ sku'i tshogs de dag re
250a5(mdo sde): la yang gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshe gas sred bstan to// gang gi'i klung bzhi'i bye ma skad kyi sku 'tshogs de dag re re la yang gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi/ 
250a6(mdo sde): sku'i tshegs bstan rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan to// rdul phra rab
250a7(mdo sde): kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang phyogs bcur phyogs re rer yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhi dbye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshegs bstan nas/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi
250a8(mdo sde): bkrus pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed kyi sems can gyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstod do// de bzhin gshegs pas de snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs
250b1(mdo sde): mngon par bstan nas/ kun dga' bo dang phyogs nas 'dus shing tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka
250b2(mdo sde): stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag deng de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag pa'i tshig gang yin pa de bka' stsal par bya'o// chos la tshig tu bzod pa
250b3(mdo sde): med mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs mkhas pa'i dbang gis mtshan ma dang ming med pa'i chos la ming dang mtshan mar bstan par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni
250b4(mdo sde): thog mar skyes shing 'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi lus kyi cho ga sa rnam pa tha dad pa de dag thams cad rdzogs par myong ste/ de ltar
250b5(mdo sde): lus kyi tshogs de dag kun myong bas na/ sem sa can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha mar ma gyur pa med/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sems can gyi
250b6(mdo sde): ba mar ma gyur pa med de// pha mar gyur pa thams cad kyi phyir rgyun tu shin tu sprad dka' ba yang spyad/ shin tu gtang dka' ba'i yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang / mig dang / glang
250b7(mdo sde): rgyas dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang / chung ma dang / bu pheM dang / ban glang dang / rta dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta dang / theg pa dang / gos dang zas dang skom dang / mal cha dang
250b8(mdo sde): nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad gang yang ma btang ba med do// shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / sbyin pa byas dang / mang du
251a1(mdo sde): thos pa dang / bsam gtan bsgoms pa dang / shes rab spyod pa nas/ spyod pa bka' ba thams cad spyad de/ skyo ba dang ngal ba med cing rgyun mi 'chad par brjon
251a2(mdo sde): 'grus su 'bad pa yang pha ma la srid nu bya ba dang / drin shes pa dang / drin lon bsang po dang / sems can thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
251a3(mdo sde): dgod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yong su rdzogs par bya ba dang / de ltar na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin chen po yod par shes par
251a4(mdo sde): bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sems can yengasu mi gting ba dang / rtag par shin tu thabs mkhas pas khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar gan+da
251a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems can thams dang la bskal pa bsam gyi sa mi khyab pa'i bar du/ mnyam snyoms pa'i byams pa ba skems shing / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i thabs mkha
251a6(mdo sde): pa spyod de/ sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / chos stong pa nyid dang phung po lnga stong pa nyid du rtog shing phyir nub dang / mi 'byung ba dang / mi rgod pa stong pa nyid du
251a7(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la thabs mkhas pas bsgom par bya ba dang / theg pa gsum mi spong zhing chub par slob pa'i thabs mkhas pas/ shin tu zab mo'i spyod yul dam pa spang
251a8(mdo sde): pa la thabs mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu gsal bar rtogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thog ma dang tha ma'i bar du gcig ma yin par rtog mi shing
251b1(mdo sde): chung pas/ so so'i skye bo dag ni myos shing bslad pas/ gdung ba gsum gyis yongasu gdungs te/ sdug bsngal gyi mtshor nub par gyur to// phyin ci log bzhis bsgribs pas zag pa dang ba
251b2(mdo sde): pa'i chos la phyin ci log tu gyur to// mi bde bar kun tu rtog pas bdag red pa la bdag tu lta/ mi rtag pa la rtag par lta mi bde bar lta/ mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar lta zhing / skye ba dang / rga
251b3(mdo sde): ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi bas gzar te/ skad cig tu mi rtag pas bsgrubs pa lnga dang / kun nas klag pa bcas kun tu klags te/ srid pa gsum du 'khor zhing skye shi thog ma dang / tha ma med
251b4(mdo sde): pa myong bar gyur to// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang cir 'phrod pa bzhin sde snod gsum dang / mdo sdeng gu nas mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi bar du rnam par phye zhing
251b5(mdo sde): bstan te/ so so'i 'dod pa ba nar du mdo sde mang po gsu ngaso// tshig la chags pa kha cig bdag ni 'di kho nas chog ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob ces 'dzin pa yang yod // 
251b6(mdo sde): de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi thugs rje chen po'i sngon gyis shugs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na las 'thun pa thams cad bsduso// de ltar las 'thun pa
251b7(mdo sde): kun 'dus pas/ 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dam pa'i chos mdo sde gsungs par dgongs te/ gzugs brnyar gyi chos nam du yang rgyun mi 'chad cing // so so'i skye bo thams ca
251b8(mdo sde): bdeb chen po thob par mdzad do// de bas nang bzhin gshegs pa 'dul zhing ston pa yang dus las ri sol bar gshegs dus las mi sel ba mya ngan las 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi kha
252a1(mdo sde): kha cig tu de bzhir gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten
252a2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes grag so// skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnasu gshegs nas lha rnams kyi
252a3(mdo sde): ston pa mdzad do// skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas nas babs te/ 'dzam+bu'i gling du sku tshe lo brgyad cur bzhugs par yang ston to// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi
252a4(mdo sde): khyabo// 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// las rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyabo// se mas can yang bsam gyis mi khyabo// bsam gtan gyi tingange 'dzin
252a5(mdo sde): yang bsam gyis mi khya'o// klu'i mthu yang bas ma gyis mi khya'o// 'di na sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi thugs la dgod
252a6(mdo sde): pa shes par 'dod na// sems can dbang po zhan pa tha ma'i bar du yang kun shes par mdzad do// sems can thams cad las gang yang sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod na// de ma thag tu
252a7(mdo sde): mthong bar mdzad do// gal te mthong bar mi mdzad na// mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo // de bas na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag lha'i mig mngon par shes pa yod kyang mthong bar mi
252a8(mdo sde): nuso// de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyis 'od zer chen po bskyed nas// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad snang bar mdzad kyang
252b1(mdo sde): gang 'dul ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa ni mthong bar 'gyur/ gang skal pa dang mi ldan pa ni mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa skabs kha cig tu ni che du skul ba mdzad/ 
252b2(mdo sde): skabs gcig tu ni cang mi gsung bas na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyi mi khyab ste/ shin tu dpag par dka' ba// shin tu shes shing rtog par dka' na// ji ltar khyod
252b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la spyod pa dka' ba shin tu zab mo dri ba spobs par gyur/ khyod kyis zhus pa 'di ni yang dag par sems can thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba yin te/ na
252b4(mdo sde): 'gro gsum gyi lam bkag nas/ lha dang mi'i lam btod pa yi no// kun dga' bo ngas da khyod la pha ma la sri nu bya ba'i spyod dka' ba'i mdo tsam zhig bstan par byas// leg
252b5(mdo sde): par nyon la yid la zung shig/ bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis kun dka' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems/ dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces
252b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal lo// sngon byung ba bskal pa tshad med pa mtha' yas grangs med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na/ yul ba ra na ser sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs shes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
252b7(mdo sde): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa
252b8(mdo sde): rgyal ba/ 'jig rten gyi gtso bo lnga dang mi'i ston pa 'jig rten du byung // sangs rgyas de'i sku tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur bzhug so// dam pa'i chos kyang bskal pa chung
253a1(mdo sde): ngu 'i shur gan so// gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu rtsi shur gan so// gzugs brtan la chos spyod pa'i tshe/ mi'i rgyal po ra tsa zhes bya ba 'jig rten
253a2(mdo sde): du byung ste/ yul ba ra na sel dbang sgyu ro// rgyal po de la btsun mo ni nyi khri yod// blon po ni bzhi stong snyed yod do// bal gyi glang po che long lnga brgya yod/ rgyal phran drug cu la dbang / grong khyer
253a3(mdo sde): brgyad brgya zhig yod/ rgyal po de la bu gsum yod/ gsum car yang rgyal pran re byed do// de'i tshe de'i dus na yul bar na se'i rgyal po de mkhas pa'i shes rab dang ldan ste/ rtag
253a4(mdo sde): tu yang dam pa'i chos kyis yul gyi sring 'dzin pas// gang yang stams las chad ces bya ba med do// rgyal po'i bsod nams dang yon tan gyi mthus char chu dus las mi yol
253a5(mdo sde): te lo tog rgyun tu legs pas/ de na gnas pa'i mi rna mas kyang bde skyi // de'i tshe na ba ran so'i rgyal po de la blo na po chen po sgra gcan zhes bya ba zhig yod// blon po
253a6(mdo sde): sgra can rgyal po la 'khus nas/ dmag rnam bzhi bshams la 'di lta ste/ ban glang gi tshogs dang / shing rti'i tshogs dang / rti'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs bshams nas/ ba
253a7(mdo sde): ra na so'i rgyal po la brgal nas/ rgyal po'i srog ba // de ltar rgyal po bsad nas kyang dam ga tshogs rnam pa bzhi bkye nas/ mtha'i rgyal phran bu rab kyang bas // de nas rgyal bu
253a8(mdo sde): 'bring po yang phab nas/ mtha' rgyal phran rgyal bu tha chungs kyi thog tu dmag drang bsham so// rgyal bu tha chung de ngo mtshar du gzugs byang bzang la 'phags par mdzes shing rang
253b1(mdo sde): bzhin gyis dge ba dul ba 'dzum zhing smra ba/ smra'o cog kyang phan pa'i don tu smra zhing 'gyur gyi gnod pa med pa rtag tu drang po'i chos kyi yul gyi srid 'dzin te/ log pas mi 'tsho bas
253b2(mdo sde): yul mi rnams kyang bde bskyed la dar ba longs spyod dang nor ni rin po cher ldan pa/ bang mdzod gang ga rgyal po de'i yon tan la kun gyis sngags shing bstod ga bar snang gi lha
253b3(mdo sde): dang 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad kyis kyang dga' zhig bkur ba/ de'i tshe na rgyal po de la rgyal bu su sha de ba zhes bya ba gcig pu zhig yod/ shin tu yid gzhungs shing gsal ba/ 
253b4(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ lus kyi mdog ser du 'dug pa/ gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba/ skyes bu mtshan rdzogs par ldan pa/ lo bdun lon
253b5(mdo sde): pa zhig yod pa de la yang rgyal po yang shin tu byams shing sdug par sem so// de'i chen pho brang srung gi lba zhig rgyal po de la 'di skad ces smraso// rgyal po mkhyen tam blon po sgra
253b6(mdo sde): gcan 'alus nas yul sring phrogs te/ rgyal po yab kyang bkro ngas dam gi tshogs bzhi yang bkye nas rgyal po gcen gnyis kyang srog gi dbang po dang bral te/ dam gi tshogs rnams ring po mi
253b7(mdo sde): thogs par 'dir phyin na/ rgyal po ci'i phyir srog skyabs shing gud du mi 'gre/ de'i tshe na rgyal po nges 'di skad ces smras pa thos nas/ lus kyi ba spu kun zing zhes byed de/ lus
253b8(mdo sde): kyang 'angar nas yi mug cing mya ngan gyis sems gdungs te/ sa la 'gro zhing rgyal bar gyur nas ring zhig lon pa dang / cung zad sangs te/ dal gyis na mkha'i lha la 'di skad ces smras// 
254a1(mdo sde): 'di ltar smra ba'i skad ni yid la gzugs ni mi snang ba khyod ci yin/ smras pa'i tshig 'di yang dag par bden nam/ lhas smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba'i lnga
254a2(mdo sde): yin te/ rgyal po khyed shes pa dang ldan zhing bsod nams dang yon tan bcas pas/ drang po'i chos kyi yul srid 'dzin te/ de bas na bang gis sngar smras pa yin te/ sdug bsngal gyis chen mongs
254a3(mdo sde): par ma gyur par myur du brel zhing 'gro ba'i rig so// de nas rgyal po de pe brang du zhugs nas/ da ni bdag yul gzhan zhig tu 'gro dge so snyam du bsam so// yang 'di snyam du bsam so// yul
254a4(mdo sde): pha rol 'gro ba'i lam gnyis yodado// lamanye bar zhugs na/ ni nags bdun gyis pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur/ lam ring porazhugs na ni zhag bcu ba nas phyin par 'gyur bas/ 
254a5(mdo sde): nas lam nye bar 'gre'o snyam bsams nas zhag bdun gyi rgyag sa dang chas te pho brang gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / phyir pe brang gi nang du leg nas/ rgyal bu su sha de ba pangs du blangs te/ 
254a6(mdo sde): mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing spangs pa ltar langs nas phyir yang 'du'o// de'i tshen btsun mos de ltar mi bde zhing skrag pa ltar gyur pa mthong nas/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal po chen po
254a7(mdo sde): ci'i sladadu 'jig skrag pa lta bu'i gzugs ston cing sru la yang rdul gyi gos pa lta bu skra yang 'dzings te/ dbugs kyang mi bde ste yul stor la thug pa 'am/ mdza' sdug pa dang bye ba 'am/ dgra sdang ba
254a8(mdo sde): dang phrang ba lta bu dang / bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan ma dag gda' ba 'di ci lags bstan du gsol rgyal pos smras pa/ kho bo ci nyes pa khyed kyis shes pa ma yin gyis ma smra shig btsun mes gsal
254b1(mdo sde): pa bdag dang rgyal por lus gzugs gnyis kyang sems gcig ste/ dper na byi'i 'dab ma gnyis ma/ lus kyi rkang pa gnyis ma/ mgo'i mi gnyis ma/ de dang 'dran ci'i sladadu bdag la gsang ste/ mi
254b2(mdo sde): gsungs// rgyal pos btsun mo la smras pa/ khyod la mi shes ma blon po sgra gcan ngan sems skyes nas/ rgyal po la 'khus te/ yab rgyal po yangs bkrongs te/ gcen rgyal bu yang srog bar chad
254b3(mdo sde): byas nas/ de ltar dmigs dang chas te nga la rgol du 'ongs kho bo yul gzhan du 'byol du 'gro zhes smras nas/ rgyal bu dge de na bang du blangs te lam du zhug so// de nas btsun mo yang rgyal
254b4(mdo sde): po'i phyir 'brangs te so'o// de'i tshe rgyal po mya ngan gyis non te yi da 'khrugs nas/ zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas lam yang nor te/ lam de yang bgrod dka' ning rtsa yang rtsub pa chu
254b5(mdo sde): yang med do// zhag du ma zhig song ba las rgyags kyang chado// tho ga ma gsang ste rgyal po gcig pu 'gro bar byas nas/ zhag bdu na gyi rgyag las kyang ma brdzangs pa las lam yang no/ 
254b6(mdo sde): mi gsum gyis kyang zos te/ zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas/ da dung lam ring zhing yod pa las rgyags chad nas de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mos skad byung nas duso// kyi hud kyi hud re sdug thog ma
254b7(mdo sde): btsang nas nga tsam gyi bar du 'di 'dra ba ma myong ba de 'dir myong bar gyur te/ da 'dir sdug cing phongaso zhes zer te lags pas mgo la brdab so// sa la 'gre zhing lus la rdul gyis gos nas/ tshig 'di
254b8(mdo sde): ska du smre sngags 'don te/ bdag cag gis tshe snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci zhig byas/ 'on te pha ma dang dgra bcom pa bsad dam/ 'on te dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab ma/ 'on te 'thun pa'i dge
255a1(mdo sde): // 'dun gyi dber bgyis sam/ 'on te rngon pa dang nyal byas ma/ 'on te srang dang bre bcos te pha rol la phrog rlom byas ma/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi nor la skyed spyod ngam/ ci byas na 'di 'dra
255a2(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal myed par gyur cigu/ de skad sme zhing chung zad bstir dgras slebs nas/ srog bar chad nges par 'byung / lam du zhugs nas 'gror ni bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen nas srog
255a3(mdo sde): la bab tu cha'o// rgyal po dang bcu na ma de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen te skad phyung ste ngus pa dang / sa la 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur to// de nas ring zhig lon pa dang sangs nas 'di snyam du
255a4(mdo sde): gsum char lhan cig tu nar 'chi bar 'gyur gyis / btsun mo bsad la bdag dang bu'i srog thar bar bya'o snyam pa sum nas/ ral gyi phyung ste btsun mo gsang bar bshams pa
255a5(mdo sde): dang / rgyal bu dge don gyi rgyal po'i lag pa nas bzung ste/ da ltar ci zhig mdzad dgos shes gsol to// ya ba rgyal pos mig nas mchims gang bzhin du rgyal bu la
255a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras// khyod kyi btsun mo dam pa bsang la khyod kyi sreg gso sa mo// gal te ma bsad kyang rang 'chi bar 'gyur te/ kho bo ni 'chi'am gson yang rung na/ bu khyod kyi srog gso ga
255a7(mdo sde): phyir/ khyed kyi me btsun mo dam pa bsang snyam mo// de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis lab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te btsun mo bsang par gyur na/ de'i sha la bdag mi
255a8(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ gang na yang ma'i sha la bu za ba/ mi srid pas/ bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur na/ yab rgyal po'i ci'i slad du bdag bkum sde pa ma'i srog thar bar mi mdzad yab rgyal pos de skad
255b1(mdo sde): smras pa thos nas/ mod la khams te 'gyel nas sal 'gre zhing rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smraso// khyod kho bo'i mig dang 'dran su zhig rang gi mig phyung ste/ za bar byed// kho bo ni shi yang bla ba/ 
255b2(mdo sde): bu mi gsod do// bu bsad de sha za mi nuso// de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yang yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te yab yum gyis bdag bkum na sha khrag kyang ring po mi
255b3(mdo sde): thogs par rul sum nas dgongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bad gi gsol ba gcig cig ma gnang na byams pa'i yab yum ma lags pas/ bdagi yid dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du
255b4(mdo sde): gsogade nas yab rgyal pos sras rgyal bu la khyo da kyi yid dang mi 'gal bar byas/ ci gsol ba'i rnams myur du/ smos shig ces bsgo ba dang / rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal
255b5(mdo sde): bo la 'di skad ces gsol to// yab yum gyis bdang / la thugs brtse ba'i spang // nyin re zhing bdagi lus las sha rgya ma gsum bcad / cha gnyis ni yab yum la dbul/ cha gcig
255b6(mdo sde): ni bdag rang 'tshal na/ lus sro gi gzungasu 'gyuraro// de nas rgyal pos kyang rgyal bus gsol ba bzhin du gnang nas/ nyin gcig bzhin sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad/ cha gnyis ni rgya
255b7(mdo sde): bo dang / btsun mo za cha gcig ni rgyal bu rang za ste/ lus dang sro gi gzungs byis nas/ lam du zhugs te song ba las zha gnyis kyis yul pha rol ma slebs par rgyal bu'i lus kyi sha zad de/ 
255b8(mdo sde): rus pa'i tshigs dang chu ba tsam zhig 'brel te/ srog lA ma tsam zhig lus nas sa la 'gyel to// de nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rgyal bu pang du blangs nas/ skad chen po phyung na chos nges bta
256a1(mdo sde): te 'di skad ces smraso// deng gnyis kyi ma rig par khyod kyi sha zes te/ khyed 'di lta bu'i na tsha'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur la/ lam yang nga dung ring bas khyod kyi lus kyi
256a2(mdo sde): sha ni zad // nga ni lhan cig tu gnas 'di re rog nago// de nas rgyal bu dge dor gyis skad chu ngus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// da ni 'di nas pha rol du zhag cig tsam gyi lam las
256a3(mdo sde): ma lus te/ bdag ni g.yo zhing bskyod mi nus pas srog 'dir ro// rgyal po dang btsun mo ni ma rabs ngan pa ltar lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro gzhag ma gsungs shig/ bdag la byams
256a4(mdo sde): shing thugs brtse bar dgongs na bang gis bsam pa dang mi 'a gal bar mdzad du gsol/  dung yang bang gis rus pa'i ga seb na sha ci yod pa ma lus par gtogs la yul
256a5(mdo sde): pha rol du gshegasu gsol// de nas rgyal pos yab rgyal bus gsol pa bzhin du/ tshigs dang rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa gtogs nas tshe gsum du bgos te/ 
256a6(mdo sde): cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mos zos/ cha gcig ni rgyal bus zos te/ rgyal po dang btsun mo yang lam du zhugs nas dong ngo // rgyal bu dge don langs nas 'greng bzhin rgyal po dang
256a7(mdo sde): btsun mo song ba la lta'o// rgyal po dang btsun mo gnyis skad chung nas ngu bzhin du song nas/ rgyal bu dge don gyi mig mi sod kyi bar du rgyal po dang btsun mo la chags pa'i sems kyi
256a8(mdo sde): mig mi 'dzum par lta lta nas ring zhig lon pa dang / phyir sa la 'gyel to// sha dang khrag dri bro bas phyogs bcu nas sbrang ma dang sha sdang mang po 'dus nas/ rgyal bu log pa tsam du lus la
256b1(mdo sde): za zhing 'jus te/ sdug bsngal gyis gdung so// de'i tshe na rgyal bu de srog lham tsam zhig ma chadade/ skad phyung nas 'di skad ces smon lam du bte'o// bad gi sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las rnam/ 
256b2(mdo sde): ni 'dis byang zhing zad par gyur cig/ deng sran chad mi bgyi'o// bdagi lus pha ma la phul te/ sbyin pa byas pas bdag pa ma snga mas lhag pa'i bsod nams bcu gcig dang ldan te/ ba
256b3(mdo sde): bar nyal ba dang / bde bar sad pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa mi rmyi ba dang / lhas bsrung ba dang / mis bkur ba dang / zhal mchu dang / rkun po dang / dgra dang rku lto byed pa med cing / dus thams cad
256b4(mdo sde): du bkra shis shog shig/ bdag lus lhag ma tsam sha khra ga sbrang ma la byin pas thams cad du 'drangs shing tshim par gyur te/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyasu grub
256b5(mdo sde): bar shog shig/ sangs rgyasu grub nas chos kyi sku thob nas kyang / chos kyi skus thams cad kyi bkres skom pa'i mu ge/ dang / skye shir 'khor ba'i nang lci ba sel bar shog
256b6(mdo sde): shig/ rgyal bus de skad smon lam btab pa na/ gnam sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos// nyi ma yang 'od mi gsal bar gyur/ gcan zan dang ri dwags rnams kyang skrag nas kun tu rgyug/ 
256b7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho yang rab tu 'khrugs/ ri rab kyang 'gul zhing ldeg/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi bar du yang rab tu g.yos// de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dag dang / 
256b8(mdo sde): 'dzam+bu'i gling dag tu babs nas/ rgyal bu don grub bsdig pa'i phyir/ seng+ge dang / stags dang / 'bar spangs la sogs pa'i lus sprul nas mig dgrang/ kha gdangs/ spu bsgrengs nas skad chen/ 
257a1(mdo sde): chen po'ing ro byung ste/ rgyal bu la mchod pa bzhir bsdig so// de'i tshe rgyal bu don grub kyis gcan zan khro bo de dag mthong nas kyang skad mi khebs 'di skad ces smraso// khyed rna
257a2(mdo sde): kho bo za 'dod na ci bder zo cig/ 'di 'dra ba'i mthu rtsal gyis sdig ci dgos shes bsgre'o// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ bdag cag ni seng+ge'am gcan zan ma yin te/ brgya byin
257a3(mdo sde): lho'i dbang po yin te/ khyod bag ma zhing sad du 'ong so// de'i tshe rgyal bus brgya byin lha'i dbang po mthong nas shin tu dga' mgur rangs par yang gyur to// de nas brgya byin gyis rgyal
257a4(mdo sde): bu la smras pa/ khyod kyis shin tu gtang dka' ba btang ste lus kyi sha khrigs pa ma la bltas pa 'di'i bsod nams kyis khyo da bdud kyi rgyal po 'dod dam/ 'on te tshangs pa'i rgyal
257a5(mdo sde): po 'dod dam/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ mi'i rgyal po 'am/ 'khra ra los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dod/ rgyal bus smras pa/ bad/ ga ni bdud kyi rgyal po 'am/ tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i
257a6(mdo sde): rgyal po 'am/ mi'i rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang yang mi 'dod de/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
257a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub 'dod do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod ni shin tu yang gti mug can zhig yin pa 'dra/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yun ring po nas shin tu dka'
257a8(mdo sde): bas bsgrubs pas gzod 'grub ce'o// khyod kyis shin tu sdug bsngal ba bzod dam/ rgyal bus smras pa/ gal te lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar bangadagi spyi bo'i steng na rgyun tu 'khor/ 
257b1(mdo sde): yang sdug bsngal de tsam gyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go// brgya byir gyis smras pa/ khyed kyis smras pa stong pa 'di la su zhig yid ches par
257b2(mdo sde): 'gyur// de nas rgyal bus dam bcas nas smon lam 'di skad ces bta 'o// gal te bang gis smra ba'i tshig brdzun te lha'i dbang po bslus par gyur na/ bdagi lus kyi rma 'di nam du
257b3(mdo sde): yang 'tsho bar ma gyur cig/ gal te smra ba'i tshig bden na bang gi lus kyang sor chud cing khrag kyang 'o mar gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu/ lus kyi rma yangs ma kho na bzhin sor
257b4(mdo sde): chung de/ khrag kyang 'o mar gyur nas rgyal bu'i byad gzug sa kyang snga ma bas lhag par bzang zhing sdug pa dang mdzes par gyur te/ langs nas lha'i dbang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos
257b5(mdo sde): phyag byas so// de nas lci'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khyod la gse// shin tu leg so// shin tu dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus/ kyis gdon mi za bar/ bla na med pa yang dag par
257b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyuro// ring por mi thog par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa na/ thog mar bang gi don mdzad par gyur cig ces smras nas/ brgya byin
257b7(mdo sde): lnga'i dbang po yang na mkha'i phyogs de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mo yang rgyal po pha rol po'i drung du phyin nas/ rgyal po des kyang rgyang ma nas bsu nas/ dges
257b8(mdo sde): pa'i yo byad yid bzhin du sproro// de'i tshe rgyal po dang bcur mo des rgyal bus lus kyi sha khrag gis pa ma la ji ltar bltabs pa rgyal po de la zhing tu brjod pa dang / rgyal po des ji
258a1(mdo sde): / ltar brjod pa de dag thos nas/ rgyal bu nges lus kyi sha khrigs pa ma la stabs pas sri zhu cher byas pa'i drin lan bsrubs nas dmag rnam bzhi bshams nas/ rgyal po
258a2(mdo sde): de dang yul bA ra ma ser dmag drang so// de'i rgyal po de dmag rnam bzhi dang chas nas lam du zhugs te/ rgyal bu dang bral ba'i gnasu phyin pa dang / 'di snyam du bdagi bu ni gdon mi za bar
258a3(mdo sde): 'di nyid du shi na/ buM'i rusu pa tsam bsdus te phyir bang gi yul du bkur ro snyam du sems nas/ skad phyung nas ngu zhing bu'i rus bu sdud du song song ba la/ rgyang ma nas bdagi bri'i lus kyi rma
258a4(mdo sde): yang sos nas/ snga ma bas bzang zhing mdzes te drung du 'ong so// de nas rgyal pos pang du blangs te/ khyod da dung gson nam zhes smras pa dang / rgyal bus ji ltar gyur pa yab rgyal po dang
258a5(mdo sde): btsun mo la smra so// rgyal po dang btsun me rab tu dga' ste// thams cad ban glang la zhon nas/ phyir bdagi yul du byin pa dang / rgyal bu de'i bsod nams de'i mthus bdag
258a6(mdo sde): yul yang phyir thob nas/ rgyal bu don grub rgyal por dbang bskur te rgyal por bcu go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yab rgyal por gyur
258a7(mdo sde): pa de gzhan yon snyam du khyed sems na/ de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yab rgyal po de ni de ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na yu
258a8(mdo sde): gyur pa ngo ni gzhan yin po sum du khyod sems na dang lngar mi nga lnga'o// do na da ltar nga'i yum lnga mdzes zhes bya ba 'i no/ de'i tshe do 'dus na rgyal bu don grub ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan nas yin
258b1(mdo sde): snyam du khyod sems na/ de ltar mi blta'o// 'i tshe do'i 'dus na rgyal bu de ning ltar shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur pa da ltar kun shes ko'u 'a
258b2(mdo sde): nu zhes bya ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis pha ma la sri zhu byed pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyi shu snyed kyi 'gro ba thams cad la
258b3(mdo sde): phan pa dang bde ba'i don la mkhas pa'i tshig gi spobs pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa tho'o// gzhan yang phyogs bcu
258b4(mdo sde): 'dus pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rdul phra rab ste/ da kyis theg pa gnyis kyi sems spangs te/ theg pa gcig/ sa mthar phyin par gyur to// dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen
258b5(mdo sde): ma rdul phra rab snyed kyis 'bras bu dang po nas/ theg pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to// lha dang mi brgya stong snyed ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
258b6(mdo sde): tu sems bskye// de ma yin pa lnga dang / klu dang yi dwags dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / na mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye 'chen po dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa la sogs pa mang po'i
258b7(mdo sde): rnams la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
258b8(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag gis sems can thams cad don du pa ma la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir/ lus kyis sha khrag gis kyang pha ma la bstabs shing / shin tu spyad dka' ba sprod
259a1(mdo sde): pa ni 'di la bu yin no// 'khor mang po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas so so nas phan pa dang bde ba'i don rnyed do// dga' rangs nas mgo bos bya/ 
259a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ gsas pogs nas bskor ba byas nas phyir dong ngo // thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las/ sri nu'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis so// / 
259a3(mdo sde): bam po gnyis pa// de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po'i nang na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi skar ma mang po zil gyis mnan pa lta bu 'am/ 
259a4(mdo sde): klu 'khyil pa'i 'ja' chen lngar 'tsher zhing gas la ba la ltan mig mi chags pa bzhin nam/ bsams na yid 'khrul pa tsam du 'od zer lha me ljang nger bzhugs te
259a5(mdo sde): dper mi bzod pa ni srin bu me khyer gyi 'od nyi ma shar ma thag tu mi snang ba 'am/ ci zla 'od zer brgya stong snyed yod kyang / brgya byin gyi drung na sol bung lta bu 'am/ brgya
259a6(mdo sde): byin la 'ang gsol ba yod kyang / tshangs pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi drung na gyo mo 'am/ gseg ma lta bu'am mtshan mo dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od du bskrun pa tsam 'am/ tshangs pa'i rgyal
259a7(mdo sde): po chen po'i 'od zer dam pa brgya stong snyed yod pa'i 'od thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi drung na sel ba'i phung po ltar gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
259a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i 'od zer mdog gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar gyur to// de dag na gnas pa'i sems can dag la 'od zer des reg na/ dmus
259b1(mdo sde): long ni mig gis gzugs mthong bar 'gyur/ lus sgur po ni lus rangs par 'gyur/ dbang po nyams pa ni dbang po tshang zhing yan lag dang nying lag dang ldan par 'gyuraro// myos
259b2(mdo sde): ba rnams ni dran pa phyir rnyed par 'gyur/ mdor na ji tsam du yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad dang bral te 'dod pa bzhin thob par 'gyu ro// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du byang
259b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun cu snyed stan las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu
259b4(mdo sde): 'khod do// thams cad kyis skad 'thun par mi gsu bcad pa brgya stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mdo na bar bstod pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
259b5(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems da pa'i rtog med dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' bde ba 'ba' shig sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med
259b6(mdo sde): par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshad med dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtsug pud 'od dang / byang chub sem
259b7(mdo sde): dpa' brtan pa'i seng+ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig rol dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtog pa spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes brtsegs dang / byang chub
259b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' dge gnas blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu mtshan med dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'od zer dang / byang chub sems dpa' khro bo blo gros
260a1(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu srung 'gyur dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang pa bdun dang / byang chub sems dpa' me tog 'phags dang / byang chub
260a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' kun tu bde dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i shes rab las dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo 'phral 'chang dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam du
260a3(mdo sde): med dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa sbyin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen las dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i me tog gnas dang / byang chub sems
260a4(mdo sde): dpa' shin tu sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag meng chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa'i yid dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs
260a5(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong sa bcu dang / byang chub sa mas dpa' stobs bcu 'chang dang / byang chub sems da
260a6(mdo sde): 'phags pa chen pos skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba rol dang / byang chub sems dpa' de na gnas dang / byang chub sems
260a7(mdo sde): dpa' grangs med lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu lci ba'i sdong po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyu las 'phags dang / byang chub
260a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' gcig pu 'gro dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sde chen khams dang / byang chub sems dpa' ris skyob dang / byang
260b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gsum 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo 'phral yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa brjod dang / byang chub sems dpa' gnyi dgas
260b2(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge brtsan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus tshe rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid mngon ston dang / byang
260b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'od rgyang gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i ri dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid len byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba byin dang / byang chub sems/ 
260b4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal mtshan mchog dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' dag mgu rangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' bco na 'grus brtan dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gribs med
260b5(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' ma chags lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgron ma
260b6(mdo sde): chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs chen stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa
260b7(mdo sde): mun nag bsngal dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam med phyogs la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar yi dam 'di skad sa so// bdag
260b8(mdo sde): cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi chos srung zhing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rgyas par dgyi zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o// 
261a1(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag cagis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong nas/ 'od zer de dag las sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi
261a2(mdo sde): khyab pa yang thos par 'gyur/ ches de dag thos nas sems kyi sgrib pa dang bral te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas/ lha'i rin po che gser ltar sems rnam par dag par 'gyur
261a3(mdo sde): bas thams cad gsal bar snang bar gyur pa'i phyir ro// bdag gis phan pa dang bde ba'i yon tan 'di lta bu dag dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa la ston pa chen por 'du shes skyes// 
261a4(mdo sde): byams pa'i pha lta bu'i 'du shes skyes nas/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran te/ sangs rgyas kyis bka' drin shes par bgyid do// de ci'i byar zhe na/ dam pa'i chos
261a5(mdo sde): bos par ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi sring po la 'dug ci nga / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tham sa cad sgrol bar 'gyuro// de dag kyang chos thos pas
261a6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems
261a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun cu po 'di dag yun ring po nas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra ba snyed kyi sngon rol na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
261a8(mdo sde): gang+gi'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab snyed bkur byas te/ sangs rgyas de dag las rtag tu tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing / rgyal ba de dag la mi skyo ba'i sems kyis
261b1(mdo sde): mnyes par byas nas/ byams pas bdag gis lus bsrungs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dzin cing snying rje chen pos rgyun tu phyogs bcur thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don
261b2(mdo sde): byed do// sems can gang zhig tha ma shi kar byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gcig ming ngam/ gnyis sam/ gsum sam/ bzhi 'am/ bdun bcu'i bar du rdzogs par thos te/ de
261b3(mdo sde): la srog phyogs skyabasu song na/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu ga na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu pad+mo las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / 'dod chags dang yongasu bral
261b4(mdo sde): ba dang mngal gyi gnas nas mi skye ba dang / mnam zhing brtsog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/ lus yongasu dag cing / lus dri zhom pa dang / thams cad yid du 'ong zhing bkur bsti byed pa
261b5(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// kun gyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byas pas sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyuraro// sems rab tu dga' bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
261b6(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed
261b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ de ltar byams pa dang snying rje'i sems bskyed pas/ 'gro ba ma lus pa la btang snyom su mi gtong ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang sems can thams cad la phan
261b8(mdo sde): ba dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i sems dang / bdag dang gzhan gyis don byed pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bar chad du 'gyur ba bsul ba'i sems dang / nyon mong ba zhi bar byed pa'i
262a1(mdo sde): sems dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing rtag tu bkur sti byed pa'i sems dang / 'dun pa'i yid kyi chos nyan pa'i sems dang / mi brjed par yid// 
262a2(mdo sde): la byed cing / don bzang po gzungasu 'dzin pa'i sems dang / zhung ngu thos la don mang du shes pa'i sems dang / mang du thos la don mi shes pa mi 'dod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyuraro// de
262a3(mdo sde): nas yang dag pa nyid la dang po'i sems dang / de bzhin nyid kyi don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skyes pas ji ltar bstan pa
262a4(mdo sde): bzhin du rnam 'byor spong ba'i sems skye bar 'gyu ro// ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skyes pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ de ltar phyir mi ldog
262a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems skyes pas/ sems can thams cad la ma nyam snyoms pa'i gnyen po'i sems skye bar 'gyuraro// ji ltar bdag khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar skye bar
262a6(mdo sde): mi dga' ba bzhin du gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / rkang bzhi dang rkang mangs nas/ grog sbyar nas srog chags thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sem
262a7(mdo sde): dpa' ni lus dang sroge gi bar du stong yang pha rol pa'i srog 'phrog pa'i las mi byed do// ji ltar bdag la nir rdzas dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / ban glang dang / shing
262a8(mdo sde): rta dang theg pa dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / lus kyi yan lag gi bar du longs spyod rnams la srung zhing rim gro byed do// gzhan gyis khyer zhing 'phrog pa la mi
262b1(mdo sde): dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang sems can rnams kyi nor dang / gos dang / zas dang / 
262b2(mdo sde): skom dang / longs spyod la 'phrog pa'i sems mi skyed do// ji ltar bang gi gzugs dam pa sring mo 'am/ chung ma 'am/ slas la gzhan gyis mi rigs par byed mi 'dod pa bzhin du/ sems
262b3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bad gi lus dang srog stor kyang / pha rol po'i gzugs dam pa la 'du shes ngan pa log pa'i sems mi skyed na/ ma
262b4(mdo sde): rigs pa'i chos ngan pa lta ci smos/ ji ltar bdag phra ma dang tshig rtsub po 'khrug par 'gyur ba la mi dga' ba ba zhin du sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na
262b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang brdzun du smra ba dang phan tshun 'khrug pa'i tshig mi smra'o// ji ltar bdag rjo thugs rdeg pa dang lugs gzhu ba dang / nan la/ 
262b6(mdo sde): 'bor ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bang gi lus dang srog yal yang rdo dbyug dang / lcag dang / chad pas
262b7(mdo sde): gcad pa'i las kyi sems can rnams la michi'o// ji ltar bdag lhug sgrog dang / khong sgril dang / mtshon cha dang / bzung ba dang / brtags pa dang / bcing bas bcing ba'i gnod pa
262b8(mdo sde): rnams la mi dga' ba bzhin du/ sems can kun kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang sreg yal yang lcags sgrog dang / kheng sgril dang / bzung ba
263a1(mdo sde): / dang bcing ba la sogs pa'i gnod pas 'tshe bar mi byed do// ji ltar bdag gzhan gyis bskas pa dang / dbang dang drag shul byed pa dang / dbang rlom par can byed
263a2(mdo sde): bsnyems shing ngan du byed pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag cag gcig pu'i lus dang srog yal yang
263a3(mdo sde): tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rig pas/ sems can la gnod pa mi byed do// ji ltar bdag la pha rol po gzhan gyis bkur sti byed cing mchod dam/ tshig snyan pas bstod na/ bdag bde ba la dag/ 
263a4(mdo sde): bzhin du bdag kyang / sems can rnams la gos dang zas dang skem dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi sbyin par byed de// gal te ba gis las chen po
263a5(mdo sde): zhig bsgrub ma/ sangs rgyas kyi phyir ram/ ches/ kyi phyir ram/ dge 'dun gyi phyir ram/ den bsgrubs pa las blos mi lcogs te// don bsgrub par ma gyur nas mi dga' zhing
263a6(mdo sde): ngan gyis gdungs pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhogs/ bang gis bsgrubs pa'i don ma grub pas mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed par mthong na bdag la 'di skad zero// rigs kyi bu khyod mi
263a7(mdo sde): dga' ba ma byed cig/ khyed kyis don grub pa'i grogs bya'o// don yid bzhin du grub par bya'o zhes zer na/ de la rab tu dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ de bas na bad gis sems can
263a8(mdo sde): la phan pa dang bde ba'i don tu bsgrub pa'i las kyis grags bya'o// ji ltar bdag la rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / chu 'am/ mes gnod par 'gyur ram/ bran po la sogs pas bzung ngam/ 
263b1(mdo sde): btags ma bcings na mi dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur pa las mkhas bzo dang ldan pa zhigs bdag de ltar mya ngan gyis gdus pa bong ma/ sman pa sgra'i tshigs bdag la rtsa
263b2(mdo sde): ngan ma byed cig/ khyod kyi phyir kho bos rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po la gsol ba btab ste/ gal te na nor gsug sbyin pa 'am/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ji nas kyang khyod mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal
263b3(mdo sde): las thar bar bya'o// zhes zer na/ bang gis tshig de thos pa tsam gyi sems dga' bar 'gyur te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni shes par bya ba'i rgyu rtsal dang / bzo'i bar du mthar phyir bar
263b4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus slo'o// 'di lta ste/ shes par bya ba raM/ ga pa'i gnas dang / bzo'i gnas dang / rol me dang / rtsed mo dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / mig 'phrul gyi sngags dang / sman dang / khan
263b5(mdo sde): dang rta dang / bzhon pa dang / dgra chos dang / dmag dra nga ba dang / dpyad la sogs pa la mkhas par slob ste/ de ltar sgyu rtsal ci la yang mkhas par bslangs nas/ 'gro ba mang po dang / rgyal
263b6(mdo sde): bo dang / blon po chen po la sogs pa yang bsod pa'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang long spyad kyi rkyen gos ma/ nor ram/ zas ma/ bza' ba 'am/ btung ba 'am/ nor bu 'am/ 
263b7(mdo sde): gdu bu 'am/ lus kyi rgyan nam/ gser ma/ dngul ma/ bai DUR+Sha 'am/ man she la ma/ spug ma/ mu tig ma/ a sma gar b+ha 'am/ nor bu rin po che 'am/ ban glang ma/ rta 'am/ theg pa 'am/ bran pa 'am
263b8(mdo sde): las byed pa'i mi 'am/ chung ma 'am/ sras kyang yod/ chu mig ma/ khrus kyi rdzing bu 'am/ rin po che'i yang tog bzang po 'am/ longs spyod kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs yod kyang byang chub sems
264a1(mdo sde): dpa' de la rlom pa 'am/ rgyags pa'i sems med// de ltar rgyu rtsal kur la yang mkhas/ rin po che'i bang mdzod brgya stong dang yang ldan/ ban glang dang / rta dang / theg
264a2(mdo sde): nga yang yod na chungam/ bzang mo yang grangs med par yod/ yang tog bzang po yang yod/ chu mig dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu la sogs pa 'dod pa'i long spyod gang yang yod mod kyi de la
264a3(mdo sde): chags te/ rtag tu 'dod pa nyung ba dang / chog shes pa la dga' zhing / khas mtha' dgon pa dang /  ngang tshal dang / shing drung du bsam gtan la zhi bar gnas pa la mo so// skye bo mang po dang
264a4(mdo sde): spa zhing gtam zer yang / sems ni rtag tu gnyen po'i sgor 'jug par byed de// so so'i skye bo dang tshul 'thun pa ltar byed kyang sems can la phan pa'i don tu nor bu rin po che gtong bar byed kyi
264a5(mdo sde): sems can la gnod pa mi phan pa'i don mi byed// gang dngul baphongs pa 'a theg par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la slong du 'ongs na/ de la ci 'dod pa bzhin byang chu
264a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sbyin par be re// sems can gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi ches la mos shing dang / byang chub sems dpa' la bsnyen bkur dang / mched pa bya ba'i phyir rim gro dang g.yeg byed sing
264a7(mdo sde): rkang pa khru ri'i las byengam/ lus bkru ba dang / mnye ba'i las byengam/ chag chag dang / phyag dar bdam/ so shing dang / khrus chus sbrer ma/ mal bstan 'dangs shing / mal ges sdug pa'i las
264a8(mdo sde): byed ma/ sred dang the rangs/ la mar me 'bung ngam/ khye sus kyang / dril kha zas than pa dang / pu sha ni dang / kha da ne 'bul ma/ 'thung po'i skom yu li shi dang / bu lar sha ki'i 'bras bu'i skem dang / rgu/ 
264b1(mdo sde): chu dang / khar nag po'i chu la sogs pa sbyar sbyar nas/ yo byad de lta bus zhag bdun ma zhag dgu bcu'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' la chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'bul bar byed na/ byang chub sems
264b2(mdo sde): dpa' bor tshe/ mchod pa'i yo byad 'bul ba de la dga' ba'i sems med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni skal pa grangs med yun ring po nas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir/ 
264b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la skyed 'bri'i sems med pa'i phyir byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir mnyam snyoms pa'i sems la gnas pa'i phyir ro// de bas na dus kha cig tu
264b4(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed do// rtag tu dge ba bcu'i chos kyi sems can gyi don byed do// sems can de dag kyang rgyal po 'i yid bzhin du dga' zhing spyod pa'i tshe'i dus byas
264b5(mdo sde): na yang lha dang ma'i 'jig rten du 'dod pa ldi'i longs spyod mchog dam pa dang ldan te/ rigs che zhing mthe bar skye bar 'gyur/ bsams pa'i yid bzhin du nyal ba dang ldang ba dang 'gro ba
264b6(mdo sde): la gnod pa med par 'gyur/ gnas gang du 'gro ba yang bzhon pa'i rta dang theg par ldan te bskyed mos tshal du rtsed mo dang / rol mo la rtse zhing longs spyod par 'gyur/ bza' ba dang btung ba dam
264b7(mdo sde): pa dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur yang / tha ma mi rtag pa brten te rga ba dang na bas gzir to shi bar gyur na/ khyim gyi bu smad mya ngan gyis gdungs te skad phyung nas ngu zhing / la la ni mgo
264b8(mdo sde): la thal mo rdebs/ la la ni rang rang gi skra 'bal te/ mchi ma 'dzag cing sa la 'dre'o// de nas khyegs ma shing rta'i steng du bzhag nas/ dur khrod skyel te de ltar bskyal nas kyang bu sma ga
265a1(mdo sde): phyir khyim du 'ongs nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te/ la la ni brgyal nas sa la 'grel la ni de'i rkyen gyis na du gyur/ la la ni mi dran pas myos/ la la tshe'i bar chadadu shi ba
265a2(mdo sde): byas te/ de ltar byas kyang gson pa rnams la ni phan pa med/ shi ba la ni rab tu gan de// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor les sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te/ yul rgyu zhing song ba la sems
265a3(mdo sde): can mya ngan gyis gzir ba mthong nas/ snying brje ba'i sems skyes te 'di skad te 'di skad ze'o// rgyal po zhes bya ba ni yulas dbang gi 'gro ba mang po'i dbang sgyur te/ de ltar dge ba bcur
265a4(mdo sde): lam gyi 'gro ba rnams 'dul te/ 'bras bu 'dod pa lnga mche ga dam pa thob du zin kyang skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mi rtag pas 'jigs pas thar par ma gyur na bdagis
265a5(mdo sde): drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid btsas kyang phan pa'i den re/ do// de ltar 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don med na/ 'khor los sgyu/ ra ba'i rgyal po chen po zhes kyang ji skad ces kyang bya/ 
265a6(mdo sde): byams pa chen po pa zhe 'am/ sman pa rgyal po chen po zhe 'am/ 'dren pa'i then pa chen po zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par lam du 'dren cing / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam ston te/ 'dus ma byas pa'i ra
265a7(mdo sde): d+ha bde ba thob par byeda'o// bdag cag ni ming dang spyad par mthur/ dper na mi zhig skom pas gdungs nas srog la bab pa las/ chu 'dod pa'i phyir phan tshun rgyugs te/ khron pa skam po cig dang
265a8(mdo sde): phrad nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te 'di snyam du sems// da ni bad gi lus 'di 'chi ba la phyir sos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te chu dang ma/ phrad na/ srog 'di 'chi ba las mi ring ba las pa
265b1(mdo sde): khron pa bzang po dang phrang nas/ gdon mi za bar chu dong grang mo gtsang ma dang brade/ ngoms shing tshim par 'gyur bas/ srog 'tsho bar 'gyur rnam bsam nas/ myu ba myur bar khron pa'i drung du bsnyem
265b2(mdo sde): to// khron pa'i drung du pi nas lus la gyon pa'i gos pude phyogs gcig tu spangs nas/ chu 'dod pa'i phyir khron pa'i nang du zhug so// khron pa'i gting du phyin nas chu na med kyi sbrul gdug pa dang smi
265b3(mdo sde): pa dang / sdig pa dang sdung pa dang sbal ba dang / gyo mo dang / de la sogs pa gsog ma dang / shing dang rtswa nyal nyil 'ba' zhig mthong bar gyur te// de'i tshe skom pas nyam thag par gyur pa de thog ma
265b4(mdo sde): ba bzhin du chu yang ma rnyed la gdug pa mang po gzas nas khren pa de las phyir byung bar gzas kyang khron pa rnyings shing zhig la zab kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam yod/ de'i nang nas skas ma/ thag sa
265b5(mdo sde): dam 'bru ba'i shing tsam yang med/ mas mched du bsku la yang nyam thag la stabs zhan pas 'bar mi nus te/ phyir yang zhab su lhung nas sbrul gdug pa la sogs pas za zhing 'dzi'o// 
265b6(mdo sde): zad gcig srog ma chad kyi bar du 'di skad ces ze'o// bdag khron pa 'di'i nang na chu med par sngar shes na lta khron pa la mi gis lta yang mi'i bo ra 'di'i nang du 'ug pa lta mos kyang ci dges te/ de ni khri
265b7(mdo sde): pa 'di'i rkyen gyi sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyuro// zhes smre sngags 'di no// 'khor les sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang da ltar so'i skye bo dag gcig shi bi'i 'og tu khyim gang gi bu smad dang
265b8(mdo sde): gnyen rnams kyi sdug pa dang bye bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa mthong nas 'di skad zere// bang gi lus 'di ni khron pa skam po de dang 'dra ste/ khron pa'i ming tsam yod kyi chu ni med pas na/ 'ja
266a1(mdo sde): / pa yod kyang theb pa med pas de lta bu'i lus dang sreg ster ba'i sdug bsngal myeng bar gyur to// de ltar bdag 'khor les sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang sgyur zhing rin po che sna bdu dang ldan te/ dge
266a2(mdo sde): bcu'i las kyi 'gre ba 'dul zhing drang po'i ches kyi yul gyi srid btsas nas/ skye bo mang po dag lha dang ro'i mtho ros kyi gnasu bkod/ 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan mchig dam pa la leng sprad du bcug kyang de dag
266a3(mdo sde): skye ba dang / rga ba dang na ba dang 'ar ba dang / sdug pa dang bye bral dang dgra sdang ba dang phrang ba'i sdug bsngal las thar par mi nus te/ gcag la gcig du zhing che de bad pa 'di ni bang gis nyes kyi/ sems can rnam
266a4(mdo sde): kyis mnyes// de ji lta zhe na/ bdag la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la gro ba mang po la phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba med/ bdag las dge ba'i ches 'dod cing rab tu bde ba 'dod kyang sdug bsngal gyi
266a5(mdo sde): mtshe las rgal ri ruso// de'i tshe 'khor les sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang 'di skam du sem so// da ltar bdag lus 'di ni dper ra shes pa med pa gti mug can gyi sbyin bdag dang 'dra'o// de'i tshe
266a6(mdo sde): dus gzhan zhig na le bdun gyi bar du char po ma dab pas/ than pa chen po byung ste rtsi shing yang skams/ 'bru yang rab tu dkon par gyur/ mu ge chen po byung ste/ gcig la gcig 'cha' zhing za bar 'gyur
266a7(mdo sde): gcig sha khrag la gi cig za ste/ la la ni bu'i sha khrag la pa ma zal la ni pa ma'i shal bu za zhing / pa ma dang pu nu dang khyo shug dang / bu po dang / bu me yang gtsigs sha la gcig za bar gyur to/ 
266a8(mdo sde): de'i tshe na sprin bdag chen po de 'chag ci 'phyan du song song ba las/ sems can mang po dag ltogs nas da rong nyams te/ ring cing skams la nyams chung la mngag ngan pa dang sgra yang 'dzings nas lus
266b1(mdo sde): gnas la rke ba dag 'phrag pa la mi ro khung du khyer te/ kha cig ni mi'i mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / lU tshigs dang / lag ngar dang / phrag pa dang / tshigs pa dang / sbal ba dang / brla dang / rje ngar dang / 
266b2(mdo sde): yan lag dang nying la gi bar du khyer kha cig ni rang khrel mchin pa dang / mcher ba dang / gle ba dang / sgyu ma dang / gnang rnams khyer ba mthong ngo // de lta bu dag mthong nas sbyin bdag des de dag mthong
266b3(mdo sde): nas/ khyed khur du khyer ba 'di dag ci yin zhes driso// de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag khun tu khyer ba 'di ci dag ni mi ro'o// ma'i mgo dang / rkang lag dang / brla dang / rje ngar dang / yan lag dang nying
266b4(mdo sde): lag bar du'o// khyed mo'i mgo dang / yan lag dang nying lag bar du khyer ba 'di ci dgos ci zhig bya zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyod mi shes ma/ mu ga chen po byung nas 'bru rab tu dkon
266b5(mdo sde): par gyur te mi kun ltogs nas da ltar gcig la gcig zab sa bdag cag khur du khyer ba 'di ni bdag cag gi zas yin no// de'i tshe sbyin bdag chen po des de skad ces smras pa de
266b6(mdo sde): thos nas spangs te/ spu zing zhes byed pas khams te sa la 'gyel ba las/ chu grang mos gdong du gtor nas ri pa nag lon pa dang / sems sor chud nas 'on byed kyi zas yin na/ 'di dag su/ 
266b7(mdo sde): sha yir dris pa de dag skad chen po phyung ngus te/ sbyin bdag la brjod mi ru zhes smras te/ e ma'o bdag cag ni sdugo/ e pa'o bdag cag ni sdug/ kyi hud kyi hung khyed la drang por mi smrar mi rung ste/ 
266b8(mdo sde): bdag cag khur du khyer ba 'di la la ni pa'i sha/ la la ni ri 'aka'o// la la ni bri'i sha/ la la ni pu nr-i'i sha la la ni gnyen bshes kyi sha yin// zhes lhogs de dag gis so se nas/ khyim bdag
267a1(mdo sde): la drang po'i gtam byas nas/ bdag cag ni shin tu legs pas gcig nyid sha za bar 'gyuro// de'i tshe sbyin bdag des dbugs kyis brnangs pa tsam du/ mi rtogs pa rnams
267a2(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces sbaso// khyed rnams ded pin chad gdag la gcig nyid sha za bar ma byed cig/ khyed rnams la dgos pa'i ye byad gang yang rung / bge ba'i gos sam/ bza' ba 'am/ 
267a3(mdo sde): gdung ba 'am/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi 'am/ ye byad ming ges pa thams cad sbyin par bya ste/ zhag bdun na khyed rnams kho bo'i sgor shog shig dang / yid bzhin du gyes sam/ kha zas sam/ rang kyi
267a4(mdo sde): rkyen rtsi dang ci 'dod pa rang par bya'o// zhes bsgo ba dang / de dag rab tu dga' rangs nas/ shin legs legs// de mtshar che'o zhes bstod par byas// de nas sbyin bdag de phyir khyim
267a5(mdo sde): du'ongs nas/ chung ma dang bu rnams dang bram lang pa/ las byed pa'i mi rnams kyang bsdus te/ dga' ba'i sadangs pU nga ste/ 'jab zhing yi du 'ong ba'i tshig snyan pas/ bu spang dang
267a6(mdo sde): drar khel dang las byed pa'i mi rnams la 'di skad ces bsgre'o// khyed rnams shes par gyis shig/ khe bos spras pa'i tshig legs par nyon cig/ khyed shes sam than pa chen pos mu
267a7(mdo sde): ge byung nas/ mi thams cad rtogs te grangs med pa cig shi bar gyur to// bdagi khyim na bang mdzod kun gang zhing lu de/ 'bru yang grangs med pa gcig yod pas dus las ma yol bar bdag
267a8(mdo sde): dag bsod nams bya'o// zhes bu srung kun gyis de skad ces bslab thos nas/ legs legs// bdag cag lus sbyin pa byas kyang mi 'phangs pang mdzod dang / ner rdzas dang / kha zas lnga
267b1(mdo sde): smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas sbyin bdag kyang rab tu dga' rangs nas/ khyed rnams ni yang dag par kho bo'i bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'i grogs yin pa lta dga'o leg so// khyed
267b2(mdo sde): rnams kyang so so nas ci dang ci bya ba rnams ci dang ci bsgrub pa skol ba ba'i rigs pa yang med la bya/ bsgrub pa'i rigs pa yang myur du sgrub ste/ da lta zhag bdud na nges par 'byor par bya'o// 
267b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe sbyin bdag des so sor bsgo nas/ khyim gyi pha rol tu byung ste/ gang nas mnyam zhing yang la bde ba'i gnas shig bltas/ mod las gzhi dag par nyal nyil sa rdo med par byas phyag te/ 
267b4(mdo sde): khri bstan bsham so// de ltar mang po'i 'du ba'i ga nas sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sa gzhi bshams nas/ ban glang lnga brgya la kha za sa bkal te/ sbyin pa'i sar bskyal nas/ kha zas ri bzhin du spungs
267b5(mdo sde): zho chu ni mtsho bzhin du bsgril/ mar dang 'bru mar dang / khu ba la sogs pa/ kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa mcho gu sbyar te/ dem yin pa gzhan yang gos dang gdu bu dang / phreng ba dang / luT
267b6(mdo sde): rgyan sna tshogs pa dang / ban glang dang / rta dang / rin po che sna bdun la sogs te thams cad phun sum rigs par sbyar nas/ zhag bdun lon pa'i skya re sa shar nas/ zhag bdun gyi nyi ma dril rnga brdungs drang
267b7(mdo sde): te/ skad chen pos thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas 'dir 'dus shig ces poso// de'i tshe na thams cad kyis bos po'i skad thos nas/ 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa tsam du dga' ba'i sems skyes
267b8(mdo sde): te/ thams cad sbyin pa gtong po'i gnas lhags te/ yid bzhin du ges dang / mal cha dang zas skom dang lus kyi rgyan sna tshogs pa dang / nad kyi rtsi sman po dang / ban glang dang rta dang rin po che sna bdun/ 
268a1(mdo sde): / la sogs pa ci dang / ci 'ded pa ying bzhin du drangs nas sprin pa'i rdzas ci yed pa thams cad kyi ma lus par khyer// de nas sbyir bdag de dga' nas phyir khyim du 'ongs nas/ chung ma dang
268a2(mdo sde): su rnams dga' ba bzhin du 'dod ba lnga la longs spyong ngo // de nas kyang zhag bdun tsam len pa dang / mi dag na re sbyar bdag des sngar bos dang skor la sogs pa'i sbyin pa byas na/ kha zas zos pa
268a3(mdo sde): rnams dug langs nas thams cad shi'o zhes ze'o// de ltar shi bar gyur pas thams cad kyi tshig tu brjed ngo mtshar che'o// ngo mtshar che'o// de ltar sprin bdag chen po des kun la snying brtse ci 'dod pa
268a4(mdo sde): bzhin du kha zas la sogs pas tshir par byas te/ lus dang srog sen par gyur na/ phyis zhag mang po ma lon bar du drug langs nas thams cad shi'i bar sgrogs par gyur to// de'i de sprir bdag
268a5(mdo sde): be nges de ltar gyur pa des thos nas yi mug cing mi dga' ba ra gyur to// chung ma dang bu la sogs pa la khyed kyis kha zas ji ltar sbyar na/ kha zas kyi nang du dug ma rung ba ji ltar 'ong
268a6(mdo sde): shes dris pa dang / chung ma dang / bu dang bran khel dang / las bad pa'i mi rnams kyi mchid nas dug mi srid dug 'di ga las 'ongs zhig tu rtogs shig ces smra so// de nas sprin bdag de khyim gyi zhal
268a7(mdo sde): dbyed cing mthar gyis song song ba las/ khrod pa zhig steng bkab cing g.yog pa mthong ngo // khron pa 'ang ci'i phyir g.yogs shes dris pa dang / khror pa 'dir khyim bdog 'di khyod bus pa chung
268a8(mdo sde): dra'i chen// sbrul gdug pa gsum zhig gsegs las khron pa 'di brkos nas sbrul gdug pa gsung bcu'o// khron pa 'di ni sbrul gdug pa'i khron pa yin// chu yang gdug pas chu 'di yang 'a
268b1(mdo sde): pas na ste 'chi bar 'gyur// sprin bdag des tshig de dag thos nas/ las byed pa dag la khyed de bar kha zas g.yo ba'i tshe/ khren chu 'di las bcus te kha zas ma g.yogs ma/ las byed pas smras pa/ 
268b2(mdo sde): kha zas mang du g.yo bas ring nas chu 'di bcus nas kha zas kyi g.yos byas zhes bsgo'o// khyim bdag mi dga' ste ngo mtshar che'o// bdag ni gti mug can shes pa'i blo med pa yin pa 'dra ste/ 
268b3(mdo sde): ci'i phyir sbrul gdug pa gso zhing khron pa gdug pa rko zhes 'gyod nas/ chung ma dang bu la bsgo ba/ sbrul bdug pa gsum gyi khron pa myur du tshangs shig/ sbrul gdug pa gsum yang kho bo bdag
268b4(mdo sde): bsrego zhes bsgo ba dang / las byed pa'i mi rnams kyis de ma thag 'a khrod pa de yang bsrub nas med par byas// de nas sbyin bdag des sbrul gdug pa'i khron pa de med par byas nas/ phyi rol du
268b5(mdo sde): 'chag tu song ba las/ sbyin bang gi kha zas dug can gyi shi ba ra gyur pa dag thams cad tshig 'thun par sbyin bdag 'dis bdag cag la kha zas dug can byinas/ bdag cag snga
268b6(mdo sde): shi bar gyur pa yi no// bdag cagis de ltar shes na/ der ma song yang rung zhes 'gyed pa skyeso// de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de yang dge ba bcus sems can 'atul te/ sems
268b7(mdo sde): can dag lha dang mi'i mtho risu skye zhing 'dod pa lnga la 'dod dgur longs spyod rod kyi/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dnga'i che ba las mi thar pa yang de dang 'dra'o// de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
268b8(mdo sde): bo de'i mdo la bdag bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos sgrubs te/ sems can rnams kyang de la klog pa dang / 'dod pa dang / 'dri ba dang / gam par bya ste/ skye shi'i
269a1(mdo sde): / 'khor ba yongasu spangs zhing mya ngan las 'das pa theb par bya'o// zhes dam bca so// de'i tshe na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir/ 'dzan+mA'i gleng nas sa
269a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chosus shes zhes gnas kun tu btag so// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos 'dod pa'i phyir kun tu bkar btags kyang shes pa ma byu // mtha' khob kyi yul chung gcig tu phyin pa
269a3(mdo sde): dang / den bra ze gci gcig sangs rgyas kyi chos shes nes zer// de nas bram ze de'i steng du po nya btang nas po nya de bram ze ga la bde phyin nas/ btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos shes ma zhes drisan
269a4(mdo sde): she so zhes ze'o// de nas po nyas bram ze'i rkang pa la mgo bos bya gra byas nas/ btsun pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos spyan 'dren du btang gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de
269a5(mdo sde): ga la ba der gshegasu gsol/ de nas bram ze yang der 'ongs nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rgyang ma nas bsu ste/ rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bde bar byon tam/ 
269a6(mdo sde): du nyon mongs par gyur tam/ ngal bar ma gyur tam zhes gtam dris te pho brang gi nang du khrid nas po brang gi dbus rgyal po'i gdan la bzhago// bram zes kyang gdan la dkyil mo krung
269a7(mdo sde): bcas te 'dugro// de'i tshe rgyal pos bram ze bde bar 'dug nas/ dgos pa'i yo byad rnams kun tu phul te sbyin pa byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te bram ze de la ston pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi sa
269a8(mdo sde): shes pa/ zhes dras pa dang / bram ze na re bdags sangs rgyas kyi chos shes zhes zer ro// de nas rgyal pos bram ze la ston pa chen po bdag la bstan cing bshad gsol zhes byas nas/ bri
269b1(mdo sde): ze na re rgyal po khyod ni shin tu glen no// kho bos sangs rgyas kyi chos bslabs pa na/ yun ring du dka' ba'i sdug bsngal myong nas gdod lobs pa yin na/ nga rgyal pos thal phyung du thos par
269b2(mdo sde): 'dod dam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ston pa chen po 'o na ci zhig 'dod/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag la mchod pa phul cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ston pa chen po mchod pa ci zhig 'dod/ gros sam/ 
269b3(mdo sde): mal cha 'am/ bza' ba 'am/ gtung ba 'dod dam/ 'on te gser ram/ dngul lam/ rin po che 'dod dam/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag de 'dra ba'i mchod pa mi 'dod do// rgyal pos
269b4(mdo sde): smras pa/ mchod pa de dag mi 'dod na/ 'o na ban glang ngam/ rta 'am/ theg pa 'dong ngam/ 'on te yul lam/ grong khyer ram/ chung ma 'am/ bu 'dod dam/ rol me 'am/ glu 'am/ gar
269b5(mdo sde): byed pa 'dod dam/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag ni de dag gang yang mi 'dod do// gal te lus la rma stong phyung ste/ rma'i nang mar blugs la me mar snying po btsugs te/ mar me stong / 
269b6(mdo sde): 'bar bar mchod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan cing bshang bar bya'o// gal te de ltar mi nus na bdag langs te 'gro zhes smras nas/ rgyal pos skad cig tsam lan ma smras kyi bar du
269b7(mdo sde): khri las babaso// de nas rgyal pos phang du blangs nas ston pa chen po cung zad nyal bsrid du gsol/ ba dag shes pa zhan zhing bsod nams tshungs pas cung zad bsams te mchod pa
269b8(mdo sde): bgying zhes smra'o// ngo'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ khang gis lus 'di thog ma med pa 'dus nas shi ba grangs med par myong na yang chos kyi phyir
270a1(mdo sde): ma shi'ing yang bdag lus 'di yang mthar 'jig cing rul par gyur pas phan pa med pa der ni dus la babo snyam bsam nas/ ston pa bram ze la 'di skad ces smras// 
270a2(mdo sde): ston pa chen po bdag mchod pa 'dod pa bzhin 'gyang ngo // de nas rgyal po pho brang du song nas/ btsur mo rnams la da ni bdag cag bye 'bral zhes smraso// btsun mo rnams de skad ces smras
270a3(mdo sde): pa thos nas spangs shing 'khyams te/ mi nyes gtal med/ rgyal po de ltar ri zhig mdzad skam dgengs shes gso'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag lus 'di la mar me stong zhig btsugs ten
270a4(mdo sde): pa bram ze la mchod pa bya sa mo// btsun mo rnams kyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ sa la 'gre zhing cho nges btab te rgya'o// ring zhig lon pa dang phyir dran pa rnyed do// rgyal po chen po 'jig
270a5(mdo sde): rten na bdag lus las phangs pa med de/ nyes te dog nas go sa bi'i rim gro cher byed na/ ci'i phyir bang gi lus la mtho 'tsham zhing gnod par bgyid// rgyal po ni mkhas pa'i blo
270a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa lags na/ nga ltar myos sam/ len te yi dwags kyis brlabs sam/ ci nongs/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de lta bu gang yang ma yi no// 'o na ci'i phyir de lta bu'i gnod pa mdzad cing bram ze la
270a7(mdo sde): mchod par dgengs rgyal pos smras pa bdag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod de/ sems can thams cad kyi don byed par sem so// de ltar sems can thams cad la dgongs na/ ci'i phyir bdag cag
270a8(mdo sde): rnams bkol bar gyur/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 'jig rten na mdza' sdug thams cad mthar bye 'bral du gyur te/ de bas na bang gis lus kyis chod pa byas te/ khyed dang sems can thams cad kyi munaH
270b1(mdo sde): / khang par mis chen po'i sgron ma gzugs shing / smye shir 'khor ba'am rig pa'i mun pa snang bar byas la// kun nas bkris pa'i nyon mongs pa'i mdung pa bsad/ 'khor ba'i skyon las bskrun
270b2(mdo sde): nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnasu dgod pa'i cha du bsam gyis khyed rnams bar chad dang bgegs ma byed cig/ de'i tshe btsun mo rnams de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas/ brnangs pa ltar tsa
270b3(mdo sde): mi smra zhing skang chen phyung ste ngu zhing rang rang gi sgra 'ba'o// bdag cag la bsod nams med/ bkra mi shes pas gson por bdag cag la lha med par gyur ces smra'o// rgyal po de la rgyal ba
