347b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ de nas khrims lnga gang yin pa brjod de/ pha rol pos khrims lnga'i ming shes par bya'o// de bzhin du gsol pa dang / zhu ba bzhi'i las byas nas/ tshul khrims rdzogs par
347b4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu gnas bzhi dang / rtsa ba bzhi dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum shes shing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ brjod cing bstan par bya'o// yang gzhan du na skyabasu
347b5(mdo sde): 'gro ba byas nas/ srog mi gcod pa'i khrims bstan na/ khrims thob par 'gyur te/ de bas na khrims gcig bdapas/ khrims lnga thob pa ces bya ste/ gal te khri
347b6(mdo sde): gcig thub na/ khrims lnga char thub ces bya'o// yang gzhan du na/ khrims lnga gcig la gcig 'brel pa yang yin la/ thog ma nas khrims lnga mnom par dam bcas pa'i phyir ro// 
347b7(mdo sde): yang gzhan du na khrims lnga mi mnos pa'i 'og tu khrims thob bo// ston pa kha cig ni skyabasu 'gro ba gsum byas nas/ khrims lnga thob ces bya ba ni don bden pa ste/ ji ltar gsol pa dang
347b8(mdo sde): nu bi'i las byas pa bzhin no// yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims nod pa dang / khrims bcu nod pa dang / khrims lnga nod pa bshad pa bzhin no// gsol pa/ gal te sngar gsum la skyabasu mchis te
348a1(mdo sde): dge bsnyen du gyur pa rmang kyis gal te khrims lda nad na// khrims btsun kyang chug skyab su mchi ba gdod bgyi 'tshal lams/ bka' stsal pa/ srub su 'gro ba gsumam
348a2(mdo sde): byas kyang / sngar gsub la skyangasu song bas tshul khrims kun thob bo// gsol pa/ gal te gsum la skyab su 'gro ba yang bgyis// gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyang ma bgyis na/ khrims po
348a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ram/ bka' stsal pa khrims lnga dang / yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims dang khrims bcu nad pa gsum la skyabasu song nas khrims 'thob bo// gal te tshul khrims rdzogs par
348a4(mdo sde): mnas pa ni/ gsol ba dang / nu ba bzhi'i las byas pas/ tshul khrims rdzogs par 'gyur gyi/ gsub skyabasu song bas ni ma yin no// tshul khrims rdzogs par mnon pa ni de'i yon tan dang / 
348a5(mdo sde): bsod nams che bas na/ las cung zad tsam 'am/ rkye/ na cung zad tsam gyis bsgrub par 'gyur bas de bas na sgyu/ nyebasu 'gro ba gsum dang / dge slong bcur nang du gsol pa
348a6(mdo sde): dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byas pas tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro// khrims lnga dang / yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims dang / khroms bcu ni yon tan dang mthu de tsam du mi che bas de bas na/ 
348a7(mdo sde): gsum la skyabasu song bas/ tshul khrims thob par mi 'gyur te/ las mang po dang / rkyen mang po mi dgos so// gsol pa/ tshul khrims rdzogs par mnos pa'i 'og tu/ rtsub bzhi dang
348a8(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum 'ba' shig ni bstan la/ gzhan dag rdzogs par mi ston/ bka' rtul pa/ tshul khrims rnam pa gnyis ni nang gi lci ba yin te/ rtsa ba bzhi las
348b1(mdo sde): gcig nyams na yang phyir gsor mi rung ngo // lhag ma ni gsor rung mod kyi gso ka' ste/ de yang dge 'dun la mgu ba dang / chad pir las byas la gang na dge 'dun nyi shu yod pa'i mdun du// nyes
348b2(mdo sde): bA bshags dgos te/ 'di ni bsrung dka' bas/ bsrung dgos pa'i phyir smos so// gzhan slabs na bsrungasla ba'i phyir smos mi dgos te/ de bas na rnam pa 'di gnyis smos kyi/ gzhan ma smos pa
348b3(mdo sde): yin no// gsol pa/ so sor thar pa'i khrims 'di zag pa med pa'i khrims lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims lags/ bka' stsal pa/ zag pa med pa'i khrims kyang ma yin/ 
348b4(mdo sde): la/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims kyang ma yin// so/ sor thar pa'i tshul khrims 'di ni// gal te sangs rgyas la 'jig rten du gshegs na/ tshul khrims 'di yod kyi/ gal
348b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'jig rten du ma gshegs na/ tshul khrim ngas 'di med do// zag pa dang ba dang / bsam gtan gyi tshul khri mas ni/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs kyang rung / ma
348b6(mdo sde): gshegs kyang rung / dus thams cad kyi thams cad du yod do// so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni bcas pa las yod par 'gyur gyi/ zag pa med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni
348b7(mdo sde): bcas pa las yod pa ma yin no// so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni gzhan las thob par 'gyur gyi/ zag pa med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni gzhan las thob pa ma yin no// sa
348b8(mdo sde): sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni gnyid kyis log gam ma log pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdig pa 'am/ lung du mi sten pa'i sems kyi dus thams cad du yod do// zag pa med pa dang / bsas
349a1(mdo sde): gas shi gangan gyi tshul khrims ni// bsam gtas 'dug pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sems la nges pa'i / tshul khrims yod kyi/ sems gzhan thams cad la med do// so so thar pa'i
349a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims ni mi'i nang 'ba' shig na yid kyi/ zag pa med pa dang / bsam gtin gyi tshul khrims na lha dang / mi gnyis la yod do// so so thar pa'i tshul khrims ni/ 'dod pa'i khams 'ba'
349a3(mdo sde): shig na/ yid kyi zag pa med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams na/ rdzogs par ma yod do// zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / so sor
349a4(mdo sde): thar pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sangs rgyas kyi slob ma 'ba' shig/ la yod mod kyi/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni/ mu sgeg/ sa can la yang yod do// gsol pa/ dge bsnyen gyi
349a5(mdo sde): khrims lnga la/ du ni rang bzhin gyi sdig lags/ du ni bcas par sdig lags/ bka' stsal ga/ ba ni ni rang bzhin gyi sdig/ cheng 'thung laMr khrims gcig gi bcas pa'i sdig go// 
349a6(mdo sde): cha 'thung ba ni bag med pa'i le lo'i gnas yin pa ste/ sdig pa bzhi 'grogs 'gyur ro// khrims lnga la chang 'thung ba ni/ bag med pa'i gan yin pas/ khrims bzhi yang nyams par byed
349a7(mdo sde): do// dperan/ sangs rgyas 'od srung kyi tshe/ dge bsnyen zhig chang 'thungs pa'i rkyen gyis/ gzhan gyi chung ma la 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yang byas/ pha rol po'i bya yang brkus nas
349a8(mdo sde): bsad do// gzhan zhig gis khyod ce'i phyir 'di ltar byed ces dris na/ bdag gis byas pa med ces zer te/ de ltar rang 'thungs pas khrims bzhi char cig char nyams par byas so// chang
349b1(mdo sde): 'thungs na mtshams med pa bzhi yang byed par 'gyur te/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen 'ba' shig byed mi nus so// 'di yang sngon gyi las kyis gnye' ba ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang slo ba dang mi dran
349b2(mdo sde): par spro ba skyo bar 'gyur ro// chang 'thungs pas ban glang myong ba ltar myos shing 'khrug par 'gyur te/ chang gis myos na yang dag pa'i las bya ba/ bsam gtan dang mdo sde klog pa
349b3(mdo sde): dang nya'adon pa dang / dge 'dun gyi las bya ba rnams shor bar 'gyur te/ rang bzhin gyi sdig pa ma yin mod kyi rang bzhin gyi sdig pa dang 'dra'o// de nas ma 'gags pas yang bcom
349b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge bsnyen gyi khrim sra lta bu sems can 'ba' shig las khrims thob bam/ sems can ma yin pa las kyang thob par rung / len te gsang
349b5(mdo sde): du rung ba dang / brkur yod pa dang / mi tshangs par spyad du ru/ nga ba dang / brdzun sgra rung banyid sems can las khrims thob/ par 'gyur ram/ 'on te gas du mi rung ba dang / brkur
349b6(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dang / mi tshangs par spyad du mi rung ba dang / brdzun smra mi rung ba dang / sems can las kyang khrims thob par 'gyur/ bka' stsal ga sems can las ni khrims bzhi thab
349b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur gyi/ sems can ma yin pa las chang mi 'thung po'i khrims thob par 'gyu ro// sems can du gtogs pa gsad du rung ba 'am/ gas du mi rung ba 'am/ mi tshangs par spyad
349b8(mdo sde): du rung ba 'am/ mi rung ba 'am/ bskur rung ba 'am/ mi rung ba 'am/ brdzun smra rung ba 'am/ mi rung ba thams cad las tshul khrims thib ste/ mtshams med pa'i sems can dmal ba yon
350a1(mdo sde): chad 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched man chad stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du srog dang
350a2(mdo sde): bcas pa thams cad las/ tshul khrims 'di bzhi thob par rung ste/ de yang thog ma tshul khrims nod pa'i tshe/ srog thams cad mi gcad pa dang / thams cad ma byin par mi len pa dang / thams
350a3(mdo sde): cad la mi tshams par mi spyad pa dang / brdzun thams cad mi smra'o zhes bya ba'i mtha' dang tshad gzung du med pas/ de bas na sems can thams cad las tshul khrims mi thob par 'gyur ba/ 
350a4(mdo sde): med do// tshul khrims 'bogs pa cho ga bzhin du byas na/ sngar khong du chud cing yid ches par bya ba'i phyir chos bshang la sems can thams cad las la byams pa dang / snying rje'i
350a5(mdo sde): sems bskyed du gzhug go// de ltar lhag par mos pa'i sa mas skyes na/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur/ ra ro// yang tshul khrims thob pa ni sems can thams cad
350a6(mdo sde): las/ so so nas tshul khrims bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ tshul khrims bzhi so sor dbye na/ tshul khrims bcu gnyi su 'gyur ro// sems can las srog mi gcod pa dang / ma byin par mi
350a7(mdo sde): len pa dang / mi tshangs par mi spyod pa dang / brdzun mi smra ba las bzlog pa'i nyes pa bzhi skye ba yang / rgyu dang rkyen gsum gyi phyir te/ de yang 'dod chags las skye ba dang / zhe sdang
350a8(mdo sde): las skye ba dang / gti mug las skye ba'o// sems can thams cad la mi dge ba bcu gnyis po 'di yod de/ mi dge ba 'di las bzlog na/ dge ba'i tshul khrims kyi rnams par
350b1(mdo sde): rig khyed kyi gzugs bcu gnyis thob par 'gyur ro// dpag tu med pa'i sems can thams cad las thob pa yang de dang 'dra'o// gal te dgra bcom pa khri phrag brgya'am/ 'bum
350b2(mdo sde): phrag brgya mya ngan las 'das kyang / thog ma dgra bcom pa de dag las tshul khrims thob na/ dgra bcom pa mya ngan las 'das kyang / tshul khrims ni nyams par 'gyur ba ma yin no// chang mi 'thung
350b3(mdo sde): ba'i khrims ni lus 'di thog ma nas thi' bar du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ ji tsam chang du gtogs pa thams cad la nub re zhing khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi
350b4(mdo sde): gzugs thob ste/ thog ma khrims nod pa'i tshe// chang thams cad mi 'thung ngo zhes byas pas gal te chang thams cad zad kyang / tshul khrims ni rtag tu yod pas mi nyam so// gsol
350b5(mdo sde): gla thog ma khrims nod pa'i tshe/ bud med thams cad kyi sgo gsum nas/ 'dod pas log par mi g.yem pa 'i khrims mnos la/ phyis chung ma blangs na/ tshul khrims
350b6(mdo sde): 'di nyams par 'gyur ram/ bka' stsal ga nyams par mi 'gyuraro// ji lta bu zhe na/ thog ma bud med la 'dod pas log par mi g.yem pa'i khrims thob la/ 'di ni bdag chung ma
350b7(mdo sde): yin pas 'dod pas log par g.yem pa ma yin te/ khrims 'di nyams par mi 'gyuraro// don 'di dang sbyar na thams cad 'thun te khrims brgyad dang / khrims bcu dang / sems can dang
350b8(mdo sde): sems can ma yin pa'i rnams las/ tshul khrims thob pa yang de drung 'dra'o// tshul khrims nyis brgya lnga bcu yang / sems can kun la/ sa se nas tshul khrims bdun bdun zhig zeb
351a1(mdo sde): ste/ de yang rnam par dbye na/ tshul khrims nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la lus dang ngag gi sdig pa bdun 'byung ste/ sdig pa 'byung ba 'di
351a2(mdo sde): yang rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gsum gyis skye'o// de yang 'dod chags kyi skye ba dang / zhe sdang gis skye ba dang / gti mug gis skye ba ste/ de ltar na rgyu dang rkyen gsum gyi sdig pa bdun bdun skye ste/ de
351a3(mdo sde): ltar na ma dge ba'i sdig pa bdun gsum nyi shu gcig go// sdig pa de las bzlog na tshul khrimasu 'gyur te/ sems can gcig la rdul khrims kyi rnam par rigs byed kyi gzugs
351a4(mdo sde): shu rtsa gcig yod pa bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la yang de dang 'dra'o// don de dang sbyar na dus gcig tu tshul khrims grangs med pa thob par ni rung gi/ dus gcig tu cig car1
351a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba 'am/ dus gcig tu med par 'gyur ba ni// tshul khrims nyams shes bya ba ni/ gal te tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba nyams na/ gang nas gong du 'phar bar mi 'gyur
351a6(mdo sde): te/ ci ste tshul khrims la phyis nod na yang / tshul khrims thob par mi 'gyur ro// dper na/ nyin zhag gcig gi yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims kyi rtsa ba nyams na phyis khrims brgyad dam/ khrims
351a7(mdo sde): lnga 'am/ khrims bcu 'am/ khrims rdzogs pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims sam/ zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims sam/ tshul khrims 'di dag gang yang nod du mi rung ngo // gal te
351a8(mdo sde): tshul khrims ldi'i rtsa ba nyams na yang / khrims brgyad dam/ khrims bcu 'am/ tshul khrims rdzogs pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims sam/ zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims
351b1(mdo sde): thams cad thob par mi rung ngo // gal te khrims lnga nyams pa'i 'og tu/ khrims lnga phul la/ khrims bcu nod pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gal te khrims phul ba'i 'og tu khrims lnga nad kyang
351b2(mdo sde): rung khrims brgyad dam/ khrims rdzogs pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi rdul khrims sam/ zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims mnos kyang / khribs gang yang mi thob bo// gal te khrims bcu 'am/ 
351b3(mdo sde): khrims rdzogs pa'i rtsa ba nyams na/ gong nas gong du 'phar ba dang / khrims phul te khrims nod pa ni ji ltar khrims lnga las bshad pa dang 'dra'o// gsol pa/ bsam gtan gyi tshul
351b4(mdo sde): khrims dang / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims 'di gsum las tshul khrims mchog ces bgyi ba gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsam
351b5(mdo sde): gtan gyi tshul khrims mchog ste/ gzhan du na so sor thar/ ba'i tshul khrims kyang mchog yin no// de ji lta zhe na/ ga/ la te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs na// khrims
351b6(mdo sde): 'di yod par 'gyur gyi/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni thams cad kyi dus su yod do// so sor thar pa'i rdul khrims ni sems can dang / sems cad pa
351b7(mdo sde): yin pa las kyang thob par rung gi/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can las theb pa ma yin no// so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can
351b8(mdo sde): thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyi thob par 'gyur gyi/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni byams pa'i sems kyis thob pa ma yin re// so sor thar pa'i
352a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dzin pa 'khor rnam pa bdun 'jig rten na yod cing theg pa rnam gsum gyi 'bras bu rgyun mi chad par byed pa'i gzhir 'gyur ba/ 
352a2(mdo sde): yin gyi/ bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni de lta bu ma yin te/ de bas na khams gsum na/ mchog rab phul du gyur pa yin no// thog pa'i khrims nod pa'i
352a3(mdo sde): tshe/ gsol pa dang nub bana'i las byas ma thag tu tshul khrims rdzogs par 'gyur// thog mir sems skad cig ma dang po'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs ni las
352a4(mdo sde): shes kyang bya/ las kyi lam zhes kyang bya'o// sems kyi skadacig ma phyi ma las khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs byung ba ni las shes bya'i/ las kyi lam ma yin no// de
352a5(mdo sde): lta bas na sems kyi skad cig mdang po las/ tshul khrims kyi nam po ro rig byed kyi gzugs bsam pa yong su rdzogs/ te/ bsam pa dang ldan pas/ bsam pa'i las kyi lam
352a6(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// tshul khrims lnga mas rgyu byas te/ tshul khrims lhag ma'i rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs las kyis grub pas/ de bas na de la las shes byi'i las kyi lam ma yin no// dang po'i/ 
352a7(mdo sde): sems skad cig ma cigi khrims ni tshig dang yang bcas la/ tshi ga med pa yang yino// phyir rim gyis skye bo'i khrims ni/ cho ga med pa 'ba' shig dang ldan gyi cho ga dang bcas pa ma yin no// 
352a8(mdo sde): zag pa'i rnams da cig ma zhici ga gi khrims ni/ chu ga khrims shes pa ga/ dge ba spyod pa zhes pa dag/ 'dul gyi zhes kya bya'o// khyis rims kyi dem thas rtse ba'i tshul khrims
352b1(mdo sde): kyang den de dang ldan no// de nas ma 'gags pa yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ dus gsum du bkul po'i nang na dus gang gas tshul khrims theb par 'gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ 
352b2(mdo sde): ltar dus kyi sems skad cig ma gcig gis khrims thob par 'gyur ro// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa ni ches yin te/ sems can ma yin pas khrims mi theb kyi/ nga ltar gyi sems skad
352b3(mdo sde): cig ma gcig ni sems can yin pas na/ khrims 'thob bo// gsol pa/ dge ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims thob bam/ mi dge ba'i sems kyis sam/ 'on te lung du ma bstan pa'i sems
352b4(mdo sde): kyis sam/ sems med pas khrims thob par 'gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ thams cad kyis theb par 'gyur te/ theg ma dge ba'i sems kyis dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la phyag byas la/ ches gos
352b5(mdo sde): dang lhung bzed blangs te/ mkhan po gang yin pa la gsol ba gang ba bo// de nas tsog tsog por 'dug la thal mo sbar la/ gsel ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las bar chad med la dge
352b6(mdo sde): ba'i sems kyis khrims rdzogs pa ni/ dge ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims theb pa zhes bya'o// gal te de ltar che ga rims kyis byed pa na/ rtag tu dge ba'i sems dang ldan te/ las byed pa
352b7(mdo sde): las gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang la sogs pa mi dge ba'i bsam pa byung na/ sems de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs
352b8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa de ni/ mi dge ba'i sems kyis khrims thob pa zhes bya ste/ de yang theg mi'i dge ba'i sems dang / dge ba'i las kyi shugs kyis khrims thob pa yin gyi/ mi dge ba'i sems
353a1(mdo sde): kyis thob pa ma yin no// sngal dge ba'i sems kyis che ga'i las byas la gsel ba dang nu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i re/ gal te gtsang leg gam yur na/ leg cing yur ba'i
353a2(mdo sde): sems las khrims kyi rnam pa'i rig byed kyi gzugs skye ba ni lung du ma bstan po'i sems kyis khrims thob pa zhes bya'o// sngar dge ba'i sems kyis de ga bas la/ gsel ba dang / zhu ba
353a3(mdo sde): bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshe/ 'geg pa'i ting 'dzin la sems par zhugs na/ de'i tshe khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs dang ldan pa de ri/ sems med pa las khrims theb pa zhes bya'o// 
353a4(mdo sde): ma 'gags pas yang gsel pa/ gal te khrims lnga ma mnos pa'i bal byung khrims bcur zhes na/ khrims thob par 'a gyur ram/ bka' stsal pa/ dus gcig tu dge bsnyen gyi
353a5(mdo sde): khrims dang / dge slong gi khrims rnam pa gnyis thob bo// gal te khrims lnga yang ma mnas/ khrims bcu yang ma lanas pa rabal byung khrims rdzogs pa'i ma des na yang / dus
353a6(mdo sde): gcig tu khrims gsum char thob par 'gyur// ma 'gags pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te khrims rdzogs par ba nges pas dus gcig tu khrims rnam pa gsum car theb par 'gyur/ 
353a7(mdo sde): rims kyis sngar khrims lnga mnas la/ de'i 'og tu khrims bcu mnas te/ phyis khrims rdzogs pa mchod de zhes bgyi yang ci 'aral/ bka' stsal pa/ dus gcig tu tshul khrims gsum par
353a8(mdo sde): thob med kyi/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos la ldag par shes pa ni/ gder mi za bar rim gyi sngar khrims lnga ma nas te/ dul bar byas la dad pa dang mos pa ldog par skyes nas/ de'i reg tu khrims ba
353b1(mdo sde): mnod de// khrims bcu nos nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba lhag par skyes nas/ de'i 'og tu rdul khrims rdzogs par mnos na/ de ltar ril gyis sangs rgyas kyi ches kyi 'thob cing les pa brtan pa ye shegs par
353b2(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa yang bags kyis zab pa dang 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi ches kyi rgyam ter 'jug pa yang de dang 'ang ste/ tshul khrims rdzogs par cig ma la zhes
353b3(mdo sde): go rims kyang sher la sbed lam yang nyams par 'gyu'o// gzhan du dz+wal khrims kyang sems can kha cig ni khrims lnga ma zhes pas/ lam gyi 'bras bu zab par 'gyung ba yang yong // se
353b4(mdo sde): can kha cig ni tshul khrims bcu mazhes pa'i rkyen gyis lam gyi 'bras bu theb pa yang yod de// de ltar rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa tha dad pas na/ de bzhis gshegs pas ge rims bstan pa yinas
353b5(mdo sde): gal te sngar khrims lnga mnos pa la ro'i reg tu khrims ba tsu la nes na/ khrims bcu mnos pa'i re yang khrims gi/ sa ka dang ldan re// khrims lnga dang khrims bcu mdzes
353b6(mdo sde): pa'i reg tu/ khrims rdzogs par mdzes na/ rdzogs par mazhes pa'i tshe khrims gsum char dang yang ldan ro// khrims lnga dang khrims bcu dang / khrims rdzogs par mdzes pa rnam pa bdun la
353b7(mdo sde): gsol pa dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i khrims 'ba' shig ri rims kyis dus gsum du thob bo// lhag pa rnam pa drag ma jed pa ni dus gcig gis theb kyi dus gsum gyi rim pa med de// de
353b8(mdo sde): lngar tshul khrims rnam pa gsum dus gcig tu theb pa 'gal te/ tshul khrims phyir 'bul ba'i de/ bdag ri deng par chang dge slong yin te/ dge slong ba yin no// des spras pas rdul khrims
354a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa ya ba ga nu khrims pams med pa la men pa nga/ phung khrims mas med pa ma yin pa me pa/ du khrims rang dul khrums bcu mas pa
354a2(mdo sde): byin mad bdag dge bsnyen yim// dge sbyong ma yin no// zhes smras pa khrims bcu me pa zang gyi/ khrims lngas de// gal te bdag ni khyim pa dang rag tu byung ba'i khrims thams cad 'a
354a3(mdo sde): te/ bdag la skyabasu 'gro ba'i dge bsnyen du zung shig ces smras ra/ tshul khrims rnam pa gsum cig mar med kyang skyabasu 'gro ba gsum med pa ma yin re// go ribs kyis tshul
354a4(mdo sde): khrims rnam pa gsum thob pa dang / phyir dbul ba'i tshi ga dang / rim pa'ini ji ltar dus gcig tu khrims thob pa bstan pa dang 'dra'o// gsol pa/ gal te sngon dge bsnyen las
354a5(mdo sde): rab tu byung ste/ khrims bcu ma nes na/ khrims lnga ma mchis par mi 'gyur ram/ bka' stsasngal pa/ med par mi 'gyur te mi dang go rims brjes par zad kyi/ khrims med par 'gyur ba
354a6(mdo sde): ma yino// de yang dge bsnyen gyi ming stor te/ dge sbyong gi ming 'theb bo// khyim pa'i go rims stor gyi rab tu byung ba'i go rims theb bo// gsel pa/ dge slong gi rdul khrims rdzogs pa ma na
354a7(mdo sde): na khrims bcu dang khrims lnga ma mchis par mi 'gyur ram/ bka' stsal pa med par mi 'gyur te/ yang ming dang go rims ster bar zad de/ dge sdang gi ring ste nas/ dge slong gang
354a8(mdo sde): thob bo// dge sbyong gi ge rims ster nas/ dge slong gi ge rims thob ste/ theg ma dang / tha ma'i bar du rdul khrims yin gyi/ ming tsam ni 'bral lo 'deg so// dper na/ skyed shing dang
354b1(mdo sde): shing gi lo ma lta bur dpyid dang du bar ni sde// sten ni ser/ dgun ni skye ste/ de yang dus kyis bsgyur bas shing gi le ma kha reg tha dad par zad kyi/ theg ma nas tha pa'i bar du shing gi lo mar zad
354b2(mdo sde): de/ tshul khrims kyang de dang 'dra bar rtag tu tshul khrims gcig tu zad na/ dus kyis tha dad par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dper na/ 'o ma dang zhe dang mar dang / sar gyi snying po ni/ rnam pa bzhin
354b3(mdo sde): tha dade/ de ltar dus kyis tha dad kyang gcig tu zad pa dang 'dra bar tshul khrims kyang de dang 'dra ste/ dus gsum gyis tha dad kyang tshul khrims la tha dad pa med de// ma 'gags pas yang
354b4(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen gyi tshul khrims nod pa nyams kyis rdzogs par nod par mi nus pa tshul khrims ga ga ma gnyis ma bzhi'i bar du mazhes na/ tshul khrims mnas
354b5(mdo sde): par chud dam/ bka' stsal pa/ des khrims mi 'thob bo// ga sel pa/ gal te khrims mi thob ma de sde dag las phyog sa cha chung ba'i dge bsnyer dang / phyogs mche ba'i dge
354b6(mdo sde): bsnyen dang / phyogs ma rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyem mchis par gsungs na de'i de na ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ de skad ces gsungs pa yang khrims bsrungs pa'i yon tan che drung yad
354b7(mdo sde): pa las dgongs te gsungs kyi de ltar tshul khrims rnyed tu rung ba ni ma yin no// ma 'gags pas yang gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'das khrims lnga nod pa'i nyin zhag gcig gam/ nyin zhag
354b8(mdo sde): gnyis nas nyin zhag bcu'i bar du de ltar ma ched/ khrims theb par 'gyur ram/ bka' stsal pa/ de ltar mi rung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims bcas pa yang so so nas dus dang chang meng / 
355a1(mdo sde): de yang khrims lnga red pa ni gden mi za bar nam 'tshe'i bar du reng dges so// gal te yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims pa red ra/ gden po za bar nyir zag gcig pa
355a2(mdo sde): mnod dges te/ de lnga bas na snga ma mi rudwa // gsel pa dang / zhu ba bzhi'i las bas te/ khrims rnyed pa yang rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yod de// de la khrims lnga ni khrims tha pa'o// khrims ba
355a3(mdo sde): khrims 'bring po'o// khrims rdzogs pa ni khrims rab nges pa'o// khrims lnga la yang rab 'bring rnam pa gsum ste/ gal te chung zhing zhan pa'i sems kyis khrims mdzes pa ni/ khrims tha
355a4(mdo sde): ma zhes bya'o// sems 'bring gis tshul khrims mnos pa ni/ khrims 'bring theb par 'gyur// gal te sems rab kyis tshul khrims mnos pa ni/ khrims rab theb par 'gyur// tshul khrims
355a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa la rab 'bring gsum yod pa yang khrims lnga bstan pa bzhin ro// gal te sngar sems thams khrims man sa pa'i reg tu/ sems rab 'bring gis 'khrim
355a6(mdo sde): bcu mnas na/ khrims lnga ni snga ma las skye zhing lhag med kyi khrims lnga ma gtogs par kha zas dus ma yin par mi bza' ba'i bar du/ khrims lhag pa'i lnga ni lhag pa'i khrims
355a7(mdo sde): su bsgyur te/ tshul khrims sngar ma nges pa lnga ni tha mar 'gyuro// sems tha mas sngar khrims lngam nas la/ de 'og tu sems rab dang 'bring gis khrims rdzogs par mnos ma/ ya pa
355a8(mdo sde): sngar ma rnaMs pa lnga'i skye ba 'am lhag pa med kyi/ khrims snga ma lnga pa gtogs par/ tshul khrims gzhan thams cad tshul khrims rdzogs par nod pa'i par ba dang lhag sems kyis
355b1(mdo sde): mnos pas/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims rab thob par 'gyur ro// de bas na so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni/ nyi ri mas du thob pa med de ngem par byed na/ khrims lnga ni tha ma zhes bya'o// khri mas
355b2(mdo sde): bcu ni 'bring zhes bya/ tshul khrims rdzogs pa ni rab ces bya'o// der gyi sgo nas dbye na/ sems rab kyis khrims lnga pa res na/ khrims de ni rab ces bya/ sems 'bring gis khrims bcu ba rnyes
355b3(mdo sde): na khrims 'dring zhes bya/ sems thams tshul khrims rdzogs par mnos na/ tshul khrims tha ma zhes bya'o// dor dang sngar na sems dang / 'bring dang tha ma las tshul khrims thob pa mi 'a
355b4(mdo sde): te/ nges par gcig tu chad pa med do// gal te mkhan po ni ga la khrims bcu rnyed par gsol ba btab pa las/ khrims pa cu nod pa'i tshe mkhan po mngon sum du ma gyur kyang
355b5(mdo sde): khrims bcu thob bo// gal te khrims bcu red pa'i tshem khan po shin shi bar shes sam/ thos na khrims ma nos kyang khrims mi 'thob bo// gal te shi bar ba shes ma
355b6(mdo sde): thos na khrims theb bo// gsol pa dang nu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshul khrims mnod pa ni/ mkhan po mngon sub dum gyur na/ khrims mnod kyang khrims thob par pa 'gyur te/ dge
355b7(mdo sde): 'dun gyi grangs ma tshangs pa'i phyir ro// gal te dge 'dun gyi grangs chung na mkhan po med kyang khrims man du rung ngo // ma 'gags pas yang gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dge bste
355b8(mdo sde): gyi khrims lnga pas cheng sregs bgyir rung ngas/ bka' stsal pa/ chang spogs byar rung ste/ las rnam pa 'di lnga ni mi bya'o// rkang 'gres phyug kyi ngang spogs kyi las mi bya'o// bdag ca
356a1(mdo sde): gyi phyugs yod na 'tshong du gnang gi/ shan pa la 'tshong du ma rung ba dang / mnga' gdu mched cha'i bag chong sngags kyir mi rung ba dang / bdag la yo
356a2(mdo sde): btsong du rung ba dang / chang gi nong spogs kyi las byar ma rung ste/ bdag nyid la yong na la nga du rung ba dang / srin bu mang du shi bas 'bru bar 'tshing du mi rung ba dang / rgya gar gyi rjes kyi
356a3(mdo sde): de bzhin te/ ga bu sha chur chad ni 'bru mar 'chir ba'i nang srin bu medar ces pa med do// kha dog chen chen po rnam pa lnga bco slag byed pa yang srin bu mang du mtshabs mi rung ste/ yog sha las
356a4(mdo sde): sogs pa yul gzhan dag na mtshan gyi gtso slag byed pa las srin bu mang du shi ste/ de bas na mi gnang ngo // yu la rgya yul yang kha reg mthing ka brtse ba ni/ srid bu mang
356a5(mdo sde): shi bas gtso slag rnam pa lnga'i nang du gtogs// ma 'gags pas yang gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyin zhag ci gi khri mas brgyad ces bgyi ba dus ma lags par phye 'phreng / 
356a6(mdo sde): mi tshal ba ma gtogs pa dgur 'gyur na/ dzaM ltar brgyad ces bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ khrims shes pa ni ches kyis phye 'brengs ma yin par kha bzas mi bza' ba yin te/ khrims brgya
356a7(mdo sde): kyi yan lag yin te/ grelas gyur pas yan lagi khrims brgyad ces bya/ dgur ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ yan lag brgyang ba'i khrims mnos na gang zag de 'khor rnam pa bdun
356a8(mdo sde): 'khor gang gi nang du bsdu/ bka' stsal pa/ nam 'tshe ba'i bar gyi khrims ma mnos kyang / cin zhag gicigi khrims yod pas/ de la yang dge bsnyen zhes bya'o// gnam dun dag ba
356b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ni/ dpa'atshe'i ba'i bar du tshul khrims ma nges pa med la/ dge bsan pa yin zhes byar ni/  dag gcig gi khrims yod pas/ de ni gang zag par mdo zhes mdo sde las kyang
356b2(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor bdu sum gtogs par so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims mchis ma/ bka' stsal pa/ yo yan lag brgyad kyi khrims
356b3(mdo sde): nyid yin no// don de dang sbyang na yan lag brgyad kyi khrims rnyed pa 'khor rnab pa bdun gyi nang du ma gdog so// yang lag brgyad pa'i khrims rong pa'i chos kyi ni/ nyin zhag gcig gi bar du
356b4(mdo sde): sreg mi gcod de zhes tshig de skad chad pas na/ khrims gzhan ram 'tsho'i bar 'ashes pa dang bsrar yang mi rung ngo // gsel pa/ yar lag brgyad kyi khrims ma dad pa/ nyid nag gnyis
356b5(mdo sde): sam/ gsum 'am/ bcu'i bar du cig char mno// rung ngam/ bka' stsal pa/ theg ma sangs rgyas kyis nyin nag gcig khrimasu bcas pas/ de las 'dar mi rung ngo // 
356b6(mdo sde): gal te nyams kyi mje rus na/ 'inazhag cig cing len re ma reng dgos te/ nyin zhag du mnos kyang rung // nyin dag ging gi yar lag brgyad kyi khrims ma nos pa'i thabs ni pha rol po gzhan
356b7(mdo sde): las mnod dgos te/ de yang gang las gnos ce na/ 'khor lnga po gang yang rung ba las mnod dges so// yan lag brgyad kyi khrims ma ros pa'i 'og tu gal te sems can la brdeg btsog
356b8(mdo sde): byas ra tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ma yin no// khrims ma dzes pa'i nyin par brdeg brtseg ma byas la/ pid de nyin brdeg bcog bya bar dam bcas na yang tshul khrims rnam par dag par
357a1(mdo sde): yin te/ dor na lus dang ngag gis ji tsam du tshul bzhin pa yin pa'i las byas na khrims ma nyams med kyi rnam par dag pa ma yin no// gal te lus dang
357a2(mdo sde): ngag rnam par dag kyang / sems kyi 'dod lags kyi rnam par rtog pa bskyed dang/ zhe sdang gi 'pho bo'i rnam pa bskyed na/ yang rnam par dag pa ma yin no// gal te lus dang ngag dang yid
357a3(mdo sde): kyis las gsum rnam par dag kyang / rjesu dran pa drag yid la ma byas na/ de yang tshul khrims rnam par dag ces mi bya'o// yan lag brgyad kyi khrims ma nges pa'i 'og tu rjesu dra da
357a4(mdo sde): drug yid la byas pa/ tshul khrims rnam par dag ces bya'o// mdo sde dag las 'dzal bu'i gling gi rgyal po 'jam+bu'i gleng gi khamasu gtogs pa'i mi thams cad dang / de'i dper yod pa'i
357a5(mdo sde): gser dang ngangangu la dang / ner dbyig thams dad la dbang pa'i bsod nams kyis yan lag brgyad kyi tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams bcu drug mar bgos
357a6(mdo sde): pa'i cha gcig rdul yang mi phod do zhes 'byung ngo // su yang rung yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims nod par byas la bag med pa rarnams rang su rol me 'am/ gal te na kha zas zhim po
357a7(mdo sde): la bag med par bza' ba 'ang / rjed me rnam pa sna rogs yid bzhin du bag med par byas pa'i 'og tu khrims mnod pa ni snga dro yang rudra phyi dro yang rung / khrims theb par mi 'gyu'o// gal
357a8(mdo sde): snga nas khrims pa der sems med la bag med pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa'i 'og tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phreng khrims pa des ra snga dro yang rung / dus thams cad du khrims
357b1(mdo sde): chemanos par ngas pa las bgegs sapa bar chad byung ste/ dbang med pa las pis bgegs dang bar chang med pa'i reg tu khrims mnos na/ snga dro yang rung pi dri yang rung / dus thams cang du
357b2(mdo sde): khrims thob bo// gsel ba/ gal te nyid par khrims bsrungs la/ ma na me mo srung ba'i khrims mdzes na yan lag brgyad kyi khrims thob bam/ gal te mkhan po khrims srung la nyin pa mi
357b3(mdo sde): rung ba'i khrims mnos na/ yan lag brgyad kyi khrims thob par 'gyur ra / bka' stsal pa/ gang yang khrims ri thob bo// de bas na sangs rgyas kyis theg ma nas nyin zhag gcig pa'i
357b4(mdo sde): khrimasu bcas te nges pa'i rang yin pas 'gal bar bya ra mi rung ngo // ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ler de ltar khrims mi thong na/ mde dag las
357b5(mdo sde): dge slong ig zhig 'breg dgen pa zhig na/ yi drags kha cig sdug bsngal sna tshogs myed ste/ la la ni nyin par longs spong bgyid la/ mtshan mo sdug bsngal bgyid pa yang mchis/ la
357b6(mdo sde): la ni mtshan me longs spyod bgyid la/ nyin par sdug bsngal mong ba dag mthong ngo // de bas na de dag kyang sngon mi'i nang na/ nyin par ni khrims srungs la/ mtshan me ni sdig pa bgyid pa
357b7(mdo sde): 'am/ yang na paracan mo khrims srang la/ nyin par sdig pa'i las bgyid pa mi 'thun pa'i don de dag ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ skye ba snga ma'i rgyu dang rkyen 'ba' shig la
357b8(mdo sde): rten du yang mi rung ste/ 'di skad du bshad pa yang mdo sde 'am 'dul ba las bshad pa ma yin te de la bden pa'i don nges pa zhes bya bar mi rung ngo // gzhan du ni 'di skad bshad pa
358a1(mdo sde): 'di ni 'phags pa ka ta ya nas ig zhig gdul ba'i phyir sprul pa yin gyi yang dag pa pa yi mdo zhes 'byung ngo // yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mdzes pa las
358a2(mdo sde): khrims par 'bul na/ nges par 'khor rnam pa lnga la dbul mi dgos kyi/ pa rol po gang zag gcig la khrims phyir dbul lo zhes tshig gcig smas pas/ khrims phul bar 'gyu ro// so
358a3(mdo sde): sor thar pa'i khrims thob pa'i sgo nas dbyen lam rgyud lngar gtogs pa la mi'i rgyud du gtogs pa 'ba' shig gis khrims thob kyi/ rgyud lA ma gzhan gyis khrims mi thob bo// dper
358a4(mdo sde): lha'i rgyud du gtogs pa ni bde ba'i longs spyod la chags shing zhen pas khrims mi 'thob bo// dper ra/ sngor 'phags pa me'u dgal gyi nya gnas rig nad kyis btab pa las/ 'phags
358a5(mdo sde): pa mo'u dag la sum cu rtsa gsum garam du sna na pa 'tshe byed la/ dpyad 'drir song ba las de'i ro lha'i bu rnams/ rab tu dga' ba'i skyed mes tshal du rtser 'deng ba'i khar
358a6(mdo sde): bab nas/ 'phags pa mo'u dag la de dag 'gro ba 'i lam dkar sdod cing 'dug pa las/ lci'i bu rnams 'phags pa me'u dgal la/ migs lnga tsam yang mi 'oms par song ngo // 2
358a7(mdo sde): byed kyi thad kar phyin pa dang / rgyang ma nas mo'u dag la la lag pa bteg pa tsam zhig byas nas/ shing rta khrid de song ngo // de nas 'phags pa mo'u dag la 'di snyam du sem so// 'di byed
358a8(mdo sde): 'di sngon mi'i nang na 'dug pa'i tshe rang dge slob ma yin na/ da ni lha'i longs spyod la chags te/ sngon gyi dran pa nyams par gyur te snga ma bsams ras/ rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jo byed kyi
358b1(mdo sde): rta 'gror med par byir gyis brlab so// de nas 'tshe byed shing rta las babs te 'phags pa be'u dgal gyi rkang pa la phyag byas nas/ me'u dgal gyis rgyu rkyen mang po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
358b2(mdo sde): btam so// 'tshe byed kyis me'u dag la la smras pa/ bdag mi'i nang na 'dug pa'i re/ btsun pa'i slob ma yin pas lag pa tsam bteg ste/ bro dris kyi lho'i bu gzhan dag de ltar byed pa yongs
358b3(mdo sde): lngar skyes pa ni bde ba'i longs sbeng la zhen cing chags pas dbang med de de ltar gyur pa yin no// mo'u dgal gyis 'tshe byed la smras pa/ slob ma zhig nad kyi btab ste na na de la ji ltar gso
358b4(mdo sde): bar bya/ 'tshe byed kyis smras pa/ re shig kha zas mi bza' bar bya'o// de nas mo'u dgal gyi bus lci'i dbang po brgya/ byin la 'di skad ces bskul te// sangs rgyas 'jig rten du
358b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa yang shis 'brang dka' na/ si raskabs skabasu drung du song ste/ dam pa'i chos mi gleng / de nas brgya byin lnga'i dbang pos/ 'phags pa mo'u gal gyi
358b6(mdo sde): bsams pa sems kyis shes nas/ lce'i bu zhig mngags te/ lha'i bu zhig 'bed btang ba las lan gsum gyi bar du bes na ma 'ongaso// lha'i bu de la lha'i bu mo gcig dang rel mo
358b7(mdo sde): byed pa garag las med kyang 'dod pa la chags shing zhen pas/ lha'i dbang po tshig brtsar mod kyi gteng ma pad de phyis gdeng 'ong so// de nas brgya byin gyis ci'i phyir de ltar gyur ces
358b8(mdo sde): dris na/ ji ltar gyur pa drang por gsol to// brgya byin gyis me'u dag la la gsol pa/ lha'i bu 'di la lha'i bu me gcig dang rol me byed pa gcig las med kyang gtong mi bod de
359a1(mdo sde): rtse dga' ma ldi'i dbang por gyur te/ gzhal meng khang sna tshogs mang po dang / lnga'i bu me grangs med pas bskor lde'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa sna tshogs dang / l+r-i
359a2(mdo sde): ral me brgya stong sdeng la longs spyad cing / rtse dga' bas shar daphyogasu bltas ma nub phyogs kyang brjed pa de lnga ci smos te/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa dang phrad pa yang
359a3(mdo sde): dka' dam pa'i chos thos pa yang shi tu dka' bar shes med kyi 'dod pa'i bde bas bcings glags te/ rang dbang med pas shes kyang byar med par gyur to// tshul khrims mnyes pa'i
359a4(mdo sde): res ni dpa' zhing rdul pong pa'i sems kyis rang par dam bcas pas khrims thob par 'gyur te/ lci'i bu lta ba ni 'dod pa'i bde ba la chags pas mi dge ba'i sems
359a5(mdo sde): kyi shas che ste/ dge ba'i sems kyi mthu chung ma tsi'i dbang gis khrims thob par 'gyur/ yi dwags lnga bu ni bkres pa dang skem pas sdug bsngal te/ lus dang sems 'bar zhing
359a6(mdo sde): tshig pa'i phyir ro// sems can dmyal ba pa ni tshe grang sdug bsngal grangs med pas gzir te/ mi bzod pa sna tshogs myong zhing las dang sems gdungs par gyur pas khrims thob pa'i
359a7(mdo sde): rgyu med do// dud 'gre lnga bu ni las kyis bsgribs te/ shes pa med pas khrims mnod pa'i tshig med do// mde sde kha cig las skabs kha cig tu/ klus tshul khrims mnos par byung
359a8(mdo sde): ba dge ba'i sems kyis yan lag brgyad po'i khrims mnos pas/ nyin zhag gicig bar du dge ba'i sems kyis bsod nams ni thob kyi las kyi bsgribs pas tshul khrims ni
359b1(mdo sde): thob pa ma yin no// gling bzhis dbyen lnga'i 'dza m+bu'i gling dang / rub kyi ba lang spyod dang / shar gyi lus 'phags gling dang / gling gsum po 'dir gtogs pa'i rgya mtsho'i gling bran na 'khod
359b2(mdo sde): ba'i mi rnams kyis khrims thob bo// dper na/ nub kyi ban glang spyod na/ 'phags pa bin 'dul gnas par sangs rgyas kyis lung bstan te/ da ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po rgyas
359b3(mdo sde): par byed pas/ 'khor rnam bzhi yang yod do// shar gyi lus 'bogs gling na yang dge slong yod de/ de na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos byed pas 'khor bzhi po dag yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan
359b4(mdo sde): 'ba' shig na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos med de/ tshul khrims kyang mi 'thob bo// de yang bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas bsgribs shing / gti mugs bsgribs pa'i phyir/ 'ang
359b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi snod du ma gyur to// gang zag la rnam pa bzhi ste/ gang zhe na/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / ma ning dang / mtshan ma gnyis pa'o// rnam pa 'di bzhi la skyes pa dang / 
359b6(mdo sde): bud med gnyis kyis ni khrims thob par rung / ma ni nga dang / mtshan ma gnyis kyis ni khrims mi 'thob bo// de yang skyes pa dang / bud med la yang / gang ba ma bsad pa dang / dgra
359b7(mdo sde): bcom pa bsad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku la ngan sems kyis khrag byung ba dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang / dge slong ma la mi tshangs par spyad pa dang / gca' 'brang du rlom tha
359b8(mdo sde): dang / kun gnas byed pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad pa dang / gang zag 'di dag ni gang yang tshul khrims mi thob bo// de la don chen po'i sgo nas brtags na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la shin tu
360a1(mdo sde): rang cing mes pa ni 'dir ma gtogs te/ lnga 'as klu 'am/ yi dwags sam/ gnod sbyin nam/ byang gi sgra mi snyan ram/ ma ning ngam mtshar gnyis pa 'am/ sdig pa mi dge
360a2(mdo sde): ba sna tshegs byas kyang / skyabasu 'gro ba gsum mning du rudra ngo // gsol pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams tshul khrims brnyes pa mnyam 'am/ bka' stsal pa/ mi mnyam mo// tshul
360a3(mdo sde): khrims thob nges bya ba ni sems can dang / sems can pa yin pa'i ris la khrims theb par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas gcig 'jig rten du gshegs na/ sems can grangs med pa ji snyed kyi
360a4(mdo sde): den mdzad do// lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas// phyis sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa dag/ sem/ sa can de dag las kyang tshul khrims brnyes te/ de
360a5(mdo sde): ltar na/ sangs rgyas rnams snga phyir tshul khrims brnyed pa mi mam mo// dper na/ sangs rgyas 'od srung kyis sems can grangs med pa zhig btul te lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das
360a6(mdo sde): kyang / sangs rgyas 'od srung kyis ni sems can de dag kun las tshul khrims brnyes na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas na/ sems can de dag gang las kyang / tshul khrims ma brje so// sangs
360a7(mdo sde): rgyas thams cang 'dra bar dngos po 'di gsum ni mnyam la// gang zhe na/ spyod pa'i tshogs mnyam pa dang / chos kyi sku mnyam pa dang / sems can gyi don mdzad pa mnyam pa'o// sangs
360a8(mdo sde): rgyas thams cang 'dra bar bskal pa grangs med pa gsum kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de yan lag lnga'i chos kyi sku yongasu rdzogs shing / stobs bcu dang / mi
360b1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu rdzogs te/ thams cad kyis sems can grangs med pa ji snyed mya ngan las 'das so// gsol pa/ mdo sde da
360b2(mdo sde): las sangs rgyas gcig 'jig rten du gshegs na/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu snyed mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don mdzad do zhes 'byung na/ ci'i slad du sems can grangs med
360b3(mdo sde): pa'i don mdzad ces gsungs/ bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde las sangs rgyas gcig rten du gshegs na/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu snyed kyi don mdzad ces smos pa ni/ sangs
360b4(mdo sde): rgyas de las grel bar gyur pa la bya ste/ 'gro ba'i sems can de dag kyang la la ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis don mdzad pa yang yod/ kha cig ni slob mas don mdzad pa yang yod/ kha cig ni
360b5(mdo sde): bzhag pa'i chos kyis grol ba yang yod de/ sems can bye/ ba khrag khrig dgu bcu zhes smos pa ni/ sangs rgyas nyid// kyis don mdzad pa la bya/ sems can grangs med
360b6(mdo sde): pa lhag ma ma lus pa mya ngan las 'das shes bya ba ni/ spyir don mdzad pa la bya'o// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa ni gsum mnyam gyi/ tshul khrims brnyes pa ni mi
360b7(mdo sde): mnyam mo// gsol pa/ sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims shes bgyi ba/ sems can dang sems can ma yin pa las thob par 'gyur ram/ zin pa dang ma zin pa kun gyis khrims par 'gyu
360b8(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ sems can sdam pa ma yin pa'i khrims thong bar 'gyur gyi/ sems can ma yin pa las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims mi thob bo// gzhan du na gsad du rung ba'i
361a1(mdo sde): sems can las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob kyi bsang du mi 'angadra ba'i sems can las khrims mi thob bo// yang gzhan du na gsang du rung ba dang / gso
361a2(mdo sde): du mi rung ba'i sems can gnyi ga las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob ces bya'o// dper na/ na pa lug gsod pa ni rtag tu gsod pa'i sems dang chas te/ lug gsod pa
361a3(mdo sde): 'ba' shig yid la byed pas de'i tshad gzung du med ngo // ci ste lnga dang mir skyes na 'phral du gsod pa'i las mi byed kyang / skye ba gcig nas gcig tu 'khor bas phyir lug tu skye
361a4(mdo sde): bi'i chos yod do// de bas na sems can thams cad las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob par 'gyur te/ sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims bcu gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o// sdom
361a5(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa'i khrims bcu gnyis shes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ shan pa dang / gshed ma dang / phag gsob dang // bya gso ba dang / 1sher ba dang / rngon pa dang / bya shor ba
361a6(mdo sde): dang / sbrul shor ba dang / klu la sngags 'debs pa dang / btson rdzi byed pa dang / rkun po byed pa dang / rkun po 'dzin pa dang bcu gnyiso// dar gyi srin bu gso ba yang sdom pa ma yin
361a7(mdo sde): pa'i khrims kyi nang du 'dus so// sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims nyams pa'i dus gsum yod de/ shi ba'i dus dang / chags shing zhen pa zad pa'i dus dang / sdom pa'i tshul khrims
361a8(mdo sde): mdong po'i dus so// dper ma skyab su 'gro ba gsum gnod pa'i tshe/ thog ma'i tshig dang po gicig smras pas/ sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims samaso// de'i 'og tu tshig gnas dang
361b1(mdo sde): gsum la smras pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyuraro// gsol pa/ gang zags sdom pa ma yin pa'i las byed pa na/ dus tshong gang gi tshe/ dge ba'i khrims nyams shing mi
361b2(mdo sde): dge ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ shan pa'i zhes tshig cig dang por smra ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i khrims nyams par 'gyur/ shan pa'o zhes lan gsum smras pas mi dge
361b3(mdo sde): ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur ro// yang gzhan du na gang gi tshe dge ba'i khrims btang ba de nyid kyi me/ dge ba'i khrims thob bo// ci ste dge ba'i khrims srung ba'i gang zag cig bdag
361b4(mdo sde): shan pa'o// zhes dam ni bcas/ khe dang rnyed pa tsam la chags te/ phag drug gso zhing gsong ba'i las byed ra// de'i che ge ba'i khrims nyams pa zhes bya ste/ de ri dge ba'i khrims thob
361b5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o// gal te bdag gzhan pa'o zhes nges parang ma bcas na yang mi dge ba'i khrims thob par 'a gyuraro// mi dge ba'i khrims red pa ni bang gis/ dam bcas
361b6(mdo sde): pa tsam gyis thob par 'gyur te/ pha rol po gzhan las gnod mi dges so// gal te mi dge khrims nyin zhag gcig gar gnyis nas nyin zhag bcu 'am/ le gcig gam lo gnyis
361b7(mdo sde): bar du mnos par dam bcas mngam bcas pa'i dus ring thung las de bzhin thob par 'gyur lo/ de bas na sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ni skye shi 'khor ba la gzhol bar byed kyi/ gong nas
361b8(mdo sde): gang du 'bar ba'i don med do// de ltar mi dge ba'i khrims ni dngos po de nyid kyi theb pa yin te/ dge ba'i tshul khrims dang mi 'dra'o// thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan
362a1(mdo sde): bsab pa'i mdo las ma 'gags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ brgyad pa'o// / thangs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo// / 
362a2(mdo sde): bam po bdun pa// gzhar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drin lan shes pa dang / drin lan bsapa pa dang / thabs mkhas pa chen pos sems can rnams la pan
362a3(mdo sde): dang bde ba'i don byed pa dag dus dang skabs shes na bstan cing bces pa la gnod par mi 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas mngon par 'jig rten du 'byung ba/ 'jigs pa med pa'i rgyal
362a4(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba de bzhir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang da ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu lnga na ba bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dub
362a5(mdo sde): ba'i kho le sgyur ba/ bla na med gaston pa rgyal ba 'jig rje/ na du gshegs te/ skal ba dang ldan pa'i don mdzad de/ skal pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzad nas/ yongasu mya ngan las/ 
362a6(mdo sde): 'angaso// mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i ches la spyod pa'i mo bram ze'i bu yid gzhungs shing rno ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa gtam khrims lnga srung ga/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa zhig byung ngo // dus
362a7(mdo sde): gzhan zhig na bram ze'i bu de yul gzhan zhig tu don gnyer du song song ba las/ 'dren du 'gro ba'i lam de 'jigs sa che bas/ lam grogs lnga brgya dang 'grogs te/ song ngo // lam grogs
362a8(mdo sde): dang 'jigasar phyin nas/ 'jigs de na mi rked lnga brgya zhig gnas te/ rtag tu 'dren po rgyu ba rnams 'jom so// de'i chen mi rgod de dag gis 'dren po de dag gnom par byas nas mi rgod kyi
362b1(mdo sde): dpon po nges/ mi gcig sngar 'dron po de dag ji ltar 'gro ba lta zhing rtog tu btang ngo // de'i tshe mi rgod de dag gi nang na mi gcig cig/ sngon bram ze'i bu de dang mdza' zhing bshes pas sngar mi
362b2(mdo sde): de dag gi nang du 'ongs te/ bram ze'i bu de la 'di skad ces bsgo'o// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar rig par byos shig/ do nub nam gyi cha stong la dgra 'ong gis/ ci nas kyang khyod nyid la gnod
362b3(mdo sde): pa dang / sbas par ma gyur par khyod nyid kyis byol ba'i thabs byos shig par bsgo'o// de'i tshe bram ze'i bu des tshig de dag thos nas/ dper na/ mi brnangs pa ltar ming du yang med la
362b4(mdo sde): bsgrag tu yang med pa bzhin mi bde bar gyur nas/ grogs po rnams la gtam byar ni grogs po rnams kyis mi de bsad kyis dogs ci ste grogs po rnams kyis mi bsad na/ grogs
362b5(mdo sde): po rnams ngan 'gro gsum du sdug bsngal grangs med pa myong bar 'gyur ba ste/ gal te grogs po rnams la ma smras na ni dgras grogs po rnams bsad na/ dgra rnams
362b6(mdo sde): ngan 'gro gsum du ltung zhing sdug bsngal grangs med pa myong ngo // snyam bsams nas/ bdagis sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i thabs byas te/ bdag nyid ngan 'gro gsum du
362b7(mdo sde): ltung zhing sdug bsngal myong yang bla'o snyam bsams nas/ ral gri thogs nas/ sgron ma mi de bsad nas grogs po rnams bde bar byaso// de'i tshe na grogs po rnams kyis de ltar gyur pa
362b8(mdo sde): mthong nas/ bram ze'i bu de la 'di skad ces smraso// bram ze'i bu khyod ni mi'i nang na mchog tu gyur/ shin tu dge ba yin/ ci'i phyir deng 'di lta bu'i sdig pa chen po byed ces smraso// de'i tshe
363a1(mdo sde): / bram ze'i bu des pus mo sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'i sems kyis grogs po dag la 'di skad ces smraso// bdag de ring bya ba'i rigs pa'i sdig pa
363a2(mdo sde): chen po byas te/ de yang sems can rnams la phan pa dang / grogs po rnams la bde bar bya ba'i phyir ro// grogs po rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod nyid kyis mi bsad pa la nged bde bar byaso zhes
363a3(mdo sde): brjo du yang ci yod/ bram ze'i bus smras pa/ bang gis bsad pa'i ming 'di ni dgra ma rungs pa yin te/ dgra 'dis grogs po khyod gso du 'ongs pas/ bdag ni grogs po khyed kyi phyir mi 'di
363a4(mdo sde): srog cad pas na// khyed rnams ni bde bar yul du phyin te/ bdag ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong yang bla 'o// de nas grogs po lnga brgya rnams kyis skad phyung ste
363a5(mdo sde): sde ngus nas/ 'di skad ces smraso// gnam mtha' 'ag na bangs par bya ba ni srog las 'da' ba med do// 'jigs pa'i nang na 'chi ba las 'da' ba med/ de bas na sems can thams
363a6(mdo sde): cad ni lus dang srogaM phyir/ gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / yul sa dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / zas dang / gos kyang yongasu gtong ste/ bdag cag ni deng du phyir lan cig 'tsho ba'i srog
363a7(mdo sde): thob zhes smras nas/ bram ze'i bu khyod sems can gyi phyir ngan 'gro gsum gyi sdug bsngal khyad bsad pas/ bdag cag ni khyed kyi drin shin tu lci bar dran par byed do// drin lci badran
363a8(mdo sde): bas na deng bdag cag bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskye'o zhes smras nas/ thams cad byang chub tu sems bskye'o// de'i tshe na mi rgod lnga brgya rnams kyis
363b1(mdo sde): kyang 'di skad ces smra'o// khyod ni kun gyi mchog shim tu dge ba yi mo zhes zer ma ci'i phyir 'di lta buM'i sdig pa chen po byed/ bram ze'i bus smras pa/ bdag bya bar mi rigs pa'i sdig pa chen/ 
363b2(mdo sde): po byas te/ de yang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / khyed rnams kyi lus dang srog skyabs bya ba'i phyir ro// de nas mi rgod de dag gis bram ze'i bu la smras pa/ khyod nyid kyis mi bsad pa la
363b3(mdo sde): bdag cag la phan pa yang ci zhig yod/ bram ze'i bus smras pa/ mi rgod khyed rnams 'di na 'dug par snga nas shes kyang / bdag cang ma smras te/ rgyal po yang ma sbran bang gi grogs po rnams
363b4(mdo sde): la yang ma smras pa/ gtam ma byas pas khyed kyi lus dang srog bde bar gyur pa yin no// de'i tshe mi rgod de dag gis de skad ces smras pa thos nas 'di snyam du gyur to// bdag cag lus
363b5(mdo sde): dang srog kyang gson no snyam bsams nas/ bram ze'i bu la thal me sbyar te/ skyes bu chen po shin tu leg so// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag gis deng byin chad cing
363b6(mdo sde): ci bya ba bstan du gsol/ bram ze'i bus smras pa/ khyed rnams myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig/ de nas mi rgod rnams kyang drin bsab pa'i phyir/ de ma thag tu bla na med pa
363b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la gnas pa/ byang chub
363b8(mdo sde): yongasu brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin lan bsab par 'dod pa dag rtag tu sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed cing dran par bya'o// rigs kyi
364a1(mdo sde): bu 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ de'i dus de'i tshen bram ze'i bu gzha yin par sems shig ma de'i dus de'i tshe bram ze'i bur gyur pa de ni da ltar nga nyid yino// de'i rgyu rol
364a2(mdo sde): rkyen gyis bskal pa dgu bcu snyed kyi 'khor ba las 'das nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
364a3(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa rin po spyod cing drir lam shes pa dang / drin la rabs pa ni 'di lnga ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa ma/ dge slong gcig lus la 'brum pa
364a4(mdo sde): nad kyis btab nas/ lus la kun nas dag khrag rgyu tu zag pas thams cad kyis mi 'dod de gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gnas khang zhig par gyur pa tha ma'i gi nang du
364a5(mdo sde): bzhago// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ 2khor mang pos gcig gis kyang mi shes par byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyag cig
364a6(mdo sde): dge slong nang pa'i thadu gshegs te/ chus bkru bar dgengs nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams shes par bya ba'i phyir/ brgya bin ldi'i dbang po lha'i 'khor tshad med pa brgya stong gis
364a7(mdo sde): bskor te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog mar bi nan du pa/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/ steng gi na mkha' la 'khod do// de'i tshe na sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i dbang po
364a8(mdo sde): bsod nams brgya las grub pa'i bum pa dam pa'i rang na snying rje chen po'i chu gtsang mas bkang nas lag na thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'angal ra
364b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mdun nas bsu ste/ phyogs gcig tu sdong ngo // de'i ren de bzhin gshegs pas bsod napas brgya dang ldan pa'i phyag brkyang nas/ phyag sor gnyen zhing ring
364b2(mdo sde): ba lnga las 'od zer chen po bkye nas/ lha dang 'khor mang po de dag rnams sdang bar byas te/ 'khor mang po de dag 'dug nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dge slong nad pa'i drung du gshegs
364b3(mdo sde): te/ dbri'i spyi btsugs nas 'od zer bkye nas/ dge slong nad pa sdang bar byas// dge slong nad pa de la reg pa thag tu na pa'i sdug bsngal byang bar gyur te/ rmi'i rnag khrag dang bcas pa'i lus
364b4(mdo sde): kyis skyabasu gsal ras/ lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ma nus pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas pag g.yas pas brgya byin lha'i dbang po las rin po che'i bum pa
364b5(mdo sde): blangs te/ dge slong nang pa'i spyi bo nas chu blugs te/ phyag g.yon pas dge slong nang pa'i lus kyi rma bkrus shing byug pas dge slong dang ba'i rma thams cad de bzhin gshegs
364b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyag rjes ses par gyur te// de ltar rma kun ses nas dge slong de dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo// thugs rje chen po'i yab la phyag 'tsha'o// 
364b7(mdo sde): bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po mchog la phyag 'tsha'o// zhes brjed/ bad gi lus kyi rang rnams ni deng du ses par gyur na/ sems kyi nang 'ba' shig ma sos te/ de bzhin gshegs pas
364b8(mdo sde): thugs brtse ba'i slad bdag la ches kyi sman stsal cing sems kyi nad kyang gse bar gsol lo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong nang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// de
365a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod kyi drir shin tu lci bar dgengs pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pas khyed kyi drin lar bsab par mdzad// de'i tshe dge slong nad pa de shin tu
365a2(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas spro ba dang dga' ba dang / gzeng bstod pa mdzad nas/ dge slong dad pa de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu theb ras/ rig pa gsum dang mngon par shes pa/ 
365a3(mdo sde): drag dang / rnam par grol pa brgyad ldan par gyur to// brgya par lho'i dbang po la sogs pa lha'i 'khor thams cad the tsom du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
365a4(mdo sde): slang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid phyag dar te/ dge slong na nga pa'i lus kyi rma khrag kur bkrus te/ dge slong 'di la shin tu drin lci ba yod de zhes gsungs pa'i don bdag cag la
365a5(mdo sde): dgrol zhing bshadu gsol/ sangs rgyas kyis brgya ba na lha'i dbang po dang / lha'i 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed rnams legs par nyon la
365a6(mdo sde): shi tu yid la zung shig/ dang / dngos po dag bstan par bya'o// brgya byin lnga'i dbang po sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med/ tshang med pa'i pha rol ma rgyal po sdig pa can ches ma
365a7(mdo sde): yin par byed pa/ kun la 'phrog rlom byed pa zhig byung ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po sdig can des blon po lnga brgya zhig bkug nas dku gsang gcig tu bas te/ gsang la btags nas/ blo
365a8(mdo sde): po de dag la 'di skad ces bsgre'o// gang su rung khrims las 'gal bar byas na/ khyed kyis chad pas gcad par dbang bskur gyis/ khyed kyis nor ci thob kyang rudrang dang thun mong
365b1(mdo sde): zhes bsgo'o// de'i tshe na lnga brgya po des rtag tu gzhu ba brdeg byed de/ nor mang du thob pa ni de bzhin du btang gang nor med pa la ni srog la bab kyi du gnod pa byed do// de'i tshe na dge bsnyen cig/ 
365b2(mdo sde): khrims la dgal ba cung zad cig bya bas/ lnga brgya'i gan du khrid nas gzhu brdeg bya bar byas pa las/ dge bsnyen shin tu dge ba yini zhes pas gnod pa ma byas par bta // de'i rkyen
365b3(mdo sde): gyis dge bsnyen de yang shin tu dga' bar gyur to// ko'u shi ka 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na lnga brgya po de dag ni dge slong nad pa 'di yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na dge bsnyen du
365b4(mdo sde): gyur pa de ni da lta rang nyid yin no// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa'i sngon rol gyi drin yang ba yang lci bas glan pa yin no// mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar
365b5(mdo sde): du yang rtag tu mi brjod// de'i tshe na brgya byin lnga'i dbang po dang / lci'i 'khor mang po rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ lha'i 'khor bzhi khri brgya stong snyed kyi bla na med pa yang dag par
365b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub tu sems bskyed nas lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas te/ phyis rang rang gi gnas song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la
365b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me gang drin shes pa dang / drin lan bsab pa ni don rnam pa bzhi la nan tan bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa dang / 
365b8(mdo sde): sems rtsa gcig tu chos nyan pa dang / don yid la byed pa dang / ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du spong pa'o// gzhan yang chos rnam pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ chos la gnas
366a1(mdo sde): kyi gang zag gi rjes mi gnas pa dang / don la gnas kyi yi ge'i rjes mi gnas pa dang / ye shes la gnas kyi rnam par shes pa'i rjesu mi gnas pa dang / nges pa'i don
366a2(mdo sde): gyi mde sde la'i gnas kyi bkri ba'i mdo sde la mi gnas pa ste/ chos 'di brgyad la nan ta dbyed ra ni drin lan shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan na drin lan bsab
366a3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o// dargyang gang ne ma 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa dang / kheng dang / smad pa dang / bstod pa dang / grags pa dang / 'phya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba la mi lta ba'o// gzhan yang dngos po 'di
366a4(mdo sde): ba'i la ra par dbyed pa mi drin la shes pa zhes bya/ drin lan bsad pa zhes kyang bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/ byams pa bsgoms pa'i rkyen gyis sems can sdig pa
366a5(mdo sde): ngar ngag mthong ra/ byams shing snang brtse ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sing rje bsgoms pa'i rkyen gyis/ sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams bathong na mi skye bar lnga zhing mi gtong ba dang / dga' ba
366a6(mdo sde): bsgoms pa'i rkyen gyis slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / pa ma dang / yon tan dang ldan pa rnams mthong na/ dga' sems skyed pa dang / btang snyoms bsgoms pa'i rkyen gyis dgrar gyur pa'i sems
366a7(mdo sde): mthong na/ zhe sdang gi sems pa skyed pa'o// de'i re kun dga' bos tshigasu bcos nas/ sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma nas
366a8(mdo sde): byang chug tu sems bskyed pa na/ drin shes pa dang / drin lan bsab pa'i don gyi dngos po bzhi ji ltar nan tan du mdzad pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa
366b1(mdo sde): sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med/ tshad med pa'i pha rol ra/ sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs shes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
366b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa/ rgyal ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ skal pa dang / 
366b3(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzad do// skal pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi den mdzad nas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/ dam pa'i chos dang gzugs brnyan las ches bya ba yang nub nas/ yul bA ra na se
366b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba na mi rnams kyang bskyed cing bde/ le yang legs te/ rgyal po de yang drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'tshe'i yul de na raM drang seng 'phags shes bya ba zhig yod/ ri de la rgyun
366b5(mdo sde): tharang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gar so// de ma yin pa ma dngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang song yang mang du gan so// de'i tshe de la ri dwags dang gcan zan yang mang du gnas
366b6(mdo sde): de na seng+ge yi dam btan zhes bya ba zhig/ lus kyi sbu gas ra gyi mdog tu 'dug pa/ mthu stobs dang gzi brjid che ba skad phyung na bya rnams kyang se la ltung ba ri dwags rnams kyang 'bros
366b7(mdo sde): pa zhig yod de/ ri de la 'gro zhing rgyu ba dang / rang sangs rgyas dge sbyong gi gzugasu sbed lam du ldan pa gcig dang phrad nas/ shin tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ nyin cig bzhin du nye bar brnyed na/ 
366b8(mdo sde): rgyun tu mdo sde klog pa dang / dam pa'i ches 'chad pa thos par gyur to// de'i tshe na rnon po chen po ma rungs pa zhi gis/ seng+ge'i 'phags pa gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa de mthong nas rab tu dga' ba
367a1(mdo sde): sems skyes te/ 'di skam du sems// gal te bdag gis gser gyi seng+ge de bas de/ pags pa bshus la rgyal po la phul na/ gdon mi za bar bya dga' chen po thob par 'gyur// 
367a2(mdo sde): rabs bdun gyi bar du phongs pa med par 'gyur snyam bsams nas/ yang 'di snyam du bsapas// seng+ge yi dam brtan zhes bya ba 'di ni gcan zur gyi rgyal po yin pas/ mda' gnus kyang mi rdzi/ 
367a3(mdo sde): srid rgyas kyang bar med de/ dbang gis thabs 'di lta bu zhig pa'o// ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng+ge 'di ltar dge slong gi phyi bzhin 'brang bas bdag kyang dge slong gi gzugs bas la/ ches gos kyi
367a4(mdo sde): 'og tu mda' gan sbas la mig pa ba la gos pa dal bus seng ste/ shing dra ba zhig tu 'dug na des bdag mthong ma thag tu gdon mi za bar bdag drung du kheng te/ gal te bdag drang du 'ongs
367a5(mdo sde): nagazhu brdungs pa bkang ste/ dug mnga' phangs nas/ gdonami za bar sade snyam bsams nas/ phyir khyim du 'ongs te 'di sra da ces smras// bdag rgyus kyis rngon pa byed byed de
367a6(mdo sde): gnas na/ gcan zar la spu gser du 'dug pa yong ma thos na mthong ba lta ci smos te/ da bad gis de gsang ba'i phyir sku dang kha spu bregs la chos gos gyen nas phyir yang raM de la song nas
367a7(mdo sde): shing drung zhig na 'dug na/ de'i ro seng+ge yi dam brtar gyis dge slong mthong nas/ rab tu dga' ste mchod rgal nas dge slong de'i drung du bsnyen te/ rkang pa la lngago// de nas rngon pa des seng+ge la
367a8(mdo sde): mda' 'phang sa// de ras dug pangs sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ skad phyung nas gzungs zhing mchod par byas pa la 'di snyam bsam so// 'di ni dge slong gi kha dag bsgyur ba gyur pa yin te/ 
367b1(mdo sde): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan yin pas/ 'di la bang gis gnang ba byan dka' ba ma yi dang / gal te 'di la gnod pa byas te srog dbang po dang bral na/ sangs
367b2(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan ma rung bar byas pa yin no snyam bsams nas/ cang ma byas par bsdad pa las ring po ma lon par dug langs nas lhag par sdug bsngal mi bzod
367b3(mdo sde): bar gyur te// yang bza' zhing bca' snyam bsam pa las/ 'di ni bka' ba ma yin na/ gal te bang gis 'di la gnod pa byas na/ sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa rnams kyis sbed par 'gyur te/ 
367b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten na dge ba byed pa dang / sdig pa byed pa yang bye brag me de/ 'di ni sdig pa can yin te/ bdag gso du 'ongs pas/ gal te bang gis de la bzod pa ma byas na ni/ sdig pa can de
367b5(mdo sde): dang tha dad pa yang med/ gang bzod pa bsgom pa de la thams cad byams par 'gyur// gang mi bzod pa de la ni thams cad snga nga bar 'gyur bas/ de la nyon mongs pa skye bar
367b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ nyon mongs pa skyes pa gyur na skye shi'i 'khor bar 'gyuro// skye shir 'khor ba na mi khom pa'i gnasu skye bar 'phrul mi khom pa'i gnasu skyes na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
367b7(mdo sde): dang bral bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na/ dam pa'i chos mi thos par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos ma thos na/ the tsam gyi dra bas klags par 'gyur/ the tsom gyi dra bas klag par
367b8(mdo sde): gyur na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de bas na bdag ni sdig pa'i sems mi skyed do// sngam bsams nas/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so// 
368a1(mdo sde): bad gi lus sreg yal yang bla yi dge sdig pa'i sems mi skyed/ bdag ri sreg dang bral yang rung / ngur sreg gyer la gnod mi bya// rag tu byung ba'i mi dag la// nam du
368a2(mdo sde): 'ang sems mi bskyed// tshigs bcang pa 'di dag smras nas// de'i dus byas par gyur te/ gnams yang lan drug tu g.yos// gcan zar dang / ri dwags kyang skrag nas/ phyogs bzhir
368a3(mdo sde): dros// sprin meng bar char pa bab nas nyi ma yang 'od mi snang bar gyur te// de'i tshe rngon pa des gos phud nas/ gri thogs nas lpags pa bshus te phyir khyim du seng ngo nge// phyir khyim du song nas
368a4(mdo sde): rgyal ba la phu le// rgyal pos spags pa de mthong nas rab tu dga' ste/ blor po rnams la 'di skad ces smras// bangag skyes nas dud 'gro la lus kyi lpags pa spu gser gyi bdag
368a5(mdo sde): nga 'dag pa yong pa yong ma thos te/ nga 'dir migs ma don sum du mthong ba ngo mtshar che'o zhes rngon pa de la khyed ji lta bu zhig thabs byas te/ lpags pa 'di lta bu thob ces
368a6(mdo sde): dris// de nas rngon pas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol te// rgyal po chen po 'jigs pa med pa stsal na/ drang por smra'o// zhes gsol to// rgyal pos kyang khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin gnang
368a7(mdo sde): bar sgra nas// rngon pa des kyang ji ltar gyur pa bzhin du gsol to// rgyal pos kyang tshig de thos nas mya ngan gyis non te/ dper na/ mi brnangs pa bzhin ming du yang med la/ bsdug tu yang med pa
368a8(mdo sde): lngar mi bde bar gyur te/ blom po chen po thams cad dang / rgyal phran dag 'khor mang ba kun bsdus te/ 'di skad ces brtse'o// khyed rnams shes par gyis shig/ ngas sngon mkhas pa shes
368b1(mdo sde): rab can dag la 'di skad ces thos te/ dud 'gro'i khamasu skyes pa'i nang na lus kyi spu mdog gser lta bur 'dug ma gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' yin zhes zer te/ gal te so
368b2(mdo sde): so'i skye bo las gcig tsam bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don chen po byed pa yin na/ ci'i phyir brngon pa sdig can 'dis de
368b3(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i thabs byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di gal de bad gis blan thabs mkhu dga' 'am/ khal gyi glang po che 'am/ rta 'am/ rin pa che sna bdun nam/ gos sam/ nir zas sam/ 
368b4(mdo sde): nor 'am/ 'bru 'am/ 'di ltar byin par gyur na/ sdig can de dang 'thun par 'gyur te/ de'i grogasu 'gyuraro snyam pa sems nas/ rngon pa de'i srog dbang po bcod do// de ltar rngon pa de
368b5(mdo sde): sreg dbang po bcang nas/ sed+mo'i lpags pa thogs te ri de la sang nas/ shing glang 'go' tsan dan spungs te/ sa d+mo'i lpags pa dang ro bsreg so// de ltar seng+ge'i ro bsregs nas
368b6(mdo sde): rus pa bsdus te/ mchod rten brtsigs nas mchod pa byas// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na seng+ga yi dam brtan zhes
368b7(mdo sde): bya ba de ni da ltar shAkya thub pa nyid yin no// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bstan pa'i phyir/ lus dang srog phyir yal yang bri'i/ sdig pa'i sems mi skye
368b8(mdo sde): ngo ci'i phyir zhe na/ drin shes pa dang / drin bsab pa'i phyir ro// de ltar ci ste zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa nga
369a1(mdo sde): chub myur du thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyun tu brtson 'grus dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten te/ khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa
369a2(mdo sde): gzhom zhing rgud par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshi gcig tsam 'am/ tshigasu bcad pa gcig ma/ don gcig tsam gyi bar du nyan pa la rab tu brtson par byed do// de ltar byang chub
369a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab tshol ba na/ chos 'dod pa'i sems dang / shin tu ldan pas lus dang srog kyang mi phangs par me ma mur gyi lcags sam/ 
369a4(mdo sde): sa gzhi las kyang 'bog cing 'gro ste/ gnod par mi se maso// byang chub sems dpa' ni tshigasu bcad pa 'ga' tsam gyi phyir yang lus dang srog mi phangs na/ mdo sde bcu gnyis
369a5(mdo sde): lnga nga spos/ tshigasu bcang ba gcig tsam gyi phyir ya nga / lus dang srog mi phangs na/ de ma yin pa'i phyir/ zang zing lta ci smos/ chos thos pa'i don gyis lus dang sems
369a6(mdo sde): shin tu bde bar gyur te/ shin tu dang po'i sems skyes pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems thob par 'gyur// chos ston pa mthong na/ pa ma mthong ba ltar nga rgyal gyi sems mi skye'o// 
369a7(mdo sde): sems can gyi don tu chos nyan gyi rnyed pa dang grags pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed kyi/ bdag la phan pa'i don gyis phyir ma yin no// dam pa'i
369a8(mdo sde): rjes kyi phyir rgyal po dang / bkres skom dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / stag dang / spung ku la sogs te/ gcan zan khro bo dang / rkun po dang / dgra las sogs pas 'jigs pa ma
369b1(mdo sde): yi no sngar dbang po rnams kyi nyon mongs pa btul nas// de'i 'og tu chos nyan par byed kyi/ dus ma yin par nyan pa ni ma yin te/ sems rtse gcig tu chos mnyan par byed do// chos la
369b2(mdo sde): bkur sti bya ba'i phyir/ chos ston pa la rim gro gur par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' drin shes pa dang / drin bsab pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
369b3(mdo sde): rtse gcig tu nyan pa zhe na/ chos nyan pa la rnam pa bzhi ste/ yang dag pa'i sems dang / rtse gcig pa'i sems dang / thams cad dang thams cad kyi sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang
369b4(mdo sde): bzhi ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde bcu gnyis tshol ba la brtson pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin lci ba dran pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams
369b5(mdo sde): cad kyi dam pa'i chos kun tu rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dam pa'i chos skye zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa dag sangs rgyas kyi chos la dang
369b6(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub par bya ba'i phyir/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i sems can grangs med pa dran par byed do// 
369b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' drin lci ba bsab pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mdo sde bcu gnyis tshol ba la brtson par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus sangs
369b8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos tshol ba ni/ sems can thams cad dang po'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir/ rmyi'i rigs pa'i bstan ches slob par byed do// gzhan yang nyes pa'i skyon thams cad shes par
370a1(mdo sde): / bya ba dang / mu stegs can gyi ngar bar blta ba'i gtsug lag bzhig par bya ba dang / sems can gdul ba'i thabs mkhas pa shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gsheg
370a2(mdo sde): pas gsungs pa'i ngor dang / 'jig rter po'i rig gi dor rnam par dbye bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu'i rigs pa'i bstar bcos slob par byed do// byang chub sem
370a3(mdo sde): dpa' ci'i phyir sgro'i rigs pa'i bstan bces slob par byed ce na/ sgo'i tshig yongasu dag par brgyan pa dang / yongasu ma dag pa'i rig gis den gsal bar ston mi nus pa dang / tha
370a4(mdo sde): cang shes shing khong du chud par bya ba dang / yang dag pa 'i tshig mi nyams pas nga rgyal gyis mi shig par gangan par lnga pa las bzlog cig sems can gdul ba'i tha
370a5(mdo sde): mkhas par shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sgri'i rigs pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' ci'i phyir sman dpyad kyi rig pa'i
370a6(mdo sde): bstan bces slob ce na/ sems can rnams mi dge ba'i nad brgya rtsa bzhi dang dbral bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la byams shing sing rtse ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams dang / 
370a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems bskyed par bya ba dang / de ltar rang dang bral bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar bya ba dang / de ltar dga' ba'i sems skyes pas rtag tu sangs rgyas dran par 'gyur te/ snying rje
370a8(mdo sde): chen pas sems can rnams pa rol tu phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sman dpyad kyi rig pa sleb par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' no ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi bzal
370b1(mdo sde): rig pa slob par byed ce ma sems can la ban par bya ba'i phyir/ nor zang zing rnyeng skabs sems can gyi rnams ngang pa bskyed par bya ba'i rnams ngang / 'jig rten gyi bya ba'i dngos pa
370b2(mdo sde): shes pas nga rgyal gzhom pa dang / sems can gdul bar bya ba dang / srid pa'i chos thams cad kyi bsgribs pa kun gsal ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bzo'i rig pa slob par
370b3(mdo sde): byed do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i dngos po lnga sngar ma bslabs na/ nam du yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob
370b4(mdo sde): par mi nus// de bas na bla na med pa'i byang chub theb pa'i phyir/ rig pa'i dngos po lnga bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni drin shes pa dang / drin bsab pa ni sems can bshad
370b5(mdo sde): ba'i dngos po bshad cing bstan par bya'o// ji ltar ba shad ce na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ rig pa lnga dang ldan par bshad
370b6(mdo sde): par bya'o// bshad pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ rigs kyis bshad pa dang / yongasu dag pas bshad pa'o// de la ji ltar na rims kyis bshad pa gang zhe na/ sngar smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
370b7(mdo sde): ba bshad la/ de'i 'og tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du bshad pa dang / drin shes pa dang / drin bsab pa'i phyir/ don yid la byed
370b8(mdo sde): ci chas bzhin du gnas pa ni rims kyis bshad pa zhes bya'o// de la yongasu dag par bshad pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhe na/ nyan pa 'dug la bshad pa 'greng ni// de la bshad par ma
371a1(mdo sde): bya'o// gal te nyar pa chos la skye mtshol lam bshad pa la skyon tshol na de la bshad par mi bya'o// gal te gang zag la rtemaches la mi rten na/ chos la mi rten
371a2(mdo sde): pas de la bshad par mi pa'o// gal te nyan pa yi ge la rder la don la mi brten na bshad par mi bya ba nas/ bkri ba'i don la rten gyi nges pa'i don gyi bar la mi rjer na bshad par
371a3(mdo sde): mi bya'o// de ci'i bar zhe na/ gang zag de ni sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yong su dag pa'i chos la ma gus pa'i phyir ro// gal te bshad cing sten pa yang
371a4(mdo sde): ches la bkur bsngo dang la/ mas can pa gang gus pa'i sems kyis rdza gcig tucan cing rgyal gyi ma sa med pas ying su dag par bshad pa zhes bya'o// gzhan
371a5(mdo sde): rims kyis bshad pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad ba shad pa'o// thams cad bshad pa zhes bya ba ni/ mdo sde bcu gnyis nas tshig gcig gam/ tshigasu bcad ba
371a6(mdo sde): gcig gam/ tshigs bcad pa phyed kyi bar nga bshad pa ste/ de yang tshig sgra dang / don dang chos su ldan la/ chos dang don bstan pa yang spro ba dang / gzeng bstod pa dang / dga'
371a7(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir dus su bstan pa dang / dus kha cig tu gshe zhing spyod pa dang / dus kha cig tu drang por thang kar bstan pa dang / dus kha cig tu dpe rnams bstan te/ ci dang 'dreng
371a8(mdo sde): pa bzhin du bstan pa dang / dus kha rig tu bas le ning sla bar bstan pa dang / dus kha cig tu ci ltar mos pa bzhin du 'jug sla ba bstan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' drin shes
371b1(mdo sde): pa/ drin bsab pa la mkhas pa'i mchog ches rims kyis bshad pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang yongasu dag par bshad pa zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgra/ 
371b2(mdo sde): sdang ba la byams pa'i sems bsgom ste/ byams pa'i sems kyis sems can sdig pa dang bcas pa dang / gang zag bag med pa dang / le lo can dag la thabs rnam pa mang po
371b3(mdo sde): nas ches bstan pa nas/ rgyags shing dregs pa dang / gang zag dbul 'phongs pa'i bar du thabs rnam pa mang pos chos ston par byed kyi/ bdag bskyed pa gzhan smod pa 'am/ bza'
371b4(mdo sde): ba dang / brdung ba dang / rnyed pa dang / grags pa'i phyir ma yin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' drin shes shing drin bsab pa la mkhas pa'i chos yongasu dag par bshad pa
371b5(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar na chos bzhin du gnas pa yin zhe na/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dge ba 'i chos bsgom zhing yongasu dag pa dang ldan te/ drin shes pa dang / 
371b6(mdo sde): drin bsab pa yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu bstan pa'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po dri na shes shing / drin bsab pa ni don yid la
371b7(mdo sde): byed de/ mang du thos pas gzungs thob par byed cing chos kyi sgren ma 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don tu sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims
371b8(mdo sde): dang / mang du thos pa la brtson par bya/ chos ston cing 'chad pa la mched pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i chos la skyen mi gdags ston cing 'chad pa la skye nam gdags/ gnod pa dang / 
372a1(mdo sde): 'tshe ba med pa'i sems kyis sems can la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni/ drin shes pa zhes bya'o// lha dang mi'i longs spyod myong zhing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
372a2(mdo sde): las thob pa ni drin shes pa dang / drin bsab pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan yang dngos po bzhis bzod pa bsgom zhing mi bzed pa yongs spangs te/ sems
372a3(mdo sde): ma mang po bsdus nas bzod pa bsgom pa la bkod de/ bdag kyang bzed pa byed de// gzhan yang bzed pa byed pa la 'geng cing / 'jigs pa dang bral ba ni dri mi shes pa zhes bya'o/ 
372a4(mdo sde): de ltar bzod pa byis pa'i rkyen gyis zhe sdang gi sems mi 'byung bas/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa mi 'byung bas 'gyed pa'i sems
372a5(mdo sde): med de/ lus 'di dang bral nas kyang lnga dang mi'i longs spyod mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa ni drin pas ba bzhe sa bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
372a6(mdo sde): dpa' dngos po rnam pa bzhis brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ le le yongasu spangs nas/ byang chub brgyan pa'i phyir/ sems can yongasu sdud de// byang chub kyi lam gyi phyir brtson
372a7(mdo sde): 'grus brtsom pas nyal na yang bde ste/ nyen mongs pa dang bral bas bde ba'i chos skye zhing 'phel te/ lus kyang bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba ni bdag la phan pa'i don byed pa
372a8(mdo sde): zhes pa'o// byang rab sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsam yang / sems can la mi 'tshe ste/ 'tshog rdeg dang / gshe ba dang sme ba med pa ni/ gzhan la phan pa'i don byed pa zhes bya
372b1(mdo sde): ste/ lus 'di dang bral nas kyang lha dang mi'i longs spyang myang zhing mthu dang dbang du ldan te/ byang chub kyi lam thob pas 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur te// 'di ni byang chub sems
372b2(mdo sde): dpa' brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i dngos po bzhi zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i te nge 'dzin bsgoms pas 'khrug pa'i sems yongasu spangs te/ byang chub brgyan pa'i phyir sem
372b3(mdo sde): can yong su sdudade/ byang chubab kyi phyir tingange 'dzin bsgoms pas tshe 'di yang 'jig rten gyi bde ba myong la/ lus dang sems dben zhing zhi ba ni drin lan shes pa zhes bya'o// de ltar
372b4(mdo sde): lus dang sems dben zhing zhi bas sems can la mi tshe ba ni drin bsab pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lus 'di dang bral nas/ rnam par dag pa'i lus thob
372b5(mdo sde): cing bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i longs spyod myong ste/ yod sa mya ngan las 'da' ba thob pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan bsgom pa'i dngos po
372b6(mdo sde): bzhi zhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' drin shes pa dang / drin bsab pa'i shes rab dang ldan pas ma rig pa bcom ste/ byang chub yongasu brgyan pa'i phyir/ sdu ba'i
372b7(mdo sde): chos rnam pa bzhis sems can yongasu bsdud do// byang chub kyi phyir shes rab bsgoms pas chos kyi dbyings shes shing rtog pa'i phyir/ lus kyi bde ba'i longs spyod rung ba ni/ ba
372b8(mdo sde): la phan pa'i don zhes bya'o// sems can rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don bskyed pa ni gzhan la phan pa'i don zhes bya'o// nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam pa
373a1(mdo sde): yongasu spangs pas na/ 'bras bu chen po zhes bya ste/ 'di ni drin shes shing / drir bsab pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa
373a2(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pas/ sngon 'das pa'i dngos po shes rab kyis rtogs te/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang sdig
373a3(mdo sde): pa'i las brtags nas/ dge ba'i ris su 'thun pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don datu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas/ dga' ldan
373a4(mdo sde): gnam du de phun sum tshogs par skyes so// de na mchog/ tu gyur pa gsum dang ldan te/ tshe mchog tu gyur pa dang / gzugs mchog tu gyur pa dang / grags pa mchog tu gyur
373a5(mdo sde): theg ma gnas de ras bab pa'i tshe 'od zer chen po bkye nas/ phyogs bcu snang bar byas te/ yum gyi lhum su 'jug pa dang / lhums na ji srid gnas pa dang / lhums nas
373a6(mdo sde): bltam pa'i dus mkhyen to// phyogs bcu 'byegs re re yang mis ma brten par gem pa bdun bdun bor te/ 'di skad ces bsgrag so// bdag da ltar gyi lus 'di ni lus nang gi tha ma ste/ lha
373a7(mdo sde): dang klu dang / gnod sprin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / ri 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis me tog dang / bdug spos dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan dang / ba dan
373a8(mdo sde): dang / gdugs dam pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas so// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas/ de'i lus las mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med do// byams pa'i shugs kyi
373b1(mdo sde): bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom mo// lU tshigs re re la yang gyang mthu be tsho'i stobs re re dang ldan no// gzhan nu bus pa'i tshe 'jig rten gyi dngos po ma bslabs par thams cad kun rtogs
